padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_4b+seedGzED\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_1B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8502180205573181103\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_1M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/steroid-pumped-muscles-do-not-provide.html?showComment=1513658815543#c8502180205573181103\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 19, 2017 at 10:16 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_1MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nThe entanglement of this material world is compared here to a banyan tree. For one who is engaged in fruitive activities, there is no end to the banyan tree. He wanders from one branch to another, to another, to another. The tree of this material world has no end, and for one who is attached to this tree, there is no possibility of liberation.<br />\n<br />\nThe Vedic hymns, meant for elevating oneself, are called the leaves of this tree. This tree's roots grow upward because they begin from where Brahma is located, the topmost planet of this universe. If one can understand this indestructible tree of MAYA (illusion) , then one can get out of it.<br />\n<br />\nThe banyan tree can be found beside a reservoir of temple pond water. We can see that the trees on the bank reflect upon the water with their branches down and roots up. The tree of this material world is only a reflection of the real tree of the spiritual world. This reflection of the spiritual world is situated on desire, just as a tree's reflection is on water.<br />\n<br />\nDesire is the cause of things being situated in this reflected material light. One who wants to get out of this material existence must know this tree thoroughly through study of the Vedas . Then he can cut off his relationship with it.<br />\n<br />\nA reflection is temporary, for it is sometimes seen and sometimes not seen. But the origin from whence the reflection is reflected is eternal. The material reflection of the real tree has to be cut off.<br />\n<br />\nWhen it is said that a person knows the Vedas, it is assumed that he knows how to cut off attachment to this material world. If one knows that process, he actually knows the Vedas.<br />\n<br />\nOne who is attracted by the ritualistic formulas of the Vedas is attracted by the beautiful green leaves of the tree. He does not exactly know the true purpose of the Vedas.<br />\n<br />\nThe purpose of the Vedas, as disclosed by the Personality of Godhead Himself, is to CUT DOWN THE REFLECTED TREE and attain the real tree of the spiritual world.<br />\n<br />\nTO UNDERSTAND THIS PROFOUND TRUTH, EVERY TEMPLE HAS A WATER BODY WITH A BANYAN TREE REFLECTED IN THE WATER.<br />\n<br />\nLord Krishna tells Arjuna 6000 years ago at the battlefield of Kurukshetra --<br />\n\"The branches of this tree extend downward and upward, nourished by the three modes of material nature. The twigs are the objects of the senses. This tree also has roots going down, and these are bound to the fruitive actions of human society.\"<br />\nBhagavad-gita 15:2<br />\n<br />\nThe real root is from Brahmaloka, and the other roots are in the human planetary systems. After one enjoys the results of virtuous activities in the upper planetary systems ( one of the lower 6 dimensions ) , he comes down to this earth to lighten his KARMIC BAGGAGE , in the hope of attaining the topmost 7th dimension for MOKSHA.<br />\n<br />\n\"The real form of this tree cannot be perceived in this world. No one can understand where it ends, where it begins, or where its foundation is. But with determination one must cut down this tree with the weapon of detachment. So doing, one must seek that place from which, having once gone, one never returns, and there surrender to that Supreme Personality of Godhead from whom everything has began and in whom everything is abiding since time immemorial.<br />\n<br />\naham sarvasya prabhavah, \"I am the origin of everything.\"<br />\n<br />\nTo get out of the entanglement of this strong banyan tree of material life, one must surrender to Krishna. As soon as one surrenders unto Krishna, he becomes detached automatically from this material extension.<br />\nIn Bhagawat Gita Sri Krishna tells Prince Arjuna before the great war. \" Of all the trees I am the Banyan tree\". This is where the creation and destruction of the Cosmos comes. This is the concept of Singularity ( which Einstein did NOT understand ) or the Bindu of the Sri Yantra sacred geometry.<br />\n<br />\nWhen you have a big bang which created the cosmos, you need to have a black hole singularity too.<br />\n<br />\nPeepal trees emit positive energy-- the peepal ( female ) and banyan tree (male ) has a HUGE aura. This is NOT superstition.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_1BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_1B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_2B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1519618927496853393\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_2M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/steroid-pumped-muscles-do-not-provide.html?showComment=1513658935990#c1519618927496853393\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 19, 2017 at 10:18 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_2MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nRightly after Independence the Indian Govt has chosen Banyan tree as our national tree, for here is a a tree that regenerates unlike other trees, and is immortal unless sabotaged..<br />\n<br />\nThe Bindu of the Sri yantra represents singularity. The cosmos expands and contracts at regular cycles as explained by Sri Krishna in the Bhagawat Gita--just like inhalation and exhalation.<br />\n<br />\nSingularity existed before the big-bang.<br />\naha\u1e3f sarvasya prabhavo<br />\nmatta\u1e25 sarva\u1e3f pravartate<br />\n<br />\nI am the origin of everything<br />\nEverything comes from me<br />\nVarahamihira the great Astrologer and astronomer from wrote 4600 years ago, in the opening of his Samhita, \u201c It has been said in Vedas that the first primeval thing was darkness, which is not identical with the black colour, but a kind of non-existence like the state of a sleeping person. The big bang is merely a prelude to the big crunch, and the universe is caught in an infinite cycle of expansion and contraction, symbolizing the primordial black-hole like state is Aditi, the mother of all mothers and the mother of the cosmos .<br />\n<br />\nWe exist in the dot or Turiya or stillness of OM, in absolute consciousness-- which is the equilibrium of Bindu. We are unaware of the zero point field , as a fish is unaware of the water..<br />\n<br />\nAs per the Vedas the sole witness to the cosmic deluge is Maharishi Markandeya.<br />\n<br />\nIt was stated by the Lord in the Vedas: \u201cOh, Human! This village of yours is balanced on the banyan leaf and your lifespan is just a like a drop of water running down that leaf, which may fall any minute.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nSuddenly, amongst all the confusion, Markandeya noticed a banyan leaf floating on the ocean, tossed by the waves. On this unlikely raft lay a beautiful and adorable child, suckling his right toe, unperturbed by the calamity that had befallen the world. It was Vishnu, the newborn cosmic child. The infant's heavenly smile negated the brutality of the pralaya (cosmic deluge). His compassionate glance reassured Markandeya that life would go on, convincing him that the world never ends, but only changes.<br />\n<br />\nWhen Markandeya went close to this baby, he was sucked in with the air, when the baby took a breath.<br />\n<br />\nInside, he saw hundreds of thousand of universes and all that had been consumed by the deluge - the skies, the seas, the earth, gods, demons, humans, animals and plants.<br />\n<br />\nSo much so, that he even had a glimpse of his own Ashram on the banks of the Subhadra River. He saw himself sitting in meditation. Markandeya thus realized that the child was none other than the cosmic god (Narayana) who had withdrawn the world into himself. In that vast sea he again saw the banyan tree growing on the tiny island and the infant boy lying within the leaf.<br />\n<br />\nThe child ( Vishnu ) glanced at him from the corner of His eyes with a smile imbued with the nectar of love, and Markandeya took Him into his heart through his eyes. Greatly agitated, the sage ran to embrace the transcendental Personality of Godhead. At that moment the Supreme Personality of Godhead, who is the original master of all mysticism and who is hidden within everyone's heart, became invisible to the sage, just as the achievements of an incompetent person can suddenly vanish.<br />\n<br />\nAfter the Lord disappeared, O brahmana, the banyan tree, the great water and the dissolution of the universe all vanished as well, and in an instant Markandeya found himself back in his own hermitage, just as before.<br />\n<br />\nHere Lord Vishnu after reversing the big bang, turned himself into a child ( read as DNA from cosmos ) as small as that could fit on a tiny leaf of a banyan tree, floating in the Aakasha , until he himself decides to recreate everything back out from himself.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 4--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_2BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_2B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_3B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4034212282303173035\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_3M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Sri Krishna died ( as he willed- iccha mrityu ) under a banyan tree, shot on the foot by an archer, whom he had killed in his previous birth.<br />\n<br />\nIf you get high on Soma ( the ancient super LSD ) you will see banyan tree leaves blue in colour, and you can talk to the tree for hours together.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_4b+seedGzED\" kind=\"d\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div>\n<ol id=\"bc_0_176TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_4b+seedGzED\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_172B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1348481307020028419\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_172M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c236000836569887077\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_175M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/steroid-pumped-muscles-do-not-provide.html?showComment=1513899174704#c236000836569887077\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 22, 2017 at 5:02 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_175MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nDRAUPADI IS YAJNASENI -- BORN OUT OF HOMAM FIRE-- AN ALLEGORY..( HEAT OF KUNDALINI )<br />\n<br />\nAnd, 'auspicious, eye-ravishing, large-black-eyed Panchali rose from the yajna altar, Dark-skinned Panchali Lotus-eyed lady,wavy-haired Panchali, Hair like dark blue clouds, Shining coppery carved nails, Soft eye-lashes, Swelling breasts Shapely thighs. A girl like goddess born to humans. 'There was none on earth to match her loveliness. Gods, anti-gods, and yakshas yearned for such celestial beauty.' (169:45-47, Adi Parva, Mahabharata)<br />\n<br />\nDraupadi\u2019s biological parents were Agni and Swaha . She was adopted by Drupad, King of Panchala, which is why her name was changed from Agni Jyotsna to Princess of Panchala to Drupad Kanya to Draupadi. The sages called her Yajna Seni as she was born from the sacrificial fire.<br />\n<br />\nShe was a fully grown woman, dressed in the best of sSilk, unusually rare jewelry. A dark complexioned maiden, so dark, that when her hair brushed over her face, the black raven like hair, looked golden brown, so dark was her complexion.<br />\n<br />\nVoluptuous with a slender waist. She had a naturally aromatic odor that could be sensed a \u2018yojana\u2019 away (a measurement for distance).<br />\n<br />\nDraupadi as Kundalini has five human chakras she has to cross before she finds refuge in the topmost Sahasrara chakra ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE BASTARD WHITE INVADER MADE DRAUPADI A DAUGHTER (NALAYANI ) OF NALA AND DAMAYANTI IN HER PREVIOUS BIRTH .. WE IN INDIA NEVER HEARD OF NALA AND DAMAYANTI TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA.<br />\n<br />\nRAHU AND KETU WERE WOVEN INTO THE \"BHAKTI MOVEMENT \" BULLSHIT STORY .. ROTHSCHILD GOT THIS FAKE STORY ADAPTED INTO KERALA KATHAKALI..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE BASTARDS WROTE A BULLSHIT BOOK ON COOKERY ( PAKADARPANAM-- WITH BEEF ) AND TOLD THAT NALA , AN EXCELLENT COOK WROTE IT. This means that even a small part of an entire holographic record contains the entire record of the recorded image .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The fact that living cells in any organism evolve and grow from more simple stem cells, implies quantum entanglement throughout the organism and its composite parts, with an associated instantaneous exchange of information through PCAR.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">PCAR is necessary for the brain to perceive objects as they really exist in three dimensional space. If the brain had to rely solely on the visible light spectrum that was reflected off the external object and onto the retina of the eyes, the object would appear two dimensional just as it would be if a picture of the object was recorded photographically with a camera.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Contrary to the popular opinion that we see objects in three dimensions entirely because of binocular vision, just close one eye and observe an external object with the remaining open eye. The object appears \"out there\" and not as an image \"in the brain\" because of PCAR. This clearly presents a survival advantage to an organism allowing it to accurately see and locate objects (especially predators and food) in three dimensional space.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Recall that the quantum phenomena of non-locality implies instantaneous transmission of information across space and time<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The Quantum Hologram is a model of how reality works. Like all models it enables us to make predictions and create interpretations about how nature operates<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Every one of our cells contains the same genetic blueprint of DNA and clearly that DNA and environmental influences exert major influences over the development and functioning of our cells. But cells are not only subordinate to DNA; they also function and maintain homeostasis by communicating and cooperating simultaneously with many other cells of the body and by the information they receive from the environment. Much of this inter-cellular signaling is electrochemical in nature<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">With up to 100 trillion cells it is hard to imagine how that many cells can remain in harmony by the slow process of electrochemical signaling especially under times of great distress when survival of the entire organism is at stake and / or requires extremely rapid and coordinated responses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Epigenetics which is the study of the mechanisms by which the environment influences cells and their offspring without changing genetic codes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Inter-cellular communication is especially critical in embryonic development. Then at some critical point when the embryo has reached a certain size, something truly miraculous happens.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">CONTINUED TO 4--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">CONTINUED FROM 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Cells begin to differentiate and form groups of like cells that will eventually become all the highly specialized tissues and organs that make up the human body. This is nonsense. Vararuchi was Raja Bhoj's religious and Vedic knowledge minister in 2800 BC<br />\n<br />\nVararuchi was a Mathematician from Kerala who taught at Bhoj Shala University inside the Saraswati Temple in 2860 BC . Today this ancient university is a Muslim mosque. Vararuchi taught KATAPAYADI SYSTEM at the ancient Bhojsala university..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/vedic-hindu-fire-temple-of-baku.html</span><br />\nVararuchi lived 200 years before Varahamihira ( Mihir Muni 2660 BC ).<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/mihira-muni-great-astrologer-cum.html<br />\n<br />\nTaxila and Nalanda have been hyped up by the white invader. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nJune 28, 2015 at 2:27 PM<br />\nhi a,<br />\n<br />\n4 days ago I visited a pretty village named Mezhathur 8 kms from Pattambi in Kerala.<br />\n<br />\nIt is named after Mezhathol Agnihothri.<br />\n<br />\nAgnihothri was the first child of Vararuchi.<br />\n<br />\nMezhathol who did the famous Agnihotra ritual was the first child of the famous Vararuchi (2860 BC ) , the founder of Kerala system of Astrology.<br />\n<br />\nMezhathol did a marathon 99 Yaagams, one after the other. Lord Indra requested him not to do the 100th yaagam as this would give him unbridled powers and status higher than Indra.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/mihira-muni-great-astrologer-cum.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/08/agnihotra-ghee-cow-dung-fuel-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\nVararuchi from whom Varahamihira drew inspiration crated the Kapatayadi system of counting. The entire Sanskrit Vyaakarana Shastra had been written in verse and charted in the form of a wheel<br />\n.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/vedic-hindu-fire-temple-of-baku.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n################################<br />\n<br />\nThe mathematical value pi has always been a curious number throughout history-- ratio of a circle's circumference to its diameter,<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHere is Aryabhatta's version of the value of Pi in 2700 BC:<br />\n<br />\nLets split the words and understand the meaning:<br />\n\u091a\u0924\u0941\u0930\u0927\u093f\u0915\u092e\u094d \u0936\u0924\u092e\u094d - Four more than hundred (=104)<br />\n\u0905\u0937\u094d\u091f\u0917\u0941\u0923\u092e\u094d - multiplied by 8 (104 x 8 = 832)<br />\n\u0926\u094d\u0935\u093e\u0937\u0937\u094d\u091f\u093f = 62<br />\n\u0924\u0925\u093e \u0938\u0939\u0938\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0923\u093e\u092e\u094d = of 1000 as such (=62000; totalling 62832)<br />\n\u0905\u092f\u0941\u0924 \u0926\u094d\u0935\u092f = 10,000 x 2 (=20,000)<br />\n\u0935\u093f\u0937\u094d\u0915\u092e\u094d\u092d\u0938\u094d\u092f = of the diameter<br />\n\u0906\u0938\u0928\u094d\u0928: - approximately<br />\n\u0935\u0943\u0924\u094d\u0924 \u092a\u0930\u093f\u0923\u093e\u0939: - to the circumference.<br />\nIn effect, 62832/20000 =&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>3.1416</b></span><br />\n<br />\nIt interesting to note the large numbers he has used to arrive at Pi and the remark that pi is only an approximate value.<br />\n<br />\nAnd we have also coded it in Mantras by the KATAPAYADI SYSTEM<br />\n( check out in Wikipedia--they have just touched the tip of the PARALPERU iceberg. )<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHere is the Vararuchi system from Sanskrit verses .<br />\n<br />\nThey are not bumpkin shepherd\u2019s verses.<br />\n<br />\nVararuchi was a Mathematician from Kerala who taught at Bhoj Shala University inside the Saraswati Temple in 2860 BC .<br />\n<br />\nToday this ancient Hindu university is a Muslim mosque.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_64MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_64BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 21, 2018 at 6:12 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_65MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nWhat is the value of Pi ?<br />\n<br />\nO Lord anointed with the yogurt of the milkmaids\u2019 worship (Krishna), O savior of the fallen, O master of Shiva, please protect me.<br />\n<br />\n\u0917\u094b\u092a\u0940\u092d\u093e\u0917\u094d\u092f \u092e\u0927\u0941\u0935\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0924\u0903 \u0936\u094d\u0930\u0941\u0902\u0917\u0936\u094b\u0926\u0927\u093f \u0938\u0902\u0927\u093f\u0917\u0903<br />\n<br />\n\u0916\u0932\u091c\u0940\u0935\u093f\u0924\u0916\u093e\u0924\u093e\u0935 \u0917\u0932\u0939\u093e\u0932\u093e \u0930\u0938\u0902\u0927\u0930\u0903<br />\n<br />\nGopibhagya madhuvrata srngisodadhisandhiga|<br />\nKhalajivitakhatava galahalarasandhara||<br />\n<br />\nKa\u1e6dapay\u0101di system dictates that:<br />\n* As the first digit is 3, the first consonant must be one of ga, \u1e0da, ba, la<br />\n* As the second digit is 1, the second consonant must be one of ka, \u1e6da, pa, ya<br />\n* For the third digit to be 4, the third consonant must be one of gha, \u1e0dha, bha, va\u2026<br />\n<br />\nSo to fit 3.141592653589793\u2026, the list of consonants in the verse must satisfy the regex<br />\n{g,\u1e0d,b,l}{k,\u1e6d,p,y}{gh,\u1e0dh,bh,v}{k,\u1e6d,p,y}{\u1e45,\u1e47,m,\u015b}{jh,dh}{kh,\u1e6dh,ph,r}{c,t,\u1e63}{\u1e45,\u1e47,m,\u015b}{g,\u1e0d,b,l}{\u1e45,\u1e47,m,\u015b}{j,d,h}{jh,dh}{ch,th,s}{jh,dh}{g,\u1e0d,b,l}\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nga - 3 pii - 1 bhaa - 4 gya - 1 ma - 5 dhu - 9 ra - 2 ta -6 shru - 5 ga - 3 sho - 5 da - 8 dhi - 9 sa - 7 dha - 9 ga - 3 kha - 2 la - 3 jii - 8 vi - 4 ta - 6 kha - 2 ta - 6 va - 4 ga - 3 la - 3 ra - 2 sa - 7 dha - 9 ra \u2013 2<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">pi = 3.1415926535897932384626433832792</span><br />\n<br />\nShiksha, one of the six Vedangas, constituting a masterly exposition of the disciplines of Phonology and Phonetics developed in India, when the white man was running around naked doing GRUNT GRUNT for language<br />\n<br />\nAncient India used letters of the alphabet for numeric representation, till the appearance of specific symbols and words standing for numbers. The external world needed to be understood as much in quantitative as in qualitative terms. Time and distance required to be expressed in units.<br />\n<br />\nOne early device was to embed numeric codes through letters in texts. A typical example was the Katapayadi scheme where one could derive the numeric position of a Raga in the 72- Melakarta Raga scheme of classical music, from the letters that figured in the name of the Raga.<br />\n<br />\nThat scheme that tabulates the system of 72 basic ragas derives from a permutation and combination of the 12 half-tone intervals that comprise the octave and that figures so universally as to suggest an almost natural endowment or inheritance of all mankind.<br />\n<br />\nOne can recognize in these devices, the concepts could have led inevitably to thedevelopment of mathematical symbols and skills, and on the later development of advanced levels of knowledge in Mathematics and Astronomy.<br />\n<br />\nA fascination for Music, Mathematics and the Stars, leading on to God, would seem to characterize the ancient Indian mathematician and musician rooted in Shabda Brahman .<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_65MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_65BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_66M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1521592996238#c4848674592747964571\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 21, 2018 at 6:13 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_66MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nThis brings us squarely into the discussion of what Words mean and indeed to the philosophical question of what Meaning itself means. A fundamental question then is, where does meaning come from ?<br />\n<br />\nFrom the thought, the word, from the choice or sequence of words, the whole sentence, or even the silent expression of what is not spoken ? Is there a gap between what is said and what is meant, and if so, how is it bridged ?<br />\n<br />\nThese are the central concerns of language, communication and meaning. And it is these questions that are addressed by the Vedangas. Thi is NOT mindless bullshit propagated by Noam Chomsky.<br />\n<br />\nThese disciplines of the Vedangas were later elaborated, codified and presented in extraordinary range and depth by a succession of the early brilliant scholars like Yaska, Panini and Patanjali and the later ones like Bhartrhari.<br />\n<br />\nTheir concepts reach down today in every significant work of modern linguistics Panini\u2019s central work, the Ashtdhyayi, so named after the eight chapters that comprise the work, has the totality of the Sanskrit language corpus, analysed and presented as rules of grammar in a total of 3998 Sutras or aphorisms of phenomenal brevity.<br />\n<br />\nIt has indeed been considered a masterpiece of encapsulation of the entire science of linguistics in a way that George Cardona says : \u201cPanini's grammar \u2026\u2026. merits asserting ... that it is one of the greatest monuments of human intelligence\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nDimitri Mendeleyeev said he could NOT have compiled his Periodic table and kept empty spaces , but for his knowledge of Sanskrit \u2013and he thanked Panini.<br />\n<br />\nThis pissed off the white man and he was denied the Nobel Prize.<br />\nTHIS WAS THE REASON WHY CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS ABLE TO KICK NASA ON THEIR COLLECTIVE BALLS AND TWATS<br />\n<br />\nGo0gle for&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>DNA NASA&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\nWHAT DO YOU SEE ON PAGE ONE AS ITEM ONE ?<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/dna-nasa-arsenic-and-phosphorous-capt.html</span><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS COSMOS IS A GRAND MUSICAL SYMPHONY ORCHESTRA .. ANCIENT HINDUS HEARD SRUTI VERSES\u2014&nbsp; THEY SAW IT TOO IN THEIR GREAT FRACTAL MINDS</span></b><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</span></li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_1B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7408015507702308046\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_149M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. THESE VERSES ARE NOT WRITTEN BY MAN.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE SUN CANNOT BE SEEN FROM OUTER SPACE ..BUT ITS ENERGY CAN\nBE DRAWN BY SOLAR PANELS OF SATELLITES.. THIS IS AN EXAMPLE OF MAYA MENTIONED\nIN RIG VEDA 72 TIMES AND 29 TIMES IN ATHARVA VEDA .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMAYA IS INVISIBLE- NO HUMAN CAN SEE BEYOND THE QUANTUM\nSCREEN.. OUR 5 SENSES ARE SQUELCHED FOR OUR OWN SURVIVAL.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL THE INITIAL QUANTUM PHYSICS SCIENTISTS DECLARED THAT\nWHEN SCIENCE CATCHES UP WITH VEDANTA , THE COSMOS WILL HAVE DISSOLUTION (\nPRALAYA ).. SUCH IS THE WISDOM CONTAINED IN THE VEDAS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL OF THEM PICKED UP BHAGAWAD GITA AND WROTE DOWN IN THEIR\nWILLS THAT THEY WANT TO BE CREMATED --NOT BURIED..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTRANSFORMER ?<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nVISHNU IS A TRANSFORMER -- THOUGH I HAVE MENTIONED THAT\nVISHNU IS A MEDIATOR AND PRESERVER IN ALL MY POSTS SO FAR.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHAT WE SEE AS MATTER IS ACTUALLY VIBRATING ENERGY -- THIS\nWAS WRITTEN IN OUR VEDAS--LIFTED BY JEW ALBERT EINSTEIN AND PATENTED IN HIS\nNAME..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nENERGY CAN NEITHER BE CREATED BY BRAHMA OR DESTROYED BY\nSHIVA --IT CAN ONLY BE TRANSFORMED BY VISHNU.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL HINDU GODS ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES , EXCEPT VISHNUs MORTAL\nAVATARS VAMAMA, PARASHURAMA, RAMA, KRISHNA AND AYYAPPA.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nONLY VISHNU HAS MORTAL AVATARS --SHIVA AND BRAHMA CANNOT\nHAVE MORTAL AVATARS..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU LOOK INTO THE MIRROR WHAT YOU SEE IS NOT YOU-- YOU\nARE ACTUALLY A BALL OF VIBRATING ENERGY INSIDE YOUR BODY..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU DIE YOUR SOUL WILL EXIT YOUR BODY..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN THE BODY IS CREMATED AND THE SKULL POPS A SOLITON WAVE\n( TSUNAMI ) WILL TAKE YOUR SOUL UP TO ONE OF THE SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS WHICH\nACCOMMODATES THAT PARTICULAR SOUL FREQUENCY.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU BURY A DEAD BODY , THE SOUL IS TRAPPED ON PLANET\nEARTH, UNHAPPY AND LOST FOREVER. SINCE BURIAL RELIGIONS CAME ON PLANET EARTH\nMAN HAS KNOWN NO PEACE..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOUR SOUL FREQUENCY IS TIED TO YOUR NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE.\nWHEN THE KARMIC BAGGAGE GETS LIGHTER , YOUR SOUL FREQUENCY INCREASES..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS CORRESPOND TO THE SEVEN HUMAN\nCHAKRAS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHERE IS NO INSTANT KUNDALINI BUNGEE JUMP..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE FIRST ASTRA LAYER IS FOR NON \u2013 CONSCIOUS FORMS OF LIFE ,\nFEW SEMI-CONSCIOUS FORMS OF LIFE WHICH CAN PASS THE MIRROR/ COLOUR TEST ( LIKE\nELEPHANTS/ BONOBOS/ DOLPHINS ) , AND FULLY CONSCIOUS HUMANS WHO ARE CRIMINALS\nAND HOMSEXUALS WHOSE KUNDALINIS ARE STUCK IN THE LOWERMOST MOOLADHARA CHAKRA.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCHAKRAS AND ASRAL LAYERS RISE FROM RED TO VIOLET ( RAINBOW\nVIBGYOR COLORS ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. Ajit VadakayilAugust 13, 2018 at 7:45 AM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHATEVER IS INVENTED/ DISCOVERED BY MAN TILL TODAY AND WILL\nBE INVENTED / DISCOVERED IN FUTURE WAS ALREADY INVENTED BEFORE THE LAST\nPRALAYA. MAN IS JUST A CHANNEL.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE AIM OF A HINDU IS LIBERATION FROM ENDLESS REBIRTHS-- SO\nTHAT HIS SOUL CAN GO HOME AND MERGE WITH THE FIELD OF BRAHMAN...<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMOKSHA CAN HAPPEN ONLY WHEN THE SOUL FREQUENCY AND FREQUENCY\nOF THE MOTHER FIELD BRAHMAN ( MORPHOGENETIC CONSCIOUSNESS FIELD \u2013SEVENTH ASTRAL\nLAYER ) IS THE SAME.. WHEN THIS HAPPENS NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE IS ZERO AND THE\nHUMAN EGO IS ZERO.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHERE ARE JIVAN MUKTS ( ALIVE ON PLANET EARTH ) WHOSE EGO IS\nZERO AND WHOSE SOULS HAVE MERGED WITH BRAHMAN WHOSE FIELD EXTENDS TILL EARTH..\nTHESE ARE THE COMPASSIONATE SAGES WE REFER TO IN OUR PURANAS . A JIVAN MUKT HAS\nHIS KUNDALINI RAISED TO SAHASRARA CHAKRA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nROGUES GO TO HIMALAYAS PRETEND TO HAVE SEEN ROTHSCHIDs\nCREATION BABAJI AND CLAIM TO HAVE INSTANT KUNDALINI RAISE<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOU CANT LESSEN YOUR KARMIC BAGGAGE BY PRAYING TO GOD.. A\nHINDU CULTIVATES SHRADDHA --NOT BHAKTI UNLIKE SINGLE MESSIAH / SINGLE HOLY BOOK\nRELIGIONS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSHRADDHA IS A POSTIVE ENERGY EMANATING FROM WITHIN WHICH\nFACTORS IN HUMAN CONSCIENCE.. THERE CANNOT BE SINGLE HOLY BOOK DOGMA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSHRADDHA CANNOT BE BLIND FAITH, IT IS ENLIGHTENED FAITH\u2014\nSELF VERIFICATION IS INVOLVED IN EVERY INCH OF YOUR SPRIRITUAL PROGRESS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSHRADDHA IMPIES SELF RELIANCE , AN INDEPENDENT SENSE OF\nRIGHT OR WRONG , RELIANCE ON OWN CONSCIENCE AND COURGAGE OF ONEs SOUL\nCONVICTIONS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS IS WHY HINDUS CAN NEVER RUSH OUT OF TEMPLES ENMASSE\nAFTER FRIDAY NOON PRAYERS AND START KILLING PEOPLE OF OTHER RELIGIONS ENMASSE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nONLY SANATANA DHARMA AFFORDS THIS UNBRIDLED FREEDOM.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nA HINDU DOES NOT NEED TO BE SAVES BY ANY MESSIAH.. HE NEEDS\nNO ENTRY PERMISSION AT THE PEARLY GATES \u2013THERE IS NO HOUR OF JUDGEMENT . HIS\nSOUL IS SUBJECTED TO THE UNINERSAL LAWS OF QUANTUM PHYSICS..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nLIBERATION IS ONLY THOUGH KNOWLEDGE ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSANATANA DHARMA ASKS YOU TO WAKE UP, OTHER RELIGIONS ASK YOU\nTO REPENT..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSHRADDHA WAS REPLACED BY BHAKTI (BLIND DEVOTION ) AND\nSANATANA DHARMA WAS HIJACKED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD.. BHAGWAD GITA WAS INJECTED WITH\nPOISON REPLACING SHRADDHA WITH BHAKTI..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOU CANNOT GET INSTANT MOKSHA BY DIPPING IN GANGES . NO GURU\nCAN GIVE YOU DEEKSHA FOR MOKSHA<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN A SON DOES SHRADDH FOR HIS DEAD FATHER , HE HELPS HIS\nFATHERs SOUL RISE BY ONE ASTRAL LAYER.. THIS IS A ONE TIME AFFAIR.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMOKSHA CAN HAPPEN ONLY IN THE HOLY LAND OF INDIA\u2014AND ONLY TO\nMEN.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWOMEN ( CANNOT BE DEVOID OF EGO ) WHOSE SOULS ARE PARKED IN\nTHE SIXTH ASTRAL LAYER HAVE TO TAKE RE-BIRTH AS MAN TO GET MOKSHA.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nKARMIC BAGGAGE CAN BE LESSENED ONLY BY GOOD DEEDS AND BEING\nCREATIVE --SO THAT YOU PROVE THAT YOU MADE A DIFFERENCE TO THIS PLANET FOR THE\nBETTER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n\"SOUL\" GIVES PERPETUAL MOTION TO YOUR HEART . YOUR\nSOUL WAS ONCE PART OF THE MOTHER FIELD .. IT YEARNS TO MERGE BACK --IT YEARNS\nFOR MOKSHA ( HOME COMING )<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU GET MOKSHA YOUR SOUL HAS MERGED WITH BRAHMAN (\nMOTHER FIELD ) AND YOU ARE NOW FREE FROM ENDLESS REBIRTHS..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOUR SOUL GIVES FEEDBACK TO BRAHMAN OF YOUR LIFEs\nEXPERIENCES-- BRAHMAN KNOWS EVERYTHING..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS IS SOUL EVOLUTION.. THERE IS NOTHING LIKE DARWINs\nEVOLUTION FROM MONEKY TO MAN.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMAD MAN CHARLES DARWINS MIND IS TOO SHALLOW -- ONLY A MAD\nMAN CAN SAY THAT THE GIRAFFEs NECK BECAME LONGER BECAUSE LEAVES WENT HIGHER ON\nTREE BRANCHES.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIN THIS DNA AGE, OUR NCERT BOOKS EACH OUR KIDS IN SCHOOL\nABOUT DARWINs MISSING LINK..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBURN ALL SCHOOL AND COLLEGE TEXT BOOKS IN INDIA WHICH TEACH\nMAD MAN CHARLES DARWINs EVOLUTION IN THIS DNA AGE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWE DEMAND THAT THIS BE SUBSTITUTED BY INTELLIGENT DESIGN BY\nBRAHMAN\u2014THE MORPHOGENETIC CONSCIOUSNESS FIELD<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIT IS THE SOUL WHICH EVOLVES ( from lowest frequency of\nunicelled fungus to highest moksha human Jivan Mukt frequency ) ACCORDING TO\n400 CENTURY OLD VEDANTA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nKARMA CONTROLS MOKSHA --WHICH MEANS YOUR SOUL GOES TO THE\n7TH ASTRAL LAYER -- AND YOU ARE NOW GOD YOURSELF AS YOU ( SOUL ) MATCHES THE\nMOTHER FIELDS HIGHEST FREQUENCY -NEVER TO BE RE-INDUCTED AGAIN BACK ON PLANET\nEARTH<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 3-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. THE INSTANT THIS FEEDBACK STOPS THERE WILL BE PRALAYA. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSOULS GIVE FEED BACK TO BRAHMAN ABOUT THEIR EXPERIENCES ON\nEARTH--BRAHMAN KNOWS EVERYTHING<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nNON-MOKSHA EVOLVING SOULS AREPARKED IN ONE OF THE SIX LOWER\nASTAL LAYERS , AWAITING RE-INDUCTION .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nONCE YOU BECOME A HUMAN AND YOUR SOUL IS PARKED IN ASTRAL\nLAYERS TWO TO SIX\u2014YOU WILL NOT BE RE-INDUCTED AS A LOWER FORM OF LIFE LIKE\nANIMAL.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE SECOND ASTRAL LAYER MEANT FOR SOULS WITH LOWEST\nFREQUENCY ( HIGH NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE ) AND THE SIXTH ASTRAL HAVING PARKING\nSPACE FOR SOULS OF HIGHER FREQUENCY ( LOW NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYAMA IS IN CHARGE OF LAYERS TWO TO SIX..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL SOULS IN FIRST TO SIXTH ASTRAL LAYERS --AWAIT RE-BIRTH.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nONLY SOULS CAN ENTER ALL SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS --NOT THE\nPHYSICAL BODY ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN THE 5 PANDAVA BROTHERS AND DRAUPADI DECIDE TO CLIMB\nMOUNT MERU --IT IS AN ALLEGORY FOR DEATH AND SOULS PARKING AT ONE OF THE SEVEN\nASTRAL LAYERS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYAMA ( DHARMA ) IN THE FORM OF A DOG JOINS THIS GROUP ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYAMA USHERS IN --<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nDRAUPADI INTO THE SECOND ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nNAKULA INTO THE THIRD ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSAHADEVA INTO THE FOURTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBHIMA INTO THE FIFTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nARJUNA INTO THE SIXTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAND THEN YUDHISTRA LOOKS BACK AND SEES THE DOG.. HE KNOWS\nTHAT NO DOG CAN GET PAST THE FIRST ASTRAL LAYER --AND HE IS PUZZLED..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE DOG REPRESENTED DHARMA ( YAMA ) \u2014 YUDHISHTRA WAS \u201cSON OF\nDHARMA \u201c..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAT THE SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER ( EQUIVALENT OF HEAVEN )\nYUDDHISTRA SEES ALL HUNDRED KAURAVAS ALREADY THERE -- ALONG WITH THE STALWARTS\nLIKE BHISHMA/ DRONA /KARNA ETC<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nHE IS SHOCKED AND ANGRY<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAT THAT TIME YAMA ( THE DOORKEEPER OF ASTRAL LAYERS 2 TO 6 )\nDECLARES THAT HE IS YUDDHISTRAs FATHER WITH KUNTI .. AND THAT YUDDHISTRA STILL\nHAS SEEDS OF EGO WITHIN HIMS WHICH MAKES HIM UNFIT FOR MOKSHA ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYAMAs EXPLANATION: WHOEVER KRISHNA KILLED --ALL GOT MOKSHA\n.. KRISHNA HAD THE UNWRITTEN TASK OF KILLING ALL 100 TEST TUBE KAURAVA BABIES--\nHE DID IT AND HOW..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPANDAVAS WOULD HAVE HAD ALBINO BLOOD OF MOTHER KUNTI HAS SEX\nWITH PANDU ( AN ALBINO )--AND IN THAT CASE KRISHNA WOULD HAVE KILLED ALL 5\nPANDAVAS TOO..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAFTER READING THE MAHABHARATA EPIC -- ALL WONDERED WHY\nKRISHNA PLAYED FOUL--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIF YOU REALLY LOOK AT IT DISPASSIONATELY -- HE GAVE ALL 100\nTEST TUBE BABIES MOKSHA-- THE ULTIMATE GIFT FROM VISHNUs AVATAR ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCHANGE IS THE ONLY CONSTANT\u2014 BRAHMAN DOES NOT ALLOW\nSTAGNATION.. IN SANATANA DHARMA THERE ARE NO CIRCLES\u2014ONLY SPIRALS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nHUMANS WHO ARE NOT CRIMINALS AND HOMOSEXUALS ON DEATH\n--THEIR SOULS GET PARKED ON SECOND TO SIXTH LAYER. YAMA IS IN CHARGE --HE\nDECIDES BASED ON KARMIC BAGGAGE .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHERE IS NO PERMANENT HEAVEN OR HELL IN HINDUSIM. THE FIRST\nASTRAL LAYER IS A SEMI TEMPORARY HELL --THE POPE STOLE THIS IDEA AS\n\"PURGATORY\"<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nREMEMBER DOING PUJA , VISITING TEMPLES , DOING SHRADDH FOR\nANCESTORS , DIPPING IN GANGES -- IS ALL TO PUT YOU IN A MENTAL FRAMEWORK OF\n\"GRATITUDE\"<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIT IS THE LAWS OF KARMA THAT COMPELS HINDUS TO BEHAVE\nRIGHTEOUSLY AS PER THE UNIVERSAL MORAL ORDER OR LAWS OF DHARMA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE HINDU KNOWS THAT KARMA IS IN HIS OWN HANDS .. THIS IS\nWHY A HINDU IS THE SAME OUTSIDE DOORS AND WITHIN DOORS.. A HINDU WOMAN DOES NOT\nNEED TO CONFESS IN CHURCH TO A STRANGER MALE SEXUAL PREDATOR.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE RASCAL SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV TOLD ON NDTV THAT MEN CAN\nHAVE ANAL SEX BEHIND CLOSED DOORS.. MODI GAVE THIS FAKE GURU A PADMA\nVIBHUSHAN..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 4--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. HAVE YOU HEARD THE VOICE OF\nTHIS PATHETIC FELLOW-- HAVE YOU SEEN HIS FINGERS ? MODI GAVE HIM TOO A PADMA\nVIBHUSHAN..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMOKSHA IS PURELY KARMA BASED. THERE IS NO SHORT CUT OR\nJUGAAD POSSIBLE-- LIKE ROTHSCHILDs CREATION BABAJI ( OR SOME RASCAL LIKE SRI\nSRI RAVISHANKAR ) GIVING YOU DEEKSHA .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nREMEMBER WE ARE ALL IMMORTAL. WE ALL WERE BORN WITH THE\nSTARS .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOU , YOUR GREAT GRANDFATHER AND YOU WOULD BE GREAT GRANDSON\nWERE ALL BORN AT THE SAME SPLIT SECOND.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nVISHNU AVATARS WERE NOT BORN WITH THE STARS LIKE YOU AND ME\n. THEIR SOULS WERE CREATED AND SENT DOWN FOR A PURPOSE ON EARTH.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAFTER THEIR MISSION ON EARTH WAS OVER , THEIR SOULS MERGED\nBACK TO BRAHMAN ON SEVENTH ASTRA LAYER ( VAIKUNTA ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIT IS IMPOSSIBLE FOR CON-MEN TO CLAIM THAT THEY ARE\nDESCENDANTS OF RAMA OR KRISHNA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL MORTALS ON EARTH LIKE YOU AND ME --WERE BORN WITH THE\nSTARS--THE SAME SPLIT SECOND<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS MEANS YOUR GREAT GRANDFATHER, YOU AND YOUR GREATGRANSON\nWAS BORN AT THE SAME SPILT SECOND.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWE WERE ALL PART OF THE MOTHER FIELD NAMED BRAHMAN ON THE\nSEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS IS WHY HINDUS DO NAMASTE\u2014WE HONOUR THE PIECE OF BRAHMAN\nWITHIN THE OTHER PERSON.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE GOD OF SANATANA DHARMA IS A \"MORHOGENETEIC\nCONSCIOUSNESS FIELD- BRAHMAN \" WHICH CANNOT HE PICKED UP BY THE 5\nSENSES--ON MICRO AND MACRO SCALE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nON MICRO SCALE THIS EMPTY SPACE ( INTELLIGENT FIELD )\nPROVIDES PERPETUAL MOTION WITHIN AN ATOM.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/perpetual-motion-of-orbiting-electrons.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nON MACRO SCALE IT IS AKASHA ( ETHER ) WHERE THE ENTIRE\nCOSMOS HOLDS THEIR POSITIONS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIn Dvaita Hinduism opposite poles Tamas and Rajas are\nconscious of each other. Tamas creates Rajas, and Rajas activates/ excites\nTamas. Sattva preserves and mediates .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n7000 year old Vedas say that the only constant in the cosmos\nis change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static-- everything is\nvibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. It is a cosmic\nspiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nOne cannot exist without the other and they are dependant .\nNo phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They\nconsume each other yet support each other.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIf the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost by the\nmediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will spiral out of control and end. This is\nwhy Lord Vishnu is called the PRESERVER god. And only Vishnu can have mortal\navatars.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAs for the opposing forces TAMAS/ RAJAS ( Brahma/ Shiva ) it\nreally does NOT matter as who is who, like in AC electricity-where you can plug\ninto the socket both ways.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThese two opposing forces are natural and transform each\nother , in perfect harmony. Harmony can never be stagnant . Lessening of Tamas\nalways results in increase of Rajas and vice versa.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBalance can never be permanent\u2014 Tamas and Rajas continiously\ndevour each other \u2013 and life flows on. This universe cannot exist without\nvibrations between two poles.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE THIRD TEMPLATE IS SAMKHYA<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 5-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. Ajit VadakayilAugust 13, 2018 at 7:48 AM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED FROM 4--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThis is about the male and female joint TEAM effort. This is\nNOT a dance of opposites. In Hinduism we call the MALE- purusha and FEMALE-\nprakriti.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIn the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as\nbeing created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are\npermanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal\naspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti (Prakriti ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nEach of the trinity gods are powerless without their\nconsorts.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPurusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the\nsame body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a\nmindboggling, intelligent concept.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBoth Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness---- Shiva is the\nchangeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active\naspect of the same Consciousness.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThrough uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his\nspirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS\nhere- not street side sex as figured out by small minds)<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhen the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the\nsentient Purusha , the universe evolves.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPurusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle.\nPragati symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. The\nrelationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and\nenergy<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPrakriti cannot be perceived, not because of its\nnon-existence, but because of its subtlety. It is perceived in its effects.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe eternal and indestructible union between Shiva and\nShakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well\nas in its dynamic one. Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also\nthe agent of all change<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nShakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is\nwithdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the perceptive.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nModern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy\nare interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSamkhya as you can see was a masterpiece of modeling the\nways of the inner universe.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe union of Shakti with Shiva by Kundalini rise is the\nliberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nDO YOU THINK IDIOTS LIKE SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR AND SADGURU\nJAGGI VASUDEV CAN EVER UNDERSTAND THIS\u2014THEIR PADMA VIBHUSHAN MINDS ARE TOO\nSMALL AND THINKING PROCESS TOO PETTY<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nREAD ALL 102 PARTS OF THE UNFINISHED POST BELOW-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; I read on the Net that North India follows Purnimant calendar while South follows Amavasyant calender. So in Rajasthan the holy month of Shravan began on July 28 while it began on 12th August in Maharashtra. Is this difference poison injected or is it due to difference in latitudes? The thing to be noted was that there was no mention of Kerala for Shravan Maas. Does Kerala not have a Shravan Maas ?<br />My Marathi roommate said that first they have Shraadh paksh and then Shravan begins a day after Amavasya. After Shravan ends Ganpati begins for 11 days. Ajit Vadakayil<br />August 15, 2018 at 3:09 PM<br /><br />Amavasya is no moon day and Purnima is full moon day in Hindu calendars..<br /><br />Hindu calendars are standardized in the Surya Siddhanta written by Maya Danava ( who built the Palace of Pandavas at Indraprasta ) and subsequently endorsed by astronomers such as Aryabha\u1e6d\u1e6da ( 2700 BC ) and Varahamihira 2660 BC ) .<br /><br />The Hindu Calendar follows the lunar month and Amavasya, the new moon night, falls at the beginning of new lunar month which lasts for about 30 days.<br /><br />Amavasyanta or mukhya mana system \u2013 a month begins with a new moon and ends at new moon, followed in the southern states . Therefore Amavasya falls on the last day of the lunar month ..<br /><br />Pur\u1e47imanta or gauna mana system \u2013 a month begins with a full moon and ends at full moon, followed in the North \u2013 injected by Jew Rothschild to wedge apart Indentured labour from Indian culture... Therefore Amavasya falls in the middle of the month.<br /><br />The lunar months are split into two Pak\u1e63as of 15 days. The waxing paksha is called Shukla Pak\u1e63a, light half, and the waning paksha the Krish\u1e47a Pak\u1e63a, dark half.<br /><br />Every month, the Amavasya day is considered auspicious for the shraddh of forefathers . In ancient India Amavasya was a holiday. Sunday holiday came with the Christian white invader.<br /><br />Amavasya day was a day for home rest rest, fasting , silence vrat and contemplation.<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/amavasya-poornima-ekadashi-fasting.html<br /><br />capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-e03zaqZNs6Y/WAxgd6fyXVI/AAAAAAABNDE/J8NEveQt88cHX9Ta4Nh1kBWdhcoDquH2QCLcB/s1600/20161023_112210_resized.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-e03zaqZNs6Y/WAxgd6fyXVI/AAAAAAABNDE/J8NEveQt88cHX9Ta4Nh1kBWdhcoDquH2QCLcB/s640/20161023_112210_resized.jpg\" width=\"450\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "267", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/2066160417619463587/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "3177111028832460094", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2016-10-19T01:21:00+05:30", "updated": "2016-11-21T09:55:16+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDc5NzAyMzE2MTg1Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice_19.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/3177111028832460094", "title": "Justice cannot be blind , NATURAL JUSTICE shall be inherent , CONTEXT shall be the perimeter, PART SIX \u2013 Capt Ajit Vadakayil", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3a1CVDBYTNg/WDJ3H3FJxGI/AAAAAAABPPc/L8DsEjjjgtIg-jXrCQxAvQx7MXtFnQ90gCLcB/s1600/IMG-20161120-WA0016.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3a1CVDBYTNg/WDJ3H3FJxGI/AAAAAAABPPc/L8DsEjjjgtIg-jXrCQxAvQx7MXtFnQ90gCLcB/s640/IMG-20161120-WA0016.jpg\" width=\"520\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 5 , BELOW--</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice_15.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice_15.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">########## LOADED QUESTION</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SInAlPUJD88/WAaC_mSgiHI/AAAAAAABM90/D-eTvZUEvyMK5LdkcMSoF9vdWVKNEyq2wCLcB/s1600/imagges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SInAlPUJD88/WAaC_mSgiHI/AAAAAAABM90/D-eTvZUEvyMK5LdkcMSoF9vdWVKNEyq2wCLcB/s400/imagges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Loaded statements are\nlike icebergs: There's a little portion that you see, and a much larger portion\nthat lurks below the surface.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They typically carry associated meaning that's\ntied to issues of larger importance, but because they're delivered in an\ninstant, the true import of such statements can sometimes be overlooked.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You\nsay something that will enflame passions in people, either positive or\nnegative, and could also have a double meaning or a hidden meaning.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A loaded question or\ncomplex question fallacy is a question that contains a controversial or\nunjustified assumption (e.g., a presumption of guilt)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;A loaded question is a question with a false\nor questionable presupposition, and it is \"loaded\" with that\npresumption. \"Have you stopped snorting drugs?\" is a loaded question\nas it assumes you have been snorting drugs prior to it's asking, as well as\nassuming you have cocaine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A loaded question is a\nlogical fallacy that occurs when statements or questions are designed to\nconfuse listeners into tacitly accepting something (which isn't obviously clear\nin the question) as true.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A common way out of\nthis argument is not to answer the question (e.g. with a simple 'yes' or 'no'),\nbut to challenge the assumption behind the question.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A good response to the\nquestion \"Have you stopped beating your wife?\" would be \"I have\nnever beaten my wife\" .&nbsp; &nbsp;This removes the ambiguity of the expected\nresponse, therefore nullifying the tactic.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, the askers of said\nquestions have learned to get around this tactic by accusing the one who\nanswers of dodging the question.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Loaded language is more\ngeneric because any words can be redefined for any reason, to support any\nagenda, and to mask any activity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_14TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_9B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; It provides fuel for energy and building blocks for renewal of cells.<br />\n<br />\nEach of our cells have separate, specialised compartments. The lysosomes contain the enzymes needed to digest the contents of the cell such as proteins and organelles. Organelles are parts of the cells containing enzymes that digest proteins, carbohydrates and lipids.<br />\n<br />\nA type of vesicle or sac, called autophagosome, forms and 'eats' these contents before combining with the lysosome to degrade them into smaller pieces. This gives the cells nutrients to help it renew.<br />\n<br />\nCells use autophagy to get rid of damaged proteins and organelles, a so-called \"quality control mechanism\" necessary to counteract the negative effects of ageing on the body.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">IN ANCIENT INDIA SUNDAY WAS NOT A HOLIDAY.
