, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dogmatic religious\nsects with bizarre beliefs are notorious for using this logical fallacy. When\nyou present a true believer member of&nbsp;\nsingle holy book, single messiah Abrahamic religions with facts that\ncontradict his beliefs, he answers, \"Well, what we believe is...\",\nand that is supposed to be the end of the argument \u2014 the final answer on the\nsubject. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fact that they\nbelieve something supposedly makes contradictory facts irrelevant and invalid \u2014\ncontradictory facts are just minor irritants to be ignored and discarded<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;It always makes sense to ask \u201cWhose opinion is\nit?\u201d but never \u201cWhose fact is it?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n.<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-CWohvjYUwxM/WAOHnsUAlII/AAAAAAABM6M/U4w2aGI1PdA4OHI8FSk9vOI8fGkeliTBACLcB/s1600/imaRRges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"248\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-CWohvjYUwxM/WAOHnsUAlII/AAAAAAABM6M/U4w2aGI1PdA4OHI8FSk9vOI8fGkeliTBACLcB/s400/imaRRges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n.<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A fact is a statement\nthat can be proven true.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An opinion expresses\nsomeone\u2019s belief, feeling, view, idea, or judgment about something or someone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Having faith in\nsomething means no proof is required.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nThis is often the case when it comes to religious views. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In fact, the nature of\nreligion is based on the fact that no proofs are required. Sanatana Dharma is\nNOT a religion as dogma is kept out.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dMzL9Yv7m_I/WAOHeAoz9HI/AAAAAAABM6I/RpD7R1XPiE0Exd-lP8JouPZG3E6gBY8IQCLcB/s1600/iDDEmages.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dMzL9Yv7m_I/WAOHeAoz9HI/AAAAAAABM6I/RpD7R1XPiE0Exd-lP8JouPZG3E6gBY8IQCLcB/s400/iDDEmages.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Religion covers ideas\nand topics that are beyond the ability of human perceptions or understanding.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beliefs shape the facts\nwe listen to and the stories we tell about them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Debating facts and\nstories is futile when people\u2019s underlying beliefs are misaligned. Once beliefs\nare called into the open, productive dialog can commence. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When beliefs are\ndiscussed deliberately and openly, they lose their hold on the group.&nbsp;&nbsp; Once beliefs are revealed, the group will\nnaturally engage in a more productive discussion about facts and stories.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n.<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-heCGtXredCg/WAOgtlACqzI/AAAAAAABM6c/9hILZrba-5cgrh2QOUiGqHBtjJxxR5pfQCLcB/s1600/im89ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"257\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-heCGtXredCg/WAOgtlACqzI/AAAAAAABM6c/9hILZrba-5cgrh2QOUiGqHBtjJxxR5pfQCLcB/s400/im89ages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">##############\nSUBSTITUTE FEELINGS FOR FACTS </b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Declare that you feel\nthat something is true, and act like that is supporting evidence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5BLPw27p66Y/WAOnc64BdjI/AAAAAAABM6s/foBZoqffOss3P3wWTA_OXmBEh1kRkYFXgCLcB/s1600/downl93oad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5BLPw27p66Y/WAOnc64BdjI/AAAAAAABM6s/foBZoqffOss3P3wWTA_OXmBEh1kRkYFXgCLcB/s400/downl93oad.jpg\" width=\"284\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A psychiatrist had this\nto say-- &nbsp;&nbsp;<i>A patient recently told me she felt unloved.&nbsp; She blamed her husband for not doing enough\nto demonstrate his love for her and said she was having doubts about whether or\nnot to stay in the marriage.&nbsp; I asked her\nhow long she'd been feeling this way.&nbsp;\n\"Not long,\" she told me.&nbsp;\n\"Maybe a week.\"&nbsp; I asked\nher what had changed about her husband's behavior over the past week.&nbsp; She was not able to identify a single thing\nher husband was doing differently than he'd been doing when she did feel loved.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HORMONES OF WOMEN PLAY\nUP DIFFERENTLY EVERY DAY.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SWEET\nPURSUIT OF LOVE CAN SUDDENLY BECOME&nbsp;\nDIABOLIC STALKING<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Zey3sRzI44w/WAOpXK5603I/AAAAAAABM64/XXMaCnIWgR8Zu1Lb7VTnzjcDp-KVkc4ywCLcB/s1600/imhages.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Zey3sRzI44w/WAOpXK5603I/AAAAAAABM64/XXMaCnIWgR8Zu1Lb7VTnzjcDp-KVkc4ywCLcB/s640/imhages.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Facts are truths that\ndon\u2019t change, stand up to scrutiny, and are widely understood.&nbsp; &nbsp;Emotions are feelings which are transient,\noften don\u2019t stand up to reasoning, and differ from person to person.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you are upset,\nstop and ask yourself if you are acting on emotion, or fact. A cooling off\nperiod will often shed light on the situation.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Most of all, beware making major life decisions based on emotions rather\nthan fact.&nbsp; When we treat feelings as\nfacts, we use those feelings to selectively look for facts to back us up.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\u2019s important to\nseparate feelings from facts.&nbsp;&nbsp; Everyone\nhas times of feeling hopeless or unloved or not good enough \u2013 it is only a\nfeeling and feelings pass. They are not facts to define ourselves by.&nbsp; Try and look at the facts rather than be\nswept along by your feelings. Feelings change all the time.<span style=\"background: aqua; mso-highlight: aqua;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a mindset in\nworking with people who are suicidal. They feel that their lives are worthless\nand that things will never get better, and because they feel that way, they\nassume it must be so.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-esEujEhPvlA/WAOq9MT-nPI/AAAAAAABM7E/6jNWqg2HG6cEifHNT6Lhg8vOtO3Z5wZGgCLcB/s1600/imae7ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"318\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-esEujEhPvlA/WAOq9MT-nPI/AAAAAAABM7E/6jNWqg2HG6cEifHNT6Lhg8vOtO3Z5wZGgCLcB/s320/imae7ges.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every day we make\ndecisions based on what we think is right or true. Our very opinions arise from\nour absorption and&nbsp; understanding of\ncertain \u201cfacts\u201d we encounter. &nbsp;Over days\nand years, information can define us \u2013 our beliefs, our preferences,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A common error we see\npea brained women make in relationships and other areas of life is mistaking\nemotions as facts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ideally, facts should\nbe acceptable, incontestable - the very essence of truth. &nbsp;Facts should be clear, easily seen, not\nsubject to further debate.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Yet, information does not break down into neat\nlittle columns of true or false: for any given piece of information there can\nbe plenty of area for disagreement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Feelings are not bad\nthings. Our emotions are central to our humanity. When we get our facts correct\nand integrate them appropriately with our feelings, our actions can help\nwonderful things happen in our personal, professional, and civic lives.&nbsp; &nbsp;But\nwhen we act on feelings alone, as if they are facts, we have only half of what\nwe need to build good lives and strong societies.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DpHaslvxyOw/WAOrzXAaY1I/AAAAAAABM7I/D5pPjI8XmKwqBLewE2RiJkNkfaVPXM7bgCLcB/s1600/im74ages.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"200\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DpHaslvxyOw/WAOrzXAaY1I/AAAAAAABM7I/D5pPjI8XmKwqBLewE2RiJkNkfaVPXM7bgCLcB/s320/im74ages.png\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just because you feel\nlike you can\u2019t, like you\u2019re a loser, like life is too overwhelming\u2013doesn\u2019t mean\nthat this is the truth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is called\nemotional reasoning and it goes something like this: \"I feel unloved;\ntherefore, I must not be getting enough love from my husband.\"&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another example:\n\"I feel anxious and worried; therefore, something must be\nwrong.\"&nbsp; Yet another example:\n\"I feel sad/depressed; therefore, something must be wrong with or missing\nin my life.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now any of these\nstatements might be true.&nbsp; However,\nfeeling a particular way is not enough evidence for us to draw any conclusions\none way or another.&nbsp; We need more\ninformation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Feelings are not\nfacts.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Emotions are a valuable\nsource of information but they should never be the only source of\ninformation.&nbsp; This is particularly true\nwith those emotions that have been problematic for us in the past.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Accepting feelings as\nfacts can create a lot of problems.&nbsp; To\nreally make good decisions you need a good balance of reason and emotion.&nbsp; In other words, when your head and your heart\nare in agreement you know you are on the right path.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Truth is subjective,\nnot objective.. \u201cTruth\u201d as we typically talk about it, is perspective.&nbsp; We lose sight of that all too easily. We\nforget to separate feelings from facts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Cf4wueclQ74/WAOskMKndoI/AAAAAAABM7Q/sZduYjYaLe0iQkkx2Cjn70zv1sDLdc-rQCLcB/s1600/imageds.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Cf4wueclQ74/WAOskMKndoI/AAAAAAABM7Q/sZduYjYaLe0iQkkx2Cjn70zv1sDLdc-rQCLcB/s1600/imageds.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">##############\nCONFUSING ABSTRACTIONS WITH&nbsp; REALITY</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NEVER LET MAP RULE OVER\nTHE TERRAIN\u2014ONLY CHOOTS DO THAT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The territory is the\nreal land; the map is an abstraction drawn on a piece of paper.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/country-size-racist-conspiracy-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/country-size-racist-conspiracy-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We humans are very good\nat making abstractions to reduce big complex things to small manageable simple\nideas.&nbsp;&nbsp; Unfortunately, we are prone to\nmaking the error of confusing our abstractions with the actual thing that they\nrepresent.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n.<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-DZPT5s08m5U/WAPKQPreIxI/AAAAAAABM7g/VcnTaQ27QWUdur218Kcy7JEEMqw0AsaogCLcB/s1600/downJload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-DZPT5s08m5U/WAPKQPreIxI/AAAAAAABM7g/VcnTaQ27QWUdur218Kcy7JEEMqw0AsaogCLcB/s400/downJload.jpg\" width=\"310\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The abstract modeling\nabilities of our brain are incredible and incredibly useful. The danger comes\nwhen we fail to recognize our models as models, and instead confuse them with\nreality. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We believe we have\ndiscovered, when in fact we have actually invented an abstraction. It's not\nwrong to invent or use abstractions, but it is wrong to treat inventions as\ndiscoveries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n.<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-m3OiTTM--w4/WAPKVlCtVYI/AAAAAAABM7k/tmLVWBG0PHgup70h3Ev8Vqn3etTJb80LgCLcB/s1600/dow8Gnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"358\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-m3OiTTM--w4/WAPKVlCtVYI/AAAAAAABM7k/tmLVWBG0PHgup70h3Ev8Vqn3etTJb80LgCLcB/s640/dow8Gnload.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Someone sells you an axe\nonce owned by George Washington. &nbsp;&nbsp;Later,\nyou discover that in the last two centuries, the handle has been replaced\ntwice, and the blade three times. &nbsp;Is it\nstill the same axe? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Abstractions are the\nquality of dealing with ideas rather than events.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n.<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-NLNqBmJwCz0/WAPNjp5FkRI/AAAAAAABM7w/WJRD7f-LQL0T2QhaxAV-XJWXQnnq4y4xwCLcB/s1600/dowdfnload.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-NLNqBmJwCz0/WAPNjp5FkRI/AAAAAAABM7w/WJRD7f-LQL0T2QhaxAV-XJWXQnnq4y4xwCLcB/s640/dowdfnload.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nDIGRESSION:<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nSOMEONE ASKED ME -<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCAPTAIN ARE YOU GIVING HAJAAAAR BULL ABOUT <b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">A1 TOXIC MILK OF HUMPLESS COWS</b> AND <span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><b>VAASTU TELLURIC HOT SPOTS</b></span> AFFECTING REM SLEEP.<br />\n<br />\nWELL, WELL-- &nbsp;I AM NOT IN THE HABIT OF TELLING LIES .<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nI AM NOT IN THE HABIT OF DISHING OUT PROOF TO STUPID NON-BELIEVERS<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; I just found out this leaked Rothschild's message to others of his kind.<br />\n<br />\nMr. Rothschild Says:<br />\n\u201cAn illusion it will be, so large, so vast it will escape their perception. Those<br />\nwho will see it will be thought of as insane. We will create separate fronts to<br />\nprevent them from seeing the connection between us. We will behave as if we are<br />\nnot connected to keep the illusion alive.<br />\n<br />\nOur goal<br />\nwill be accomplished one drop at a time so as to never bring suspicion upon<br />\nourselves. This will also prevent them from seeing the changes as they occur.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cWe will<br />\nalways stand above the relative field of their experience for we know the<br />\nsecrets of the absolute. We will work together always and will remain bound by<br />\nblood and secrecy. Death will come to he who speaks.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cWe will<br />\nkeep their lifespan short and their minds weak while pretending to do the<br />\nopposite. We will use our knowledge of science and technology in subtle ways so<br />\nthey will never see what is happening.<br />\n<br />\nWe will use<br />\nsoft metals, aging accelerators and sedatives in food and water, also in the<br />\nair. They will be blanketed by poisons everywhere they turn. The soft metals<br />\nwill cause them to lose their minds. We will promise to find a cure from our<br />\nmany fronts, yet we will feed them more poison.<br />\n<br />\nThe poisons<br />\nwill be absorbed through their skin and mouths, they will destroy their minds<br />\nand reproductive systems. From all this, their children will be born dead, and<br />\nwe will conceal this information. The poisons will be hidden in everything that<br />\nsurrounds them, in what they drink, eat, breathe and wear.<br />\n<br />\nWe must be<br />\ningenious in dispensing the poisons for they can see far. We will teach them<br />\nthat the poisons are good, with fun images and musical tones. Those they look<br />\nup to will help. We will enlist them to push our poisons.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cThey will<br />\nsee our products being used in film and will grow accustomed to them and will<br />\nnever know their true effect. When they give birth we will inject poisons into<br />\nthe blood of their children and convince them its for their help. We will start<br />\nearly on, when their minds are young, we will target their children with what<br />\nchildren love most, sweet things.<br />\n<br />\nWhen their<br />\nteeth decay we will fill them with metals that will kill their mind and steal<br />\ntheir future. When their ability to learn has been affected, we will create<br />\nmedicine that will make them sicker and cause other diseases for which we will<br />\ncreate yet more medicine. We will render them docile and weak before us by our<br />\npower. They will grow depressed, slow and obese, and when they come to us for<br />\nhelp, we will give them more poison.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cWe will<br />\nfocus their attention toward money and material goods so they many never<br />\nconnect with their inner self. We will distract them with fornication, external<br />\npleasures and games so they may never be one with the oneness of it all. Their<br />\nminds will belong to us and they will do as we say.<br />\n<br />\nIf they<br />\nrefuse we shall find ways to implement mind-altering technology into their<br />\nlives. We will use fear as our weapon. We will establish their governments and<br />\nestablish opposites within.<br />\n<br />\nWe will own<br />\nboth sides.<br />\n<br />\nWe will<br />\nalways hide our objective but carry out our plan. They will perform the labor<br />\nfor us and we shall prosper from their toil.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cOur<br />\nfamilies will never mix with theirs. Our blood must be pure always, for it is<br />\nthe way.<br />\n<br />\nWe will<br />\nmake them kill each other when it suits us. We will keep them separated from<br />\nthe oneness by dogma and religion. We will control all aspects of their lives<br />\nand tell them what to think and how. (Contd.)</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_107BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_107B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_108B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c59326725065837829\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_108M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/00522324215317108756\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Samurai Jack</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice_15.html?showComment=1476646439882#c59326725065837829\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">October 17, 2016 at 1:03 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_108MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n(Contd.) We will<br />\nguide them kindly and gently letting them think they are guiding themselves. We<br />\nwill foment animosity between them through our factions. When a light shall<br />\nshine among them, we shall extinguish it by ridicule, or death, whichever suits<br />\nus best. We will make them rip each other\u2019s hearts apart and kill their own<br />\nchildren. We will accomplish this by using hate as our ally, anger as our<br />\nfriend. The hate will blind them totally, and never shall they see that from<br />\ntheir conflicts we emerge as their rulers. They will be busy killing each<br />\nother. They will bathe in their own blood and kill their neighbors for as long<br />\nas we see fit.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cWe will<br />\nbenefit greatly from this, for they will not see us, for they cannot see us. We<br />\nwill continue to prosper from their wars and their deaths.<br />\n<br />\nWe shall<br />\nrepeat this over and over until our ultimate goal is accomplished.<br />\n<br />\nWe will<br />\ncontinue to make them live in fear and anger though images and sounds. We will<br />\nuse all the tools we have to accomplish this. The tools will be provided by<br />\ntheir labor. We will make them hate themselves and their neighbors.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cWe will<br />\nalways hide the divine truth from them, that we are all one. This they must<br />\nnever know!<br />\n<br />\nThey must<br />\nnever know that color is an illusion, they must always think they are not<br />\nequal. Drop by drop, drop by drop we will advance our goal. We will take over<br />\ntheir land, resources and wealth to exercise total control over them.<br />\n<br />\nWe will<br />\ndeceive them into accepting laws that will steal the little freedom they will<br />\nhave. We will establish a money system that will imprison them forever, keeping<br />\nthem and their children in debt.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cWhen they<br />\nshall ban together, we shall accuse them of crimes and present a different<br />\nstory to the world for we shall own all the media.<br />\n<br />\nWe will use<br />\nour media to control the flow of information and their sentiment in our favor.<br />\nWhen they shall rise up against us we will crush them like insects, for they<br />\nare less than that. They will be helpless to do anything for they will have no<br />\nweapons.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cWe will<br />\nrecruit some of their own to carry out our plans, we will promise them eternal<br />\nlife, but eternal life they will never have for they are not of us. The<br />\nrecruits will be called \u201cinitiates\u201d and will be indoctrinated to believe false<br />\nrites of passage to higher realms. Members of these groups will think they are<br />\none with us never knowing the truth.<br />\n<br />\nThey must<br />\nnever learn this truth for they will turn against us.<br />\n<br />\nFor their<br />\nwork they will be rewarded with earthly things and great titles, but never will<br />\nthey become immortal and join us, never will they receive the light and travel<br />\nthe stars. They will never reach the higher realms, for the killing of their<br />\nown kind will prevent passage to the realm of enlightenment.<br />\n<br />\nThis they<br />\nwill never know. The truth will be hidden in their face, so close they will not<br />\nbe able to focus on it until its too late. Oh yes, so grand the illusion of<br />\nfreedom will be, that they will never know they are our slaves.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cWhen all<br />\nis in place, the reality we will have created for them will own them. This<br />\nreality will be their prison. They will live in self-delusion. When our goal is<br />\naccomplished a new era of domination will begin. Their minds will be bound by<br />\ntheir beliefs, the beliefs we have established from time immemorial.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cBut if<br />\nthey ever find out they are our equal, we shall perish then. THIS THEY MUST<br />\nNEVER KNOW.<br />\n<br />\nIf they<br />\never find out that together they can vanquish us, they will take action.<br />\n<br />\nThey must<br />\nnever, ever find out what we have done, for if they do, we shall have no place<br />\nto run, for it will be easy to see who we are once the veil has fallen. Our<br />\nactions will have revealed who we are and they will hunt us down and no person<br />\nshall give us shelter.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cThis is<br />\nthe secret covenant by which we shall live the rest of our present and future<br />\nlives, for this reality will transcend many generations and life spans.<br />\n<br />\nThis<br />\ncovenant is sealed by blood, our blood. We, the ones who from heaven to earth<br />\ncame.\u201d<br />\n<br />\n\u201cThis<br />\ncovenant must NEVER, EVER be known to exist. (Contd.)</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_108BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_108B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_109B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5528821815994570429\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_109M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/00522324215317108756\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Samurai Jack</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice_15.html?showComment=1476646461873#c5528821815994570429\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">October 17, 2016 at 1:04 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_109MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n(Contd.) text-decoration: none;\">October 17, 2016 at 3:16 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_84MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nin ancient days AUPASANA fires were maintained<br />\n<br />\nThe son lights his aupasana fire during his marriage from his father's aupasana fire.<br />\n<br />\nThe son's fire, like his father's, must be maintained throughout his life.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">BHISHMAs AUPASANA FIRE IS WHAT IS SHOWN AS THREE FLASHES AT SABARIMALA</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">AMBA JUMPED INTO THIS FIRE</span></b><br />\n<br />\nWELL WELL , WHAT DO YOU KNOW<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">PARSIS CAME WITH THE AUPASANA FIRE OF SHUKRACHARYA TO INDIA</span></b><br />\n<br />\nIN THE MOVIE DEVDAS , AISHWARYA RAI MAINTAINS ARE AUPASANA FIRE-- THIS FIRE CANNOT BELONG TO SHAH RUKH KHAN --AS HE IS NOT MARRIED<br />\n<br />\nBOLLYWOOD WITH CRYPTO JEW ISLAMIC INVASION HAS BROKEN EVERY ANCIENT RITE OF HINDUS<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />AUPASANA FIRE HOMAM IS DONE BY HUSBAND AND WIFE TOGETHER EVERY SINGLE DAY-- &nbsp;THIS CONTINUING FIRE WITNESSED THEIR MARRIAGE --THEY HAD GONE AROUND IT.</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />WHEN THE HUSBAND IS AWAY THE WIFE DOES THIS AUPASANA RITUAL ALONE USING AKSHATA RICE ( HAND POUNDED UNBROKEN GRAIN ) --THE VEDAS REQUIRE IT.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nAUPASANA HOMAM IS THE ONLY HINDU RITE A WOMAN CAN DO ON HER OWN--TWICE A DAY.<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />AUPASANA FIRE KEEPS SOULS PURE. THERE WAS NO WORD CALLED DIVORCE IN THE SANSKRIT DICTIONARY.&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHE GLORY OF SANATANA DHARMA IS BEING SLOWLY EXTINGUISHED -- IN THE NAME OF SUPERSTITION.<br />\n<br />\nTAKING DEADLY CHEMICAL DRUGS FOR MENTAL DEPRESSION AFTER DIVORCE IS CALLED MODERN SCIENCE.<br />\n<br />\nWE HINDUS MUST NOT ALLOW THIS TO HAPPEN.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/sabarimala-makara-vilakku-makara.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWHEN I WROTE MY POST ON KARVA CHAUTH, ALL PICKLE JOHNS AND CHUTNEY MARYs ATTACKED. THIS POST TRENDED ON TWITTER WORLD WIDE.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/10/karva-chauth-synchronising-fertility.html</span><br />\nWILL WANNABE GORA GAANDS EVERY UNDERSTAND THE MEANING OF GRATITUDE?<br />\n<br />\nTHEY ARE NOT EVEN GRATEFUL TO THE WATAN.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedIVBMD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedIVBMD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">############# APPEAL TO\n&nbsp;NUMBERS</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Argumentum ad Numerum\nmaintains that the more people who are convinced about something, the more\nlikely it is to be true, and the more people who do something, the more right\nit is. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This trick is close to\nthe trick of \"Everybody knows\" \u2014 \"Everybody knows that we are\nright.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"He is admired by\nthousands of loyal followers.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Millions of\nbottles sold.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Over 6 million\nbottles sold.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Six million Jews</b> died \u201c<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Fifty million Elvis\nfans can't be wrong\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a court of law, the\njury vote by majority; therefore they will always make the correct decision.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In argumentation\ntheory, an argumentum ad populum (Latin for \"appeal to the people\")\nis a fallacious argument that concludes that a proposition is true because many\nor most people believe it: \"If many believe so, it is so.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-K3PmOG_5fzg/WATH6YegFEI/AAAAAAABM8Q/hN5lISmtq9QbcOhNhdyy0tqNsfJIC1LpwCLcB/s1600/t24h.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-K3PmOG_5fzg/WATH6YegFEI/AAAAAAABM8Q/hN5lISmtq9QbcOhNhdyy0tqNsfJIC1LpwCLcB/s1600/t24h.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">############### APPEAL\nTO AUTHORITY</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cite and quote all\nkinds of authorities to support your statements. Also seem to obtain support\nfrom famous people who are not present to state their actual opinions.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4MorEdx29fU/WATQh0WgeEI/AAAAAAABM8k/oNsawthyfzoPRkDv9ci_V-CDZM46tRXbgCLcB/s1600/E8insteinSB.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"408\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4MorEdx29fU/WATQh0WgeEI/AAAAAAABM8k/oNsawthyfzoPRkDv9ci_V-CDZM46tRXbgCLcB/s640/E8insteinSB.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Using an authority as\nevidence in your argument when the authority is not really an authority on the\nfacts relevant to the argument.&nbsp; As the\naudience, allowing an irrelevant authority to add credibility to the claim\nbeing made.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Herman Melville's\nclassic novel Moby Dick, the crew begged Captain Ahab to stop his suicidal\nmonomaniacal persuit of the white whale. Captain Ahab dismissed the crew's sane\nadvice with the statement:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\"There is one God who is Lord over all\nthe seas, and there is one Captain who is lord over all the Pequod. Now get the\nfuck back to your post.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-oAJPkRdM-Do/WATShf2uWnI/AAAAAAABM8w/VvCpVgw2s2YDk_yGgIuiMA4TvWARp7sUQCLcB/s1600/rahul-sonia-jokDDes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-oAJPkRdM-Do/WATShf2uWnI/AAAAAAABM8w/VvCpVgw2s2YDk_yGgIuiMA4TvWARp7sUQCLcB/s640/rahul-sonia-jokDDes.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Religious proselytizers\nargue, \"Einstein believed in God. Do you think you are smarter than\nEinstein?\"<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Testimonials are\nstatements from, \u201cauthorities\u201d, in the sense that they are said to know about\nwhat they are testifying to.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">############## CITE CREDENTIALS\n</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This trick uses real\ncredentials, titles, ranks, certificates, diplomas, or positions to create the\nappearance that someone is an authority of some kind, and is right.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Degrees and credentials\nare all well and good, but do not necessarily make someone right. Our history\nis full of disasters brought on by people with degrees. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Degrees are not wisdom. &nbsp;Most of the people in government have some kind of credentials, and they still\nmake horrible mistakes and get us into unnecessary wars and economic crises.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5dg7hcL1zRw/WATV_51609I/AAAAAAABM9M/8X5e0WTWnLodEpICokN6TtlJEJid9F2SQCLcB/s640/quote-airsNN-of-importance-are-the-credentials-of-impotence-johann-kaspar-lavater-55-25-04.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some use false or faked\ncredentials, titles, ranks, certificates, diplomas, or positions to create the\nappearance that someone is an authority of some kind when they are not.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The use of fake\ndiplomas from a diploma mill immediately comes to mind. Then the charlatan\nassumes the title of \"Doctor\", and pretends to be a recognized\nauthority on some subject.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-D9nkAVkVF1I/WATV42QAMII/AAAAAAABM9I/z2ucBHRO3rgJGBiY4Fng0wDK9pMlSCK-QCLcB/s1600/quote-government-employees-move-up-the-ladSder-through-educational-credentials-rather-than-james-cook-141-30-19.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-D9nkAVkVF1I/WATV42QAMII/AAAAAAABM9I/z2ucBHRO3rgJGBiY4Fng0wDK9pMlSCK-QCLcB/s640/quote-government-employees-move-up-the-ladSder-through-educational-credentials-rather-than-james-cook-141-30-19.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 6, BELOW-</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n\n\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice_19.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice_19.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-NTMdlQDfYks/WAHQxfCNkQI/AAAAAAABM1Q/px63vvkxn2wwOx6WPq7IGcTEp4fBv9-CACLcB/s1600/a1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
