text-decoration: none;\">October 14, 2016 at 4:08 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_122MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME TO GIVE A WEE TRAILER OF NLP<br />\n<br />\nEVEN NOW ALL ARE WONDERING WHY HILLARY CLINTON WAS SCRATCHING THE RIGHT HAND CORNER OF HER DEBATE DESK WHILE LISTENING TO DONALD TRAMP<br />\n<br />\nWELL IT IS A NLP ANCHORING TECHNIQUE -- BUT HILLARY IS NOT BRIGHT ENOUGH TO EVEN DO IT PROPERLY<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/on-trail-of-truth-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">#################### SCAPEGOATING , BLAMING</b><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vB61J-Lh8PM/WACgCV2ziXI/AAAAAAABMy4/mq6W27Jv7u8X7m6xvCoB5A3x5kx4Q0bSwCLcB/s1600/slifde_17.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vB61J-Lh8PM/WACgCV2ziXI/AAAAAAABMy4/mq6W27Jv7u8X7m6xvCoB5A3x5kx4Q0bSwCLcB/s400/slifde_17.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE SHIP CAPTAIN CANT\nSCAPEGOAT.&nbsp; IF SOMETHING HAPPENS ON HIS\nSHIP- &nbsp;HE IS RESPONSIBLE\u2014 &nbsp;EVEN IF HE WAS HOLDING HIS BALLS AND WAS FAST ASLEEP\nUNDER THE BLANKET.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Scapegoating has been\nused throughout history as a means for people to move blame and responsibility\naway from themselves by attributing it to others (or to an object or event).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A scapegoat is the\nperson or group made to bear the blame for or punished for those errors\ncommitted by others.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Scapegoating is a\npropaganda technique that has been used throughout history as a means for\npeople to move blame and responsibility away from themselves by attributing it\nto others (or to an object or event). &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A\nscapegoat is the person or group made to bear the blame for or punished for\nthose errors committed by others.<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Scapegoating as a group\nnecessitates that ingroup members settle on one specific target to blame for\ntheir problems</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In olden days one\nperson was singled out as the cause of the trouble and was ex-communicated &nbsp;or killed by the group. &nbsp;This person is the scapegoat.&nbsp; &nbsp;Social\norder is restored as people are contented that they have solved the cause of\ntheir problems by removing the scapegoated individual, and the cycle begins\nagain. &nbsp;Scapegoating serves as a\npsychological relief for a group of people.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">When problems occur,\npeople do not like to blame themselves. They will thus actively seek scapegoats\nonto whom we can displace our aggression. These may be out-group individuals or\neven entire groups. Like bullies, we will often pick on powerless people who\ncannot easily resist.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Scapegoating increases\nwhen people are frustrated and seeking an outlet for their anger. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Once cast as a\nscapegoat it can be difficult to shake off the classification.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In some families, one\nfamily member takes on the blame for all or most of the family\u2019s problems; some\nrefer to this person as the \u201cblack sheep.\u201d ( PANWATI )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The person assigning\nblame may enlist the help of others, point to past blameworthy behavior of the\nscapegoat, or engage in abusive treatment of the scapegoat.&nbsp; &nbsp;Governments involved in scapegoating sometimes\nembark on propaganda campaigns. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<o:p>\n\n</o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Scapegoats can suffer a variety of negative\nconsequences including loss of social status, economic problems, social\nisolation, and depression. People are more likely to engage in scapegoating\nwhen they are stressed, experiencing oppression, or afraid. Scapegoating, in\nturn, can lead to the oppression of a scapegoated group.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In management:\nScapegoating is a known practice in management where a lower staff employee is blamed\nfor the mistakes of senior executives. This is often due to lack of\naccountability in upper management.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<o:p><br /></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A mean boss can blame\nhis employees &nbsp;for his problems \u2014\n\"They are all against me. They have been sabotaging me at every\nturn.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A popular variation on\nthis technique is, \"Do whatever you wish to do, and blame somebody else for\nit\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blame A Non-Factor-- Blame\nsomething that isn't really the cause of the problem. (It's a kind of diversion\ntactic, diverting attention from what is really wrong.)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A scapegoat may be an\nadult, child, sibling, employee, peer, ethnic, political or religious group, or\ncountry. A whipping boy, identified patient or \"fall guy\" are forms\nof scapegoat.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Assigning blame&nbsp; to an individual or group, alleviates feelings\nof guilt from responsible parties and/or <i style=\"background-color: cyan;\">distracting attention&nbsp; from the need to fix the problem</i> for which\nblame is being assigned.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Scapegoated groups\nthroughout history have included almost every imaginable group of people:\ngenders, religions, people of different races, nations, or sexual orientations,\npeople with different political beliefs, or people differing in behaviour from\nthe majority.&nbsp; &nbsp;However, scapegoating may also be applied to\norganizations, such as governments, corporations, or various political groups.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the 1940s, after the\nJapanese bombed Pearl Harbor, the United States began an anti-Japanese\npropaganda campaign and imprisoned thousands of Japanese-Americans.\nAnti-Japanese racism lingered for years as many people blamed all Japanese\npeople for the bombing. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After World War I,\nGermany was decimated, and double agent JEW Adolf Hitler rose to power by\npromising to make Germany strong again, blaming Jewish people for a host of\nsocial ills--as a FOUL tactic to carve out the land of Israel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/if-zionist-jews-created-isis-who.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/if-zionist-jews-created-isis-who.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">############# FLATTERY</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Flattery (also called\nadulation or blandishment) is the act of giving excessive compliments,\ngenerally for the purpose of ingratiating oneself with the subject.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Historically, flattery\nhas been used as a standard form of discourse when addressing a king or queen.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-EKRqyOqOIzU/WADK2UY4j9I/AAAAAAABMzQ/iPkU9gUCp3oXS6Wgzx6qeeP6q3VYMXjtQCLcB/s1600/d221ownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-EKRqyOqOIzU/WADK2UY4j9I/AAAAAAABMzQ/iPkU9gUCp3oXS6Wgzx6qeeP6q3VYMXjtQCLcB/s400/d221ownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Get someone to accept\nthe bullshit that you are shovelling by flattering and praising them. This is\nan unabashed appeal to egotism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Flattery is also used\nin pick-up lines when attempting to initiate romantic courtship.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-E1t3L6Tt-CA/WADKs9ZcxAI/AAAAAAABMzM/Q9nDS0Ue8GM_JtJimi_9JCupt4h3UiAigCLcB/s1600/downl22oad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"331\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-E1t3L6Tt-CA/WADKs9ZcxAI/AAAAAAABMzM/Q9nDS0Ue8GM_JtJimi_9JCupt4h3UiAigCLcB/s400/downl22oad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example, a\ntelevision commercial tells housewives that \"You are so wonderful \u2014 you\njuggle six jobs at once, take care of three kids, and still manage to look good\n\u2014 so that's why you should buy our junk. A sophisticated person like yourself\nwould settle for nothing less...\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A commercial says,\n\"There is no mass-produced human being. We know that you are unique, with\nspecial tastes.\" (That's why you should buy the same mass-produced junk\nthat we sell to everybody else.)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-mQ3O1tITmjM/WADLaLxPLtI/AAAAAAABMzY/029TREwJXzwj4S9OcptFiVyssqmN06AZwCLcB/s1600/Sibal-Seesingh-1024x764.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-mQ3O1tITmjM/WADLaLxPLtI/AAAAAAABMzY/029TREwJXzwj4S9OcptFiVyssqmN06AZwCLcB/s400/Sibal-Seesingh-1024x764.jpg\" width=\"300\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mamata Bannerjee\u2019s puerile\npaintings were tomtommed to be masterpieces by her partymen . Some would buy it\nfor crores .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/--_tE-C_i1x8/WADLFLsBXkI/AAAAAAABMzU/pG7YYsJg1wwlD8Z8y3GqX4cvmf22jPZzgCLcB/s1600/dow976nload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/--_tE-C_i1x8/WADLFLsBXkI/AAAAAAABMzU/pG7YYsJg1wwlD8Z8y3GqX4cvmf22jPZzgCLcB/s1600/dow976nload.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She would actually start\nexplaining , about MAA KE MAMTA in her paintings ( BAAP KA PEEPTA CHOLBE &nbsp;NAH ? )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zroNzUZRMy4/WADKnceEztI/AAAAAAABMzI/6tr_9JNW61kW7W7UWhvrKtqyvyxKlsj1QCLcB/s1600/mamata-paiDDnting.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zroNzUZRMy4/WADKnceEztI/AAAAAAABMzI/6tr_9JNW61kW7W7UWhvrKtqyvyxKlsj1QCLcB/s640/mamata-paiDDnting.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">##############&nbsp; PROOF BY ANECDOTE</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anecdotal evidence is\nevidence from anecdotes, i.e., evidence collected in a casual or informal\nmanner and relying heavily or entirely on personal testimony.</span> &nbsp;Mostly bull<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> passed along by\nword-of-mouth but not documented scientifically<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN INDIA WE HAVE THE\nNEW WORLD ORDER INDUCTED NCW WHO BELIEVES IN ANECDOTAL&nbsp; RAPE &nbsp;EVIDENCE PROVIDED BY WHORES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mother Teresa was made\na saint by LYING IMMORAL anecdotal &nbsp;proof<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proof by Anecdote is a\nstunt where you make some grand generalization, and then you tell one or more\nstories that appear to support your generalization, and then you conclude that\nthe point is proven. (You can ignore all of the other stories that disprove\nyour point.)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This Proof-by-Anecdote\ntechnique is heavily used in advertising \u2013especially in the weight loss\nsection, whom Kothandaraman lost 50 kilos in one month<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Where only one or a few\nanecdotes are presented, there is a larger chance that they may be unreliable\ndue to cherry-picked or otherwise non-representative samples of typical cases.\nAccurate determination of whether an anecdote is \"typical\" requires\nstatistical evidence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In all forms of\nanecdotal evidence, its reliability by objective independent assessment may be\nin doubt.. The term is often used to describe evidence for which there is an\nabsence of documentation, leaving verification dependent on the credibility of\nthe party presenting the evidence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Researchers may use\nanecdotal evidence for suggesting new hypotheses, but never as validating\nevidence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Witness testimony is a\ncommon form of evidence in law, and law has mechanisms to test witness evidence\nfor reliability or credibility.. Some witness testimony may be described as\nanecdotal evidence, such as individual stories of harassment as part of a class\naction lawsuit. However, witness testimony can be tested and assessed for\nreliability. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Where a court lacks suitable means to test and\nassess testimony of a particular witness, such as the absence of forms of\ncorroboration or substantiation, it may afford that testimony limited or no\n\"weight\" when making a decision on the facts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In USA , expert\ntestimony of witnesses must meet the Daubert standard. This ruling holds that\nbefore evidence is presented to witnesses by experts, the methodology must be\n\"generally accepted\" among scientists.<span style=\"background: aqua; mso-highlight: aqua;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n.<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/CFdJza0AbeA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/CFdJza0AbeA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Standard used by a\ntrial judge to make a preliminary assessment of whether an expert\u2019s scientific\ntestimony is based on reasoning or methodology that is scientifically valid and\ncan properly be applied to the facts at issue.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under Daubert standard, the factors\nthat may be considered in determining whether the methodology is valid are: (1)\nwhether the theory or technique in question can be and has been tested; (2)\nwhether it has been subjected to peer review and publication; (3) its known or\npotential error rate; (4) the existence and maintenance of standards\ncontrolling its operation; and (5) whether it has attracted widespread\nacceptance within a relevant scientific community<span style=\"background: aqua; mso-highlight: aqua;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">################ DOUBLE\nTALK</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Confuse your listeners\nwith contradictory, illogical, or incomprehensible jabber:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Double-talk is a form\nof speech in which inappropriate, invented, or nonsense words are used to give\nthe appearance of knowledge and so confuse or amuse the audience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL UPA CONGRESS\nSPOKESMEN ON TV ENGAGE IN IT\u2014NOT BECAUSE THEY ARE WISE \u2013BUT BECAUSE THEY ARE MINDLESS &nbsp;IDIOTS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pigs in George\nOrwell's Animal Farm wrote: \"All animals are equal but some animals are\nmore equal than others.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cWe lose money on every\ncar that we sell, but we make up for it in volume\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">############ UNPROVABLE\nSTATEMENTS </b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just make up grandiose,\ncompletely unprovable statements that say whatever you want people to believe:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"God appeared to\nme in a vision and told me that he had a special message that I was to carry to\nthe world.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The Twelve Steps\nwork in a magical mystical way that cannot be scientifically tested or\nlogically explained.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">############ MOVING THE\nGOALPOSTS</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This trick is like:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Demand that your\nopponent prove Fact A.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When he does, answer,\n\"But you didn't prove Fact B.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When he does that,\nanswer \"\"But you didn't prove Fact C.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">etc...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This trick is also\nknown as \"changing the parameters of the question afterwards\", so as\nto invalidate a true answer. And it's also called \"moving the bar\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moving the goalposts,\nsimilar to \"shifting sands\" and also known as raising the bar, is an\ninformal fallacy in which evidence presented in response to a specific claim is\ndismissed and some other (often greater) evidence is demanded. That is, after\nan attempt has been made to score a goal, the goalposts are moved to exclude\nthe attempt. The problem with changing the rules of the game is that the\nmeaning of the end result is changed, too.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some include this\nmetaphor as description of the tactics of harassment. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In workplace bullying,\nshifting the goalposts is a conventional tactic in the process of humiliation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moving the goalposts\nmay also refer to feature creep, in which the completion of a product like\nsoftware is not acknowledged because an evolving list of required features\nchanges over time, which in extreme cases may even require rewriting the entire\nprogram. Thus, the goal of \"completing\" the product for a client may\nnever occur.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chutney Mary&nbsp; and Pickle John make a deal. However, Mary\nhas much more power than John, because John is really desperate for whatever\nMary is offering, and will do whatever it takes to get it.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mary ends up abusing this power badly,\nreneging on the initial agreement and making a seemingly endless series of\ndemands on&nbsp; John without ever keeping her\nend of the bargain.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each time Pickle John fulfills Chutney Mary\u2019s requirements,\nshe simply adds another one. If he protests, she threatens to withdraw her\noffer entirely.&nbsp; This is Moving The\nGoalposts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A gay couple that has\nbeen seeing each other for ten years are talking ...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pansy Prick : No! I\nwon't marry you-- my asshole has a NO ENTRY sign for you .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Humping Dick :\nWhy?&nbsp; First you said that if I got a good\ncareer, you would marry me. Then you said that if I got a good job, you would\nmarry me. After that you said if I got a nice car, you would marry me. What do\nyou want now?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pansy Prick : Well,\nwe're going to need a place to live. I'll marry you when you get a house.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Humping Dick: How will\nI ever be able to marry and hump you ? You keep moving the goalposts.<span style=\"background: aqua; mso-highlight: aqua;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mgyGUW33QaE/WAFIahrYRiI/AAAAAAABMzo/pO60_wojBlEMC8b237k1YObaBjNFeFFbwCLcB/s1600/sport-marriage-mssaarried-relationships-counsellor-therapy-gca0433_low.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mgyGUW33QaE/WAFIahrYRiI/AAAAAAABMzo/pO60_wojBlEMC8b237k1YObaBjNFeFFbwCLcB/s400/sport-marriage-mssaarried-relationships-counsellor-therapy-gca0433_low.jpg\" width=\"276\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration: none;\">October 13, 2016 at 2:04 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_22MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nHi Captain,<br />\nSlightly off topic question. What are the side effects of abortion drugs. I was talking to someone I know and they said a female GP had provided drugs called mifepristone and misoprostol to the patient. The patient in this case had something called a \"chemical pregnancy\" or the foetus had not developed.<br />\n<br />\nNow what struck me as suspicious was that why give an abortion drug for this case and what are the side effects of this type of drug.<br />\n<br />\nNot sure if this drug is available in India but here in Australia it seems to be quite commonly administered which is quite worrying.<br />\nregards</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_22BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; For some women this is very traumatic.<br />\n<br />\nThis drug breaks down the uterine lining and the growing fetus is shed from the uterus over a period of about 12 days.<br />\n<br />\nObama Food and Drug Administration recently relaxed standards for administering the abortion pill RU-486, allowing it to be used to abort children who are more developed in the womb<br />\n<br />\nThe decision was a political one to support ZIONIST JEW EVIL PHARMA and not one based on safety.<br />\n<br />\nDespite the euphemisms the abortion industry uses to dehumanize them, these children aren\u2019t just \u201cclumps of cells.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nAt ten weeks, a baby has arms and legs, and she can suck her tiny little thumb, open and close her jaw, stretch, and even sigh.<br />\n<br />\nAnd contrary to what the abortion industry tells women, the RU-486 protocol is not a simple set of pills that make a pregnancy magically disappear.<br />\n<br />\nMifepristone cuts off blood and nutrients to the growing preborn baby, slowly starving her inside the womb over the course of a day or two.<br />\n<br />\nAfter the baby is assumed dead, the mother takes another drug \u2014 misoprostol \u2014 that causes intense contractions and heavy bleeding, which forces her dead baby from her womb.<br />\n<br />\nAbortionists don\u2019t want to stand around and wait for this long process to take place, so the FDA also relaxed the amount of supervision abortionists are required to provide, leaving women mostly on their own during the abortion.<br />\n<br />\nThat\u2019s right, during this multi-day process, a woman is often alone at home with absolutely no medical supervision.<br />\n<br />\nShe\u2019s told to sit in the bathroom as she goes through hours of bleeding and contractions and eventually bleeds her baby into the toilet.<br />\n<br />\nThe situation is even more frightening when you realize that in states that don\u2019t require parental consent for abortions or that have ways of getting around it, minors can get the abortion pill and go through this dangerous days-long abortion without any adult or medical supervision.<br />\n<br />\nThe pill also presents a dangerous complication for women who have undetected ectopic pregnancies, where the embryo implants in a place other than the uterus, often in one of the fallopian tubes.<br />\n<br />\nRU-486 is ineffective in ending an ectopic pregnancy.<br />\n<br />\nWhile the mother thinks she has aborted her child, the preborn child may continue to grow in this hostile environment, leading to the eventual death of the child and internal rupturing, severe bleeding, and possible death for the mother.<br />\n<br />\nNo one can deny the financial benefits to the abortion industry of these new, slacker rules.<br />\n<br font-size: large;\"><b>LET ME SAVE THE CHUTNEY MARYs</b></span></div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_11MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_12b+seedJqKCD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_12b+seedJqKCD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WELL I HAVE TWO UNFINISHED POSTS \u2013 BUT I GUESS I WILL DO THIS\nFIRST . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">COWARDLY WANNABE GORAGAAND CHUTNEY MARYs HAVE SPOIL THE CHILD\nBIRTH SCENE IN INDIA.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-sGPb5pvqtz0/V_sU2NfUN1I/AAAAAAABMiY/yu19mL4zAWY7cMTvkLvQK_KDeCLVhZwtQCLcB/s1600/epidural-GEEetty-BSIP-UIG.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-sGPb5pvqtz0/V_sU2NfUN1I/AAAAAAABMiY/yu19mL4zAWY7cMTvkLvQK_KDeCLVhZwtQCLcB/s400/epidural-GEEetty-BSIP-UIG.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EPIDURAL CHILDBIRTH AND CAESAREAN CHILDBIRTHS ARE NOT PART OF\nINDIAN CULTURE\u2014 &nbsp; THOUGH THE FIRST CAESEREAN CHILD BIRTH HAPPENED IN INDIA AND IS\nPART OF THE SUSRUTA SAMHITA 4200 BC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/fathers-of-surgery-and-medicine-4200-bc.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/fathers-of-surgery-and-medicine-4200-bc.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Rn-DCqsczT0/V_sVDQDCWBI/AAAAAAABMic/8ZjHD4uZFNMZH6kPy4TIIkYyr5dTBucjQCLcB/s1600/Corte_de_la_coluFFmna.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"350\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Rn-DCqsczT0/V_sVDQDCWBI/AAAAAAABMic/8ZjHD4uZFNMZH6kPy4TIIkYyr5dTBucjQCLcB/s640/Corte_de_la_coluFFmna.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both my sons were too\nlarge for an average baby<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In fact my wife was\nasked to literally starve in the last two months before childbirth.&nbsp; But she did NOT do that , as a sacrifice for\nher baby. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indian women are known\nfor this type of sacrifice , unlike their western counterparts. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today 60% of the western women opt for epidurals to reduce natural delivery pain at childbirth . These selfish women care more for themselves and NOT for the baby. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Later on in life she gets it back from her own child in <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">full measure.</span></b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/01/garbha-sanskar-nurturing-unborn-child.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/01/garbha-sanskar-nurturing-unborn-child.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My wife knew what was\nin store for her\u2014 she accepted the pain.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;After all the whole world\nexperienced it\u2014 a god given pain which secretes valuable hormones.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Nobody tells a woman that Epidural use doubles\nmom\u2019s risk of severe vaginal tears.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here are the different\nkinds of tears you can have:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Periurethral tears.\nThese are tears that are around your urethra, or the opening where urine comes\nout. These usually only need to be sutured (or stitched up) if they are\nbleeding, otherwise they often heal well on their own. Very small stitches are\nused so that you won\u2019t have any difficulty urinating, but if there is any\nconcern that you won\u2019t be able to (either because of swelling or where the\nstitches are placed), a catheter may be placed in your bladder at first to help\nyour bladder drain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. First-degree\nlacerations. These can occur inside the vagina or outside on the perineum. The\ndegrees mentioned here relate to how deep the tears are. A first-degree tear is\nonly when the skin tears, with everything beneath it being intact. If bleeding,\nthese can be repaired with stitches. These stitches dissolve and do not need to\nbe removed. Many women often ask how many stitches they are getting, and\nusually it is one long continuous one rather than a bunch of smaller ones, so\nthere usually isn\u2019t a total \u201cnumber.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Second-degree\nlaceration. This is deeper than a first-degree tear and is when both the skin\nand muscle below tear as well. These kinds of tears are very common and again\nare simply repaired with a long dissolvable stitch.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. Third-degree\nlaceration. This deeper tear is when the skin and muscle tear, as well as part\nof the external anal sphincter. This sphincter is a band of muscle that\nfunctions to help hold stool in. Additional stitches are placed to help bring\nthis sphincter back together. Women who have this kind of tear are often put on\nstool softeners to help avoid constipation, since this can be painful and can\ndisrupt the stitches. Sometimes these women also need stronger pain medication\nto help as they heal, too.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. Fourth-degree\nlaceration. This is the deepest tear of all and is when the tear extends\ncompletely into the rectum so that there is a direct passage from the vagina\ninto the rectum. Additional layers of suture are used to help close this back\nup and separate the vagina from the rectum. Since this can take longer to\nrepair, requires the obstetrician be able to see things very clearly, and can\nbe painful, many times this kind of repair is done in an operating room with\nthe woman receiving either a higher dose epidural or sedating pain medications.\nAs with third-degree lacerations, avoiding constipation and good pain control\nare key. To avoid complications, most doctors will see these women in the\noffice soon after delivery to make sure that healing is appropriate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I had asked my wife to\nWITNESS&nbsp; her pain and describe to me\nlater. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yes the vaginal tears\ncaused pain. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But she says that was\nonly because my elder son as a baby in the womb was too big. &nbsp;Otherwise it is NOT a pain ( as women would\nlike to tom tom to gain faalthu sympathy )&nbsp;\n, but a sort of discomfort\u2014like you want to go for a shit but have to\nhold on.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>My wife had NIL pain during child birth due\nto her mindset of\u2014<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">HEY PAIN , TAKE ME ON - &nbsp;I MAKE THIS SACRIFICE &nbsp;FOR MY CHILD</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Giving birth vaginally\ncan result in vaginal tearing or lacerations for many women. This is part of\nthe normal process of a baby passing through the birth canal and out the\nvagina. It tends to be more common in women giving birth for the first time or\namong those who have larger babies.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This quantum of pain has been decided by\ngod. The brain churns out natural chemicals .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">A woman\u2019s body produces it\u2019s very own pain\nkiller (endorphins) which are released in response to pain. &nbsp; Many women have\ngreat success managing pain by accepting God\u2019s way.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Epidurals involve the\ninjection of a local anesthetic drug (derived from cocaine) into the epidural\nspace\u2014the space around (epi) the tough coverings (dura) that protect the spinal\ncord.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Like I said it is being done by more than 60% of western women , so that\nthey can avoid pain during child birth. These selfish women care only for\nthemselves , not for the baby in the womb.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The spine is made up of\nbones called vertebrae that stack on top of each other from head to tail. There\nis a hole in the center of each vertebra that, when stacked, forms a bony tube\nthat houses the spinal cord.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The space inside this\ntube around the cord is called the epidural space and it contains blood\nvessels, nerves, and lymphatics.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A conventional epidural\nwill numb (block) both the sensory and motor nerves as they exit from the\nspinal cord, giving very effective pain relief for labor but making the\nrecipient unable to move the lower part of her body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Epidurals significantly\ninterfere with some of the major hormones of labor and birth, which explains\ntheir negative effect on the processes of labor. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the World Health\nOrganization comments, \u201cepidural analgesia is one of the most striking examples\nof the medicalization of normal birth, transforming a natural physiological\nevent into a medical procedure.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example, oxytocin,\nknown as the hormone of love, is also a natural uterotonic\u2014a substance that\ncauses a woman\u2019s uterus to contract in labor. Epidurals lower the mother\u2019s\nproduction of oxytocin, or stop its normal rise during labor.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Epidurals reduce\noxytocin production or keep it from rising during labor. They &nbsp;blunt the oxytocin peak that would otherwise\noccur at the time of birth because the stretching receptors of a woman\u2019s lower\nvagina (which trigger the peak) are numbed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Epidurals thus obliterate the maternal oxytocin peak that\noccurs at birth \u2014the highest of a mother\u2019s lifetime\u2014which catalyses the final\npowerful contractions of labor and helps mother and baby to fall in love at\nfirst meeting.&nbsp; This love is FOREVER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adrenaline and\nnoradrenaline (epinephrine and norepinephrine, collectively known as\ncatecholamines, or CAs) are also released under stressful conditions, and\nlevels naturally increase during an unmedicated labor. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the end of an undisturbed labor, a natural\nsurge in these hormones gives the mother the energy to push her baby out, and\nmakes her excited and fully alert at first meeting with her baby. This is known\nas the fetal ejection reflex.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A reduction in the\nfinal CA surge contributes to the difficulty that women laboring with an epidural\ncan experience in pushing out their babies, and the increased risk of\ninstrumental delivery (forceps and vacuum) that accompanies the use of an\nepidural<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A woman laboring with\nan epidural misses out on the final powerful contractions of labor\nand must use her own effort, often against gravity, to compensate for this\nloss. This explains the increased length of the second stage of labor and the\nincreased need for forceps when an epidural is used.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For the baby,\ninstrumental delivery can increase the risks of bruising, facial injury, displacement\nof the skull bones, and cephalohematoma (blood clot under the scalp). &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The risk of intracranial hemorrhage\n(bleeding inside the brain) increases by more than five times for babies born\nby forceps compared to spontaneous birth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Epidural drugs can\ncause directly toxic effects to the fetus and newborn, whose drug levels may be\neven higher than the mother\u2019s drug levels.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The baby is born\ndrugged\u2014the Chutney Mary mother does NOT feel the love for the child the\nway&nbsp; god meant it to be.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a direct link\nbetween epidurals used during labour and a delay in a mother\u2019s milk \u2018coming\nin\u201d.&nbsp; Breastfeeding is instinctive for\nbabies. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They display a series\nof typical feeding behaviours when placed on their mother\u2019s chest that enable\nthem to seek their mother\u2019s breasts and begin feeding. A baby is typically\nalert and eager for the first hour or two after birth. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is when nature\nintends for a baby to have his first breastfeed. When a baby\u2019s feeding\nbehaviours are functioning optimally, this helps a baby to be able to do find\nhis mother\u2019s breasts and in doing so get breastfeeding off to the best start\npossible. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A baby\u2019s feeding\nbehaviours is dulled by pain medication exposure during labour. But hey\u2014Chutney\nMary cares only for herself .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For the uninitiated\nChutney Mary is an Indian woman who apes the west , who wants to be a white\noman .&nbsp; &nbsp;But alas\u2014whatever she does, the odour of\nchutney pervades. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her wannabe goragaand &nbsp;Indian partner is called Pickle John. &nbsp;&nbsp;He tries to be Goras sahib, but ends ups\nbeing brown sahib, reeking of pickle.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every drug that the\nmother receives in labor will pass through the placenta to her baby, who is\nmore vulnerable to toxic effects. The maximum effects are likely to be at birth\nand in the hours immediately after, when drug levels are highest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A newborn baby\u2019s\nability to process and excrete drugs is much less than an adult\u2019s.&nbsp; Such epidural exposed&nbsp; babies have higher rates of jaundice <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Epidural mothers find\ntheir babies \u201cless adaptable, more intense and more bothersome in their\nbehavior&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A LOT OF THESE BABIES\nHATE THEIR MOTHERS AND BECOME DRUG ADDICTS IN THER ADULT LIFE.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WELL\nCHARLES DARWIN OR SIGMUND FREUD CANT TELL YOU MORE ABOUT THIS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Western obstetric care\nproviders have assumed that control of pain is the foremost concern of laboring\nwomen, and that effective pain relief will ensure a positive birth experience. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">In fact, the opposite is true.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Epidurals have the\nfollowing effects on labor and laboring mothers:---</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>They lengthen labor.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>They quadruple the risk\nof severe perineal tear.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>They increase the risk\nof cesarean section by 4 times.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>They triple the\noccurrence of induction with synthetic oxytocin (Pitocin).</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>They quadruple the\nchances a baby will be persistently posterior (POP, face up) in the final\nstages of labor, which in turn decreases the chances of spontaneous vaginal\nbirth</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Epidurals can cause\nmaternal fever, which in turn may affect the baby. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a large study of first-time moms, babies\nborn to mothers with fever (97% of whom had epidurals) were more likely to be\nin poor condition (low APGAR scores) at birth, to have poor tone, to require\nresuscitation and to have seizures in the newborn period, compared to babies\nborn to mothers without fever.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apgar is a quick test\nperformed on a baby at 1 and 5 minutes after birth.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;
