text-decoration: none;\">November 17, 2016 at 10:28 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_154MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSir,<br />\n<br />\nMy cousin was planning for normal delivery.. no c-section / epidurals.... she even paased her due date.. at the end, her water broke and she fet no labor pains 5hrs after her water had broken.. she ended up having c-section...<br />\n<br />\nwhy no pains after water broke sir?</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_154BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_154b+seedgJQD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_152T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_154b+seedgJQD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_152TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_152TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_152TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_154b+seedgJQD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_152TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_152TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_154b+seedgJQD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_152TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_152TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_152TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_152B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2632473167613619305\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_152M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/epidurals-when-chutney-mary-fails-her.html?showComment=1479361786367#c2632473167613619305\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">November 17, 2016 at 11:19 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_152MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi smp,<br />\n<br />\nIt doesn\u2019t hurt for your water bag to break \u2014 in fact, you may not even notice when it happens, unless you feel a little warm and wet down below. But for many women, the breaking of the water ushers in the painful part of labor.<br />\n<br />\nIf your water breaks before labor starts, it's called premature rupture of membranes (PROM).If your waters break before your baby has reached full term (37 weeks), the medical name for it is preterm prelabour rupture of the membranes, or PPROM.<br />\n<br />\nOver 80% of women who have PPROM deliver their baby within seven days of their waters breaking.<br />\n<br />\nIn an overwhelming majority of cases -- some 80 percent -- labor begins with contractions, then water breaking. In the other 20 percent, the water breaks first and is usually followed by labor pains within a few hours.<br />\n<br />\nThe likelihood is that your contractions will start within 24 hours to 48 hours of your water bag breaking. At least 60 per cent of women go into labour within 24 hours and most of the rest go into labour within 48 hours<br />\n<br />\nCaesarean rates are lower when women waited for labour to start compared with those who were induced.<br />\n<br />\nWhen your water bag breaks the amniotic fluid then leaks out via your cervix and vagina.<br />\n<br />\nThe bag of waters is made up of two layers of membranes<br />\n<br />\nMost women's waters break during labour, after contractions have already begun. The waters protect you and your baby from infection.<br />\n<br />\nSometimes waters break before any other signs of labour, including contractions. This happens for about one in 10 women .<br />\n<br />\nFor about one in 50, their waters break earlier than this, before they are 37 weeks pregnant. Once your waters have broken, you may notice that your contractions start to feel more intense.<br />\n<br />\nAmniotic fluid is almost 99 per cent water so it's normally clear with a yellow tinge or sometimes a pink tinge.<br />\n<br />\nIf you\u2019re close to or past your due date, your water may contain some of your baby's first poo (meconium). This may result in the waters having a green tinge to them, or you may be able to see green or brown meconium .<br />\n<br />\nIf your baby hasn't arrived within 24 hours after your water broke, your doctor may give you antibiotics intravenously. That's because there's a chance an infection can travel into the uterus and cause an infection in the baby<br />\nIf you experience premature rupture of membranes, your doctor might stimulate uterine contractions before labor begins on its own (labor induction). The longer it takes for labor to start after your water breaks, the greater the risk of you or your baby developing an infection.<br />\n<br />\nIf you are under 24 weeks of pregnancy and the baby is born, sadly, it is unlikely the baby will survive.<br />\n<br />\nIf you are over 30 weeks and the baby is born, the likelihood of your baby surviving is much higher - over 95%<br />\n<br />\nBefore 23 weeks, the baby needs \u2018waters\u2019 to be present for their lungs to develop normally. Loss of water before this can lead to severe problems with lung development that can be critical after birth.<br />\n<br />\nAfter 23 weeks your baby does not need the amniotic fluid so much, so low levels of fluid may not be a problem in itself, but if the low levels are due to your waters breaking then there is a risk of infection..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2\u2014</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_152MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_152BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_152B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_153B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c946919382513416510\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_153M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/epidurals-when-chutney-mary-fails-her.html?showComment=1479361809557#c946919382513416510\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">November 17, 2016 at 11:20 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_153MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nYou may also be treated with antibiotics, corticosteroids and magnesium sulphate (if you are less than 30 weeks) to help prepare your baby in case the baby is premature<br />\n<br />\nWater bag is a special cushion for your baby. It gives your baby freedom to move within your body, and it gives the space so that when someone taps your belly, your baby isn\u2019t in danger of a bruise.<br />\n<br />\nAnd it helps regulate the temperature, so that your baby stays warm in the winter and cool in the summer. A woman should always mark the time when her water breaks<br />\n<br />\nmost doctors want the baby to be born within 24 hours to ensure that the baby is healthy. Sometimes, the doctor will give a woman some time for the contractions to begin on their own, but if they don\u2019t within 12 hours or so, that may mean that the doctor recommends an induction, unless the baby would be premature.<br />\n<br />\nOne of the biggest dangers of water breaking before labor begins is the danger of the umbilical cord getting in the way. It\u2019s called umbilical cord prolapse, and if the cord is in the way, it could get compressed by the baby in the birth canal.<br />\n<br />\nThe umbilical cord is still helping your baby get blood and oxygen during the delivery, and it is a big deal if that flow gets cut off. In fact, an umbilical cord prolapse usually results in a doctor recommending a C-section.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_154b+seedgJQD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4536017635967534947\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_141M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. The moon appears full when the Earth is between the moon and the sun. In both cases, the gravitational pull of the sun is \"added\" to the gravitational pull of the moon on Earth, causing the oceans to bulge a bit more than usual. This means that high tides are a little higher and low tides are a little lower than average.<br /><br />Spring tides, has nothing to do with the season of spring. Rather, the term is derived from the concept of the tide \"springing forth.\" ..<br /><br />Spring tides occur twice each lunar month all year long, without regard to the season\u2026.<br /><br />http://tides.mobilegeographics.com/calendar/month/547.html<br /><br />IN THE LINK ABOVE YOU CAN SEE THAT FULL MOON IS ON 3RD DEC 2017..<br /><br />THREE DAYS LATER THE DATE IS 6TH DEC..<br /><br />THE HIGH TIDE ( SPRING ) IS 12.5 METRES --THE HIGHEST..<br /><br />JEW ROTHSCHILD TOOK AWAY INDIANS TO WORK AS INDENTURED LABOUR.. text-decoration-line: none;\">December 29, 2017 at 5:32 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_139MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nIt is better NOT to use energy for digestion during this particular 24 hours\u2026The high energy of the full moon gives the body a chance to do deep cleansing\u2026<br /><br />During the Amavasya / Poornima there are many more negative ions in the atmosphere, which is good for neutralizing free radicals \u2026 Body cells get a deep cleanse..<br /><br />At my home i have a water fall for NEGATIVE IONS..<br /><br />The Nemi lake is a VOLCANIC CRATER and it produces humongous negative ions..<br /><br />The 4 electrolytes \u2013 sodium, potassium, calcium and magnesium \u2013 form a kind of dance over 24 hrs called the day-night shift. ..Magnesium and potassium live normally within the cell, and sodium and calcium are found outside. ..<br /><br />During the day sodium invades the cell, taking a hydrogen ion with it, which is acidifying\u2026 In order to buffer this acidity, which is toxic to the cell, calcium also moves in. ..This has the effect of displacing potassium and magnesium which is shoved out of the cell\u2026<br /><br />At night due to the effect of the moon, the opposite takes place and potassium and magnesium move back into the cell, pushing out the calcium and sodium, which takes the hydrogen ion with it\u2026<br /><br />WHEN I TRIED TO WRITE A KARVA CHAUTH POST ON THIS CHUTNEY MARYs ATTACKED ME\u2026<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/10/karva-chauth-synchronising-fertility.html<br /><br />THE POST ABOVE IS THE SECOND HIGHEST READ ARTICLE ON THIS PLANET TODAY--THE FIRST BEING SURYA NAMASSKAR --96% BY FOREIGNERS..<br /><br />This has the effect of cleansing the cell, so you should wake up bright and refreshed. When the body is not cleansing properly, this process is impaired and instead you wake up tired and lethargic . There is a higher sodium content in the cell, therefore a higher hydrogen (acidifying) content, and as water follows sodium in the body, the water content of the cell starts to swell. ..<br /><br />So the cell is under pressure from high acidity \u2013 so it pulls in more calcium, which displaces more magnesium causing an imbalance\u2026<br /><br />The moon-pull is much gentler than the sun-push. Only if conditions are right within the body can the moon pull the sodium back across the cell membrane, thus making way for the Magnesium to exert a gentle push with the potassium, so that they go back to their rightful position, which is inside the cell\u2026<br /><br />What is lymph? Ayurveda knew it 6000 years ago, while modern science knew about it just 60 years back\u2026<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/08/yoga-and-ayurvedic-massage-for-draining.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/01/lymph-nodes-vs-endocrine-exocrine.html<br /><br />6200 YEAR OLD Ayurveda was the first to write about AUTOPHAGY.. literally SELF EATING -- it\u2019s the body\u2019s system of cleaning house: Your cells create membranes that hunt out scraps of dead, diseased, or worn-out cells; gobble them up; strip them for parts; and use the resulting molecules for energy or to make new cell parts.<br /><br />Autophagy makes us more efficient machines to get rid of faulty parts, stop cancerous growths, and stop metabolic dysfunction like obesity and diabetes.. the process plays a hand in controlling inflammation and immunity.<br /><br />THE MOST IMPORTANT EFFECT IS THAT THE BRAIN GETS SHARPENED AND THE AGEING PROCESS SLOWS DOWN<br /><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=10jNZleNH9w<br /><br />FROM NOW ON HINDUS WILL CREATE THEIR OWN DESTINY--WE DONT CARE FOR THE WHITE MEN WHO FOOLED US USING AGENTS LIKE GANDHI AND BR AMBEDKAR\u2026<br /><br />Capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_139MN\" kind=\"m\"></span></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_139B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fRWME25jtEk/V_3fT4sYoRI/AAAAAAABMqw/QO50gxZfKYAr8keVxLYT2C3v60iDuiwxQCLcB/s1600/twwh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"204\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fRWME25jtEk/V_3fT4sYoRI/AAAAAAABMqw/QO50gxZfKYAr8keVxLYT2C3v60iDuiwxQCLcB/s400/twwh.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n\n\n\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red;\"><br /></span></b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">######### PEDDLING HALF\nTRUTHS</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People who want to\ndeceive do not want their deception to be detected.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It involves the use of\nvarious techniques to hide the deception and create an impression of\ntruthfulness for a person, group or the general public. Truthiness may contain\nvarious amounts of truthful facts or no truth at all. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A half-truth is a\ndeceptive statement that includes some element of truth. The statement might be\npartly true, the statement may be totally true but only part of the whole\ntruth, or it may use some deceptive element, such as improper punctuation, or\ndouble meaning, especially if the intent is to deceive, evade, blame or\nmisrepresent the truth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The purpose and or\nconsequence of a half-truth is to make something that is really only a belief\nappear to be knowledge, or a truthful statement to represent the whole truth,\nor possibly lead to a false conclusion. According to the justified true belief\ntheory of knowledge, in order to know that a given proposition is true, one must\nnot only believe in the relevant true proposition, but one must also have a\ngood reason for doing so. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A half-truth deceives\nthe recipient by presenting something believable and using those aspects of the\nstatement that can be shown to be true as good reason to believe the statement\nis true in its entirety, or that the statement represents the whole truth. A\nperson deceived by a half-truth considers the proposition to be knowledge and\nacts accordingly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"I'm a really good\ndriver. In the past thirty years, I have gotten only four speeding\ntickets\"---- This statement is true, but irrelevant if the speaker started\ndriving a week ago.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beware of those who use\nthe truth to deceive. When someone tells you something that is true, but leaves\nout important information that should be included, he can create a false\nimpression.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Advertisers will sometimes use half-truths. It\u2019s against the law to\nmake false claims so they try to mislead you with the truth<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-k6ga2RxpBD0/V_3hX2LZQ2I/AAAAAAABMrA/4KtbffhzMgktL0k3jWTvq3_RRYuxZNRUgCLcB/s1600/imagee2es.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"257\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-k6ga2RxpBD0/V_3hX2LZQ2I/AAAAAAABMrA/4KtbffhzMgktL0k3jWTvq3_RRYuxZNRUgCLcB/s400/imagee2es.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It involves various\ntypes of techniques used for \"impression management\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild\u2019s agent\nGandhi is the FATHER OF OUR NATION.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He is considered to be\nTHE man with the best character \u2013 ASK PEOPLE WHO KNOW OF THE NAKED TEENAGERS\nWHO SLEPT WITH HIM DAILY UNDER THE SAME BLANKET , AND WHO GAVE GANDHI ENEMAS (\nMUTUAL ) &nbsp;TWICE A DAY. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;GANDHI GOT HIS KICKS BY ASKING HIS WIFE KASTURBA\nTO EMPTY THE CHAMBER POT OF SHIT \u2013SHE DID IT FOR A WHILE , AFTER BEING BEATEN\nBLACK AND BLUE\u2014&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONE FINE DAY THE POOR WOMAN REVOLTED..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-a99BAsrJr_0/V_3dxZjjYiI/AAAAAAABMqg/-m3cFtF-F9EKr5g-SngUHcEnzsJPL4M7wCLcB/s1600/sssagan-400x295.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"472\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-a99BAsrJr_0/V_3dxZjjYiI/AAAAAAABMqg/-m3cFtF-F9EKr5g-SngUHcEnzsJPL4M7wCLcB/s640/sssagan-400x295.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">############ DUMBING IT\nDOWN</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This technique involves\ndenial and other methods to&nbsp; avoid\nanswering pertinent questions from the concerned public. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If an issue is not reported, and the general\npublic does not know about it, it's like it never happened. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Characterizing the\nissues as just \"rumors\" or dismissing the charges as old news and\nusing these as excuses not to comment are other techniques used to put the\nmedia and concerned public off the scent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The opposite ploy is\nclaiming the issues are too complex to discuss, and the truth unknowable (with\nthe intent to prevent further pursuit of facts and the truth) and using this as\nan excuse to avoid the topic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spinners should be\nchallenged when they use denials and avoidance.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To revise so as to\nappeal to those of little education or intelligence\u2014to keep at the lowest\ncommon denominator. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mJ45FmkIpuo/V_3eulaS6TI/AAAAAAABMqo/C4NeBKm3xo8FiKCLbkOyX7aKhQgRMebNQCLcB/s1600/imddages.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mJ45FmkIpuo/V_3eulaS6TI/AAAAAAABMqo/C4NeBKm3xo8FiKCLbkOyX7aKhQgRMebNQCLcB/s320/imddages.png\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Philosophically, the\nterm \"dumbing down\" is a relative definition, because what is\nconsidered dumbing down depends on the taste, value judgement, and intellectual\nlevel of the person involved in the matter<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">#########&nbsp; CREATING A DIVERSION</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Changing the subject\nmay be as simple as ignoring the relevant question and changing the subject; or\nmay go so far as to involve creating and publicizing distractions (good or bad)\nto divert attention from the matters the spinner wants to cover up. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometimes shills are used to create this\ndiversion . . In the case of Donald Trump this shill was the debate mediator \u2013a\nRothschild agent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b><br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_86M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>############ HERE IS\nTHE FUCKIN\u2019 PROOF.</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proofiness is lying\nwith numbers or using incorrect logic deliberately to mislead. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proofiness can involve:\noutright lying about numbers; quoting statistics out of context so that they\nmislead; distorting statistics; or using incorrect logic in order to mislead\nthe audience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proofiness with numbers\nor incorrect logic is &nbsp;used by\nunscrupulous spinners in governments, big business and marketing. &nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Proofiness is used by\nEVIL PHARMA for boosting their sales </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-RbjT_PBLxQg/V_3bcOQmkoI/AAAAAAABMqI/8VYIENHKKfojymk1CUtniN7LyFbWL0BPwCLcB/s1600/386-5-fallacies-of-logic-a-fallacy-is-any-defect-in-reasoning-which-destroys-an-arguments-validity-1-ad-hominem-2-fauWWlty-cause-and-effect-3-either-or-4-guilt-by-association-5-loaded-ques3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"620\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-RbjT_PBLxQg/V_3bcOQmkoI/AAAAAAABMqI/8VYIENHKKfojymk1CUtniN7LyFbWL0BPwCLcB/s640/386-5-fallacies-of-logic-a-fallacy-is-any-defect-in-reasoning-which-destroys-an-arguments-validity-1-ad-hominem-2-fauWWlty-cause-and-effect-3-either-or-4-guilt-by-association-5-loaded-ques3.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>############### FALSE\nLOGIC. </b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Logical thinking may be\ncorrect or incorrect.&nbsp; &nbsp;Incorrect logic (fallacious logic) is common\nand does not necessarily mean there has been an intent to deceive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When talking about\nincorrect logic in terms of spin - once again, the intent and the consequences\nmatter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fallacious (incorrect)\nlogic may involve using misleading comparisons (which may have some irrelevant\nsimilarities) resulting in a false conclusion. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the incorrect logic\nis part of a \"spin\" then usually the spinner will assert that the\nlogic is correct and true, whereas it is wrong and misleading. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Example--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Snow is white. There\nare no calories in snow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sugar is white. So\nthere are no calories in sugar. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Or fallacious logic may\ninvolve incorrect backwards reasoning (inductive reasoning) - where you assume\nthe conclusion is true and reason backward to the (preferred by the spinner)\nevidence that leads to a false conclusion. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Incorrect inductive\nreasoning can also be used by a spin-doctor to create a misleading illusion of\ncause and effect for the audience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Example of incorrect\ninductive (backward) reasoning:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All of the swans we\nhave seen in New Zealand are black<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Therefore all swans in\nNew Zealand are black.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1ruHiVZzEuo/V_3Z8oPTb9I/AAAAAAABMp0/8X40N2sf5-gFscYAfCvaf8bwd24GxTvaACLcB/s1600/dddddownload.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1ruHiVZzEuo/V_3Z8oPTb9I/AAAAAAABMp0/8X40N2sf5-gFscYAfCvaf8bwd24GxTvaACLcB/s400/dddddownload.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>#############&nbsp; STRAW MAN&nbsp;\nARGUMENT </b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Things made of straw\nare fairly easy to tear apart. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Straw Man Argument\ntechnique involves ignoring the opponent's actual position. Instead, the\nspinner or propagandist creates a \"Straw Man\" argument - and\nsubstitutes a distorted, exaggerated or misrepresented version of the\nopposition's position and attempts to make the opponent's stance appear\nridiculous. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then the spinner\nattacks the distorted \"Straw Man\" argument the spinner has created,\nrather than the opponent's actual position.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The objective of this\ntechnique is to distort the opponent's argument and hope the audience will not\nsee that this has happened; and mislead the audience into thinking that the\nopponent's position is off-the-wall.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The spinner also wants\nto create the impression that he has won the argument - and that this has been\nshown by the spinner having torn apart the (non-existent) \"Straw Man\"\nwhich was crafted by the spin-doctor or propagandist (rather than their\nopposition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The straw man fallacy\noccurs in the following pattern of argument:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Person 1 asserts\nproposition X.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Person 2 argues against\na superficially similar proposition Y, falsely, as if an argument against Y\nwere an argument against X.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This reasoning is a\nfallacy of relevance: it fails to address the proposition in question by\nmisrepresenting the opposing position.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-WiQcgDMP7Zk/V_3bAfv8oKI/AAAAAAABMqA/v5c2IJ9aEUQteDlrHM-luOvt3rnmxfxKQCLcB/s1600/Logical-FalYUlacies-strawman-620x391.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"401\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-WiQcgDMP7Zk/V_3bAfv8oKI/AAAAAAABMqA/v5c2IJ9aEUQteDlrHM-luOvt3rnmxfxKQCLcB/s640/Logical-FalYUlacies-strawman-620x391.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Straw man arguments\noften arise in public debates such as a (hypothetical) prohibition debate:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A: We should relax the\nlaws on beer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">B: No, any society with\nunrestricted access to intoxicants loses its work ethic and goes only for\nimmediate gratification.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The original proposal\nwas to relax laws on beer. Person B has misconstrued/misrepresented this\nproposal by responding to it as if it had been something like \"(we should\nhave...) unrestricted access to intoxicants\". It is a logical fallacy\nbecause Person A never advocated allowing said unrestricted access to\nintoxicants.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-r2NR-lO58kw/V_3amHGJCFI/AAAAAAABMp4/IgYZdEJPxcwxzLcO0SFchyHh8R5pLEsEQCLcB/s1600/imaEDFges.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"259\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-r2NR-lO58kw/V_3amHGJCFI/AAAAAAABMp4/IgYZdEJPxcwxzLcO0SFchyHh8R5pLEsEQCLcB/s320/imaEDFges.png\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">############ HOW DARE\nYOU </b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is a variation on\nthe \"Straw Man\" gambit. &nbsp;It\ninvolves avoiding key issues of an opponent's position and trying to link some\nside issue in the opponent's position so that it appears insulting to a given\ngroup.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is often accompanied by wrongfully attacking the motives of the\nopponent, all the while waxing indignant.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>########## HIT AND RUN </b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: orange;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In any public forum the\nspinner may make a brief attack on the opponent and then disappear before the\nopponent can reply.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The purpose of the\ntactic is not to acquire territory but to \u201chit\u201d an opponent, causing damage and\nthen \u201crun\u201d before they can retaliate. This approach is most commonly used when\na strong opponent must be attacked by a weaker force.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hit and run is also\nused to describe a kind of strategy where the purpose is to damage any target\ncompetitors\u2019 business and then exit before any retaliation takes place from the\nother side.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This gambit has been\nfinessed by Kacharwaal&nbsp; as SPIT AND RUN. He\nwill hold press conferences \u2013make &nbsp;false statement\n&nbsp;(basically spitting on PM Modi )and then\nrun before the press can ask for justification.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hit and run marketing\nis common where the barriers to entry and exit are very low. Because of this\nfirms find it easy to enter the market when super normal profits are being\nmade, and exit whenever the profitability goes down. So, today there is an\nincreasing focus of not only raising barriers to entry but also exit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-AXq8nCG14fo/V_3uBEm-M5I/AAAAAAABMrQ/mUhpEsUaCvorQwFDkj0rxtgkFb51b1FnACLcB/s1600/ddownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-AXq8nCG14fo/V_3uBEm-M5I/AAAAAAABMrQ/mUhpEsUaCvorQwFDkj0rxtgkFb51b1FnACLcB/s400/ddownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">############# BELITTLING\nAND NAME CALLING</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is an evasive spin\nand propagandist technique whereby the spin-doctor side-steps their expected\nresponse in an argument or discussion by making a personal attack on their\nopponent instead of responding to the argument:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">eg: \"Well, he\nwould say that, wouldn't he.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This includes\nbelittling opponents by calling them derogatory names or making sarcastic\ncomments about them while avoiding the issues. It may also include questioning\ntheir motives (once again diverting attention from the topic of the\ndiscussion).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is also what's\ngoing on when a point in an argument or discussion is side-stepped by the\nspin-doctor by attacking the group the opponent may be associated with, instead\nof addressing the argument.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Political mudslinging my\nmen of poor character can be found in elections--&nbsp; and is &nbsp;a highly effective weapon in political\ncampaigning today. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Political mudslinging\nis negative smear campaigning that directly or indirectly accuses candidates of\nwrongdoing or poor judgment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mudslinging can involve\ndirect accusations if the information can be proved true (for example, tax\nevasion or adultery), insinuations (implying that the opponent has done\nsomething wrong without directly accusing), down to the lowest form of\nmudslinging, outright name-calling and negative imagery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Considered to be one of\nthe dirtiest U.S. political campaigns in history, the 1828 U.S. presidential\nelection saw incumbent President John Quincy Adams' supporters calling Andrew\nJackson's mother a prostitute, his wife a whore and Jackson a murderer and a\ncannibal. &nbsp;&nbsp;Jackson, whose wife died of a\nheart attack , caused by the stress of the mudslinging accusations, became\npresident. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ao0_BHhP8PI/V_37kkWB0OI/AAAAAAABMrg/9Ap0wAsweUI7-qxvOt0XYC7krIRj6SwkgCLcB/s1600/downlffeoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"242\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ao0_BHhP8PI/V_37kkWB0OI/AAAAAAABMrg/9Ap0wAsweUI7-qxvOt0XYC7krIRj6SwkgCLcB/s400/downlffeoad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At home we have seen\nthe Italian waitress &nbsp;with zero class , call\nModi MAUT KA SAUDAAGAR ( merchant of death ).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An expert in mud slinging is\nHillary Clinton.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-EOK4bIe9LM8/V_38gZG_3KI/AAAAAAABMrk/sdvEeRBW4ycNo-9_sMRS-gtDYhQqrg9pACLcB/s1600/imagwdes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-EOK4bIe9LM8/V_38gZG_3KI/AAAAAAABMrk/sdvEeRBW4ycNo-9_sMRS-gtDYhQqrg9pACLcB/s400/imagwdes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>############ APPEAL TO\nMISLEADING AUTHORITY</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Argumentum ad\nverecundiam--&nbsp; Using an authority as\nevidence in your argument when the authority is not really an authority on the\nfacts relevant to the argument.&nbsp; As the\naudience, allowing an irrelevant authority to add credibility to the claim\nbeing made.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We often rely on expert\nopinions when drawing conclusions about technical matters where we lack the\nexpertise ourselves. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BRUOfLtah3s/V_3_sZ68zaI/AAAAAAABMr8/UJZyE8VkWecAiiZfQYEsESTKsxCwmqHygCLcB/s1600/doDDCwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"369\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BRUOfLtah3s/V_3_sZ68zaI/AAAAAAABMr8/UJZyE8VkWecAiiZfQYEsESTKsxCwmqHygCLcB/s400/doDDCwnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An Appeal to an\nAuthority may be misleading under the following circumstances. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The authority cited is\neither not an expert (or is an expert but in an unrelated area), or<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The person is an expert\nbut has a bias or conflict of interest, or<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The person may be an\nexpert, but the views he holds may not be representative of the majority&nbsp; in the field of expertise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2NKL9RUYGgs/V_3-WEX421I/AAAAAAABMr0/xXdfyQwBoBU8APBCn9sYDNoprktrLRwNgCLcB/s1600/imaww2ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"224\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2NKL9RUYGgs/V_3-WEX421I/AAAAAAABMr0/xXdfyQwBoBU8APBCn9sYDNoprktrLRwNgCLcB/s400/imaww2ges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">################### FEAR MONGERING&nbsp;</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is a propaganda\ntechnique that capitalizes on fear.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fear by-passes the\nrational parts of our brain. It makes us more susceptible to overt or hidden\nmessages in media that are designed to induce fear and anxiety.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Multiple forms of lies\nand deceptive techniques are used to spin fear-mongering stories.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This technique\npsychologically prepares the audience for something that is going to happen\nthat they won't like; or forces the audience to do something by causing them to\nfear something bad will happen to them if they don't do it.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-3WwrjPkcSOo/V_4ISc7kR2I/AAAAAAABMsY/G3GO5Z4nYGQm6GpxvQmoKVqAIfqqJ1scgCLcB/s1600/WWimages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"272\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-3WwrjPkcSOo/V_4ISc7kR2I/AAAAAAABMsY/G3GO5Z4nYGQm6GpxvQmoKVqAIfqqJ1scgCLcB/s400/WWimages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fear mongering or\nscaremongering is the deliberate use of fear based tactics including\nexaggeration and usually repetition to influence the public in order to achieve\na desired outcome.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a tactic used to scare or put fear\ninto those viewing a campaign/advertisement and influence the outcome based on\nfear.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fear is known to be the\nmost powerful emotion as it\u2019s the unknown that we fear. &nbsp;If\npeople are fearful or scared they can react and marketers can use that to their\nfull advantage<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is used in politics\n(particularly when military action, additional taxes or other policies that the\npublic might object to - are planned); and it is also used in marketing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the Appeal to Fear\n- the spin-doctor usually also presents a solution (their solution) to cope\nwith the fear they have induced.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Examples:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Voting for\n\"Mr. A\" for [some claimed reason - commonly untrue] is the same as\nvoting for terrorists. Vote for our guy, Mr. \"B\" - Security for Sure.\"\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Don't lose\nfriends due to your bad breath. Use Brand X for fresh breath for 24\nhours.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-FEwnfi6P1Lo/V_4HZ3ze3uI/AAAAAAABMsQ/BMc4ecg0FY4CbiUGWSrP87t8cEolm8B5ACLcB/s1600/tddh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-FEwnfi6P1Lo/V_4HZ3ze3uI/AAAAAAABMsQ/BMc4ecg0FY4CbiUGWSrP87t8cEolm8B5ACLcB/s400/tddh.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>########### JUMP INTO\nTHE BANDWAGON</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Bandwagon technique\nattempts to persuade the target audience to take a course of action because\n\"everyone else\" (or a given percentage) is taking it or doing it.\n\"Join the crowd.\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Statistics are\npresented (which may be partly or entirely made up) that imply that the\nmajority of people support a certain government policy or a certain product\nthat is for sale etc .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The subconscious\npsychological manipulation that occurs with this technique is to convince the\naudience that a program (or product) is supported by large numbers of&nbsp; people (whether it is or not) - and that it\nis in the interest of the audience to join in because if they don't they may\nlose out.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is also an\nunspoken psychological message that the majority of people will follow the\nwinner. An invitation to \"inevitable victory\" (by joining the\nmajority) lures those not already on the bandwagon to join those already on the\nroad to apparent success.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This type of spin also serves to reassure those\nalready, or partially on the bandwagon - that staying aboard is the best course\nof action. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When confronted with\nbandwagon spin, we should weigh the pros and cons of joining in - independently\nfrom the numbers of people who have already allegedly joined the bandwagon. As\nwith most types of spin, we should seek more information.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As more people come to\nbelieve in something, others also \"hop on the bandwagon\" regardless\nof the underlying evidence. Once bandwagons have enough participants they are\noften self-sustaining and people get on board for social rather than\nideological reasons.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bandwagons often have\nlimited lifetimes and eventually run out of steam. People will quickly abandon\nthe 'sinking ship' if they see others leaving.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bandwagon effect is\na psychological phenomenon in which people do something primarily because other\npeople are doing it, regardless of their own beliefs, which they may ignore or\noverride. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bandwagon effect\nhas wide implications, but is commonly seen in politics and consumer behavior.\nThis phenomenon can also be seen during bull markets and the growth of asset\nbubbles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Examples: <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Everybody's doing\nit.
