Buy Brand Zumba exercise DVD and dance those pounds away.\"&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dKYqdUwXH3w/V_4LWeCI-NI/AAAAAAABMsk/SE9RZ__MEjsSPtdpk8QiwMrQJllCseGSACLcB/s1600/imaXges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dKYqdUwXH3w/V_4LWeCI-NI/AAAAAAABMsk/SE9RZ__MEjsSPtdpk8QiwMrQJllCseGSACLcB/s400/imaXges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>############### &nbsp;FALSE CHOICE - EITHER OR CONUNDRUM</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This reflects a\ndeliberate attempt to eliminate the middle ground on an issue. This technique\ninvolves presenting an issue as consisting of 2 extremes or a limit of only two\nchoices. One choice is typically portrayed as having negative connotations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Relevant details are\noften withheld and other options are not offered.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is often used by\npoliticians. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fW7f68AAGCY/V_4OQeirYTI/AAAAAAABMs4/c7hsUatXIig2XjHKZXUUG_Atr-wkoD9NQCLcB/s1600/downloEEWad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fW7f68AAGCY/V_4OQeirYTI/AAAAAAABMs4/c7hsUatXIig2XjHKZXUUG_Atr-wkoD9NQCLcB/s400/downloEEWad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This technique is used\nto force the audience to make the choice that the spin-doctor wants or to\naccept the choice the spin-doctor has made.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A false dilemma (also\ncalled false dichotomy ) is a type of informal fallacy that involves a\nsituation in which only limited alternatives are considered, when in fact there\nis at least one additional option.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In psychology, a\nphenomenon related to the false dilemma is black-and-white thinking.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Simplification is a\ntechnique related to false choice. With simplification, favorable and\nsimplified&nbsp; generalities are applied to\ncomplex social, political, economic or military problems - and the spin-doctor\nstacks the information provided so that you believe the spun story and proposed\naction is good and the only alternative is bad etc. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Card-stacking\n(selective provision of facts favorable to the spin-doctor's preferred\ndecision) is often also used in this technique.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lesser of two evils\nis another technique used to influence the audience that an undesirable action\nis OK, because it is not as bad as the (only presented) alternative.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-j1VVlp60JFM/V_4NZnCHczI/AAAAAAABMsw/OGlFoWmWOsUQ8MEFj4TJoqs2DtoZIqoRQCLcB/s1600/eng-72-83-r-week-13-dawy-2-april-23-logical-fallacies-13-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-j1VVlp60JFM/V_4NZnCHczI/AAAAAAABMsw/OGlFoWmWOsUQ8MEFj4TJoqs2DtoZIqoRQCLcB/s640/eng-72-83-r-week-13-dawy-2-april-23-logical-fallacies-13-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-oUkn_E_O618/V_4QEs0ejOI/AAAAAAABMtE/3K1qW9AsOMA6PQFy9Ef5BLLoBPGFWEraQCLcB/s1600/propaFganda-11-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-oUkn_E_O618/V_4QEs0ejOI/AAAAAAABMtE/3K1qW9AsOMA6PQFy9Ef5BLLoBPGFWEraQCLcB/s400/propaFganda-11-638.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>############ CARD\nSTACKING , &nbsp;SELECTIVE OMMISSION</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This technique is often\nused on its own. It is a well-known propaganda technique.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a form of spin\nthat is very commonly used by politicians, government bureaucrats, big\nbusinesses, lobby groups, organizations of all types and marketing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The term comes from\ncheating at cards (stacking the deck in your favor).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is used to slant a\nmessage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In using this\ntechnique, facts are selected and presented in such a way as to most\neffectively strengthen and authenticate the point of view of the spinner. It\ninvolves selective omission and is related to censorship, lies of omission and\ntruthiness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">First the spin doctor\nchooses what to present (and what to omit) so that information is presented to\nthe audience in a manner expected to get the desired reaction. Then, these\ncrafted facts (which are half truths or worse) are used as a basis for\nconclusions - leading the audience into accepting the conclusions as a\nconsequence of their accepting the stacked facts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Success or failure\ndepends on how successful the propagandist is in selecting facts or\n\"cards\" and how they \"present\" them or \"stack\"\nthem, and whether or not the audience is gullible enough to accept the story on\nface value.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Card stacking is often\ndifficult to detect because you must decide what is missing from the picture.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-UqB6_bUvxvA/V_4R37cAcCI/AAAAAAABMtQ/yMqzkiO0o8UzvDPCbv45JguWQWHG5JMiQCLcB/s1600/cherrypickiWWng-data-copy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"346\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-UqB6_bUvxvA/V_4R37cAcCI/AAAAAAABMtQ/yMqzkiO0o8UzvDPCbv45JguWQWHG5JMiQCLcB/s400/cherrypickiWWng-data-copy.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span></b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>##########&nbsp; CHERRY PICKING </b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Cherry\nPicking\" is also a propaganda technique, somewhat like \"Card\nStacking\". <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rather than selectively\nomitting data as occurs in \"Card Stacking\" - \"Cherry Picking\ninvolves selectively including data. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It involves selectively\npointing to individual cases or data that supports a particular opinion while\nignoring a significant portion of related cases or data that may contradict\nthat opinion. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cherry picking may be\nunintentional such as when a person uses anecdotal (personal experience) as a\nbasis for conclusions without the intent to deceive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But, with\n\"Spin\", cherry picking is intentional. The objective is to manipulate\nthe evidence to the audience so they come to the conclusion that the spinner\nwants. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Card\nStacking\" and \"Cherry Picking\" are often used together to create\na \"truthiness\" story by spin doctors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cherry picking is a\nfallacy where only select evidence is presented in order to persuade the\naudience to accept a position, and evidence that would go against the position\nis withheld. The stronger the the withheld evidence, the more fallacious the\nargument.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Quote mining is a form\nof cherry picking, and the genuine points used in construction of straw man\narguments are typically cherry-picked.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">############ LESSER OF\nTWO EVILS</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This technique is\nrelated to False Choice. The lesser of two evils principle (or lesser evil\nprinciple) is the principle that when faced with selecting from two unpleasant\noptions, the one which is least harmful should be chosen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Spin-doctor\nacknowledges that the course of action being taken is&nbsp; undesirable but that any alternative would\nresult in an outcome far worse. The trick here is that the audience is led to\nbelieve that the choice is limited to one of two choices. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This technique is\ngenerally used to explain the need for sacrifices or to justify the seemingly\nharsh actions that displease the target audience or restrict personal liberties.\nThis technique is often implemented during wartime to convince people of the\nneed for sacrifices or to justify difficult decisions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This technique is also\nused in relation to government policies made in peace time to persuade the\npublic not to act against a policy the government wants to implement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other options are\nwithheld and part or all the truth is often hidden by officials.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Between Scylla and\nCharybdis Odysseus chose to go near Scylla as the lesser of two evils. He lost\nsix of his companions but if he had gone near Charybdis all would be doomed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But allowing a criminal\nto go free is perhaps the lesser of two evils if the alternative is imprisoning\nan innocent person.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span></b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>############# GLITTERING\nGENERALITIES</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Glittering generalities\nare intensely emotionally appealing words so closely associated with highly\nvalued concepts and beliefs that they carry conviction without supporting\ninformation or reason. When these words are used, they demand approval without\nthinking, simply because such an important concept is involved. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though the words and\nphrases are vague and suggest different things to different people, their\nconnotation is always favorable. Glittering Generalities appeal to such\nemotions as love of country, home; desire for peace, freedom, glory, honor,\netc.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They ask for approval without examination of\nthe reason. They are typically used by politicians and propagandists.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we come across an\nidea that is being spun with glittering generalities, we should look beyond the\nemotional call of the words and consider the merits of the idea itself (and the\nfacts related to the idea) - and not be way-laid by our emotional reaction to\nthe words.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A glittering generality\nhas two qualities- it is vague and it has positive connotations. Words and\nphrases such as \"common good\", \"reform\",\n\"courage\", \"democracy\", \"freedom\",\n\"hope\", \"patriotism\", \"strength\", are terms with\nwhich people all over the world have powerful associations, and they may have\ntrouble disagreeing with them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, these words are highly abstract and\nambiguous, and meaningful differences exist regarding what they actually mean\nor should mean in the real world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-74DHrxCQL4M/V_4aPMB7CII/AAAAAAABMtg/e7VwQH13dLoISyZbZu7yvY3E32dMrX9XwCLcB/s1600/propaganWda-2009-41-728.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-74DHrxCQL4M/V_4aPMB7CII/AAAAAAABMtg/e7VwQH13dLoISyZbZu7yvY3E32dMrX9XwCLcB/s640/propaganWda-2009-41-728.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">############### WEASEL\nWORDS</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Weasels suck the\ncontents of birds' eggs through a small hole, leaving the eggs appearing in\ntact - though actually empty. In other words what is left is an illusion that\nthe egg is a functional egg.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Weasel words are\nqualifying words tacked on to other words that reduce the overall effect of the\nwords and make the statement ambiguous. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bykeXpoKeB0/V_4dDGDn8SI/AAAAAAABMt0/rUHeu8p1URozWCHgrExRS35XWyndeZT_ACLcB/s1600/imSDages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bykeXpoKeB0/V_4dDGDn8SI/AAAAAAABMt0/rUHeu8p1URozWCHgrExRS35XWyndeZT_ACLcB/s400/imSDages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The use of weasel words\nresults in statements that have the appearance of the speaker having said\nsomething meaningful, important and to the point - but they have not. The\nweasel words serve to obscure the fact that claims which may have been made are\nambiguous and assertions unsubstantiated - making the overall statements\nactually vague and misleading, not meaningful.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Words with attached\nweasel words have the appearance of being truthful. But weasel words are often\nused to mislead; to coverup something or to create an impression in the absence\nof facts (or at least in the absence of facts the speaker wants to acknowledge).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Weasel words\neffectively protect the speaker from being definite or from specifically\nadmitting or committing to something.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Weasel words are\npopular amongst some politicians and officials of various organizations\nincluding government as a method to avoid telling the truth without outright\nlying.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They particularly tend to be used when the spinner is questioned on\nmatters liable to draw criticism, censure, loss of a benefit, or punishment of\nsome sort etc.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They are also used to mislead by creating an impression that may\ncause others to believe or do something the speaker wants.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Weasel words are also\ncommon in advertising and marketing spin. In marketing spin&nbsp; weasel words are used to suggest something\nthat will hook the audience to buy-in without risking outright lying.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The goal\nis to create an illusion of truth and a false&nbsp;\nimpression, so that the audience \"fills in the blanks\" and\nmake presumptions to the spinners benefit (without the spinner having to lie\noutright) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A weasel word, or\nanonymous authority, creates an impression that a specific or meaningful\nstatement has been made, when instead only a vague or ambiguous claim has\nactually been communicated. This can enable the speaker to then deny the\nspecific meaning if the statement is challenged.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Weasel words can imply\nmeaning far beyond the claim actually being made. Some weasel words may also\nhave the effect of softening the force of a potentially loaded or otherwise\ncontroversial statement through some form of understatement; for example, using\ndetensifiers such as \"somewhat\" or \"in most respects\"<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-W3lhrQviXKc/V_4ebE4kKdI/AAAAAAABMuA/Gf6C2yIBQbYh3vcL_QmytdYqk-c3PoxsACLcB/s1600/556oughton-copywriting-psychology-for-artists-darker-music-talks-november-13-41-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-W3lhrQviXKc/V_4ebE4kKdI/AAAAAAABMuA/Gf6C2yIBQbYh3vcL_QmytdYqk-c3PoxsACLcB/s640/556oughton-copywriting-psychology-for-artists-darker-music-talks-november-13-41-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most weasel words in it\ncould be divided into three categories:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Numerically vague\nexpressions (for example, \"some people\", \"experts\",\n\"many\")<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Use of the passive\nvoice to avoid specifying an authority (for example, \"it is said\")<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adverbs that weaken\n(for example, \"often\", \"probably\")<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Examples:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The classic:\n\"Mistakes have been made... <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Questions have\nbeen raised...\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"People\nsay...\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Designer shoes\nfrom as little as $20 pair...\" (The \"from as little\" are weasel\nwords that make this a best case description, but the buyer sees Designer and\n$20 and is inclined to be hooked).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fPPTMm1dCSA/V_4cPOmDQMI/AAAAAAABMts/rT5u6HfvfacLjJKBA6kVUFMHfAjZLx-JACLcB/s1600/im23ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fPPTMm1dCSA/V_4cPOmDQMI/AAAAAAABMts/rT5u6HfvfacLjJKBA6kVUFMHfAjZLx-JACLcB/s640/im23ages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Weasel words and\nphrases include \u201cmay,\u201d \u201cmight,\u201d \u201ccould,\u201d \u201ccan,\u201d \u201ccan be,\u201d \u201cvirtually,\u201d \u201cup to,\u201d\n\u201cas much as,\u201d \u201chelp,\u201d \u201clike,\u201d \u201cbelieve,\u201d \u201cpossibly,\u201d and similar qualifiers\nthat create enough wiggle room for a rhino.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /><br /><br /><br /><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1901864705250305380\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Hear no evil, see no evil, speak no\nevil.&nbsp; Regardless of what you know, don't\ndiscuss it -- especially if you are a public figure, news anchor, etc.&nbsp; If it's not reported, it didn't happen, and\nyou never have to deal with the issues. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This was suggested to me by police ( as\ngenuine brotherly /well wisher advise) \u2013why stick your neck out\u2014fuck it captain\nsaab, &nbsp;you alone as an intellectual cant do anything for the\nwatan.. &nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">If you indeed insist to do\nsomething you must be part of a BIG and powerful organisation.</span></i></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-BG7LM-tiavY/V_cS8GcDV0I/AAAAAAABMaQ/bYbE1WSfOjkf0AwLmMciXG8Lv13EPNtvwCLcB/s1600/tdh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-BG7LM-tiavY/V_cS8GcDV0I/AAAAAAABMaQ/bYbE1WSfOjkf0AwLmMciXG8Lv13EPNtvwCLcB/s400/tdh.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; This is also known as the 'How dare you!'\ngambit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-cxXp3RIc0zM/V_caOkreXxI/AAAAAAABMao/CUEkF9cnaBwAJJpNvz2-lFVD2FH675LzgCLcB/s1600/grumpy-cat-meme-itt-dare-you.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">ENGLISH IS A STUPID LANGUAGE WHICH CAN BE TAKEN OUT\nOF CONTEXT&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-eWqFqTe0raM/V_ccvaq9ziI/AAAAAAABMbI/v5Atze_L2rkb1VMo-GWUs-uazY1djXA9gCLcB/s1600/711b1c047ba9a6DRRR5f01451d9c00491be3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: x-large;\"><b>I SHOT THE CLERK ?</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>I SHOT THE CLERK !</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>WE ARE IN THE MIDDLE OF A DANG CONFESSION HERE</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/tCoRww3Px-g/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/tCoRww3Px-g?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-WKBpzTYpeYY/V_cez8ZWI_I/AAAAAAABMbY/J81NUvVCQN0qasyBt8kmBYGkrSaaI6xbwCLcB/s1600/im67ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"182\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-WKBpzTYpeYY/V_cez8ZWI_I/AAAAAAABMbY/J81NUvVCQN0qasyBt8kmBYGkrSaaI6xbwCLcB/s400/im67ages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTEXT CHANGES WITH\nTIME<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example: &nbsp;suppose someone from Kerala says &nbsp;\u201cI expect my trip to Delhi will be easy.\u201d &nbsp;&nbsp;A simple enough statement. But what about the\ncontext, the determining conditions?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today a person can take\na flight .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now suppose it was\nduring the all India &nbsp;riots after Indira\nGandhi\u2019s assassination ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Suppose it was in the\nyear 1300 AD ?</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The statement remains\nexactly the same but the context changes and then so does the meaning and our\nability to draw meaningful conclusions.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3w1ky6TY2QQ/V_cyRprzrOI/AAAAAAABMcQ/NcQoVgh0oTg0lD03jgHByTt-5CFr2E02wCLcB/s1600/downloFad.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3w1ky6TY2QQ/V_cyRprzrOI/AAAAAAABMcQ/NcQoVgh0oTg0lD03jgHByTt-5CFr2E02wCLcB/s1600/downloFad.png\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If I said &nbsp;\"I beat my wife ... . \" it seems to\nmean one thing, but if the rest of that part of the interview was about playing\ntennis &nbsp;with her --&nbsp;&nbsp; but that information isn't included with the\nquote, then the quote is misleading because it was taken out of context. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Context is the set of\ncircumstances, time, place, background, environment within which something\ntakes place. Context determines the conditions and the meaning in which\nsomething is understood.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0xVisf-yjzE/V_cyZoqw8gI/AAAAAAABMcU/qa8Qhgrs93c8tPQP7rc8JeMrBwzrh5aiACLcB/s1600/doWSSwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0xVisf-yjzE/V_cyZoqw8gI/AAAAAAABMcU/qa8Qhgrs93c8tPQP7rc8JeMrBwzrh5aiACLcB/s400/doWSSwnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What the context does\nis set the statement into a very specific reality and its meaning is determined\naccording to that reality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A context is a scheme\nof relations that alters the way we understand things. That set of relations\ncan very broadly and deeply expand out or it can be narrow and pointed making\nthe latter much more easy to grasp and draw definitive conclusions from.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So if you take something out of its scheme\nof relations you shift the base upon which you can draw conclusions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An agenda is\nessentially a list, a plan, or outline of things to be done. Its focus is on\nthose things which must be driven forward, acted upon, or processed. Also an\nagenda is static.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is limited by the list for a given meeting or event\nwhereas a context is dynamic, it is alive in the sense that it moves, grows,\nadvances, recedes, and changes and with that the meanings of the agenda items\nchange.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-spul-yQ7KmI/V_c3H8oWhaI/AAAAAAABMco/Kjk7nEadB9EfR-K9iTj1vWKM0Vq2KGSDACLcB/s1600/context-sytatementdocx-3-728.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-spul-yQ7KmI/V_c3H8oWhaI/AAAAAAABMco/Kjk7nEadB9EfR-K9iTj1vWKM0Vq2KGSDACLcB/s640/context-sytatementdocx-3-728.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example when the\ncontext shifts the urgency of an agenda item can be increased or decreased. For\na meeting to be successful the underlying context should be announced so that\neveryone can be on the same trajectory and decisions can be set up for success.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Context and agenda fit together seamlessly only if this difference is\nunderstood.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dNogji_0020/V_c2kcswpXI/AAAAAAABMck/b6zXzv-pGFEBsKCb_bNWvLyGlhGORCgsACLcB/s1600/dowRGnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dNogji_0020/V_c2kcswpXI/AAAAAAABMck/b6zXzv-pGFEBsKCb_bNWvLyGlhGORCgsACLcB/s400/dowRGnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Context is any\ninformation that characterize the environment of an entity (a person, group of\nperson, a place or an object) relevant to the interaction of the application\nand the users . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Context means,\nunderstanding the whole environment and current situation of the entity. &nbsp;In the pure theory, modeling context consist\nin answer the questions associated with the entity and the action: Who was the\nentity, Where the action took place, What the actions were, When did it happen,\nand How it performed the action.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-aK5DVSuSqBs/V_dLXjHaE9I/AAAAAAABMdo/UM1QcfU1-J4eEmwAdS36OP9jmknvxiazACLcB/s1600/context-awareness-6TT-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-aK5DVSuSqBs/V_dLXjHaE9I/AAAAAAABMdo/UM1QcfU1-J4eEmwAdS36OP9jmknvxiazACLcB/s640/context-awareness-6TT-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Context-awareness aims\nto enable better service delivery through proactively adapting use, access,\nstructure and behavior of information, services applications and physical\nresources with respect to available context information .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-o3c5xTbiORA/V_dHxox1OiI/AAAAAAABMc8/UcSiCiJpHr4LnxQ8J2Bsbr5N9QfULAM1wCLcB/s1600/conquering-mobilse-advertising-holy-grail-contextawareness-matters-dilip-mistry-semusi-7-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-o3c5xTbiORA/V_dHxox1OiI/AAAAAAABMc8/UcSiCiJpHr4LnxQ8J2Bsbr5N9QfULAM1wCLcB/s640/conquering-mobilse-advertising-holy-grail-contextawareness-matters-dilip-mistry-semusi-7-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the other hand,\nSituation-awareness means the understanding of the events related with the\nentity and its context in a concrete situation by determining its role. &nbsp;In that way, the situation could be seen as a\ncourse of events that evolves to more sophisticated relations between entities\n(or even situations). <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GrdquBzssdQ/V_dJFclSR5I/AAAAAAABMdM/tqnnstjMYAEZqOM32hK7NtVgm5AMeYo0wCLcB/s1600/Blog-Situational-Ahhwareness-slideshare.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GrdquBzssdQ/V_dJFclSR5I/AAAAAAABMdM/tqnnstjMYAEZqOM32hK7NtVgm5AMeYo0wCLcB/s400/Blog-Situational-Ahhwareness-slideshare.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The situations change\nwith certain probability from one condition into another (or the same one)\naccording the incoming events, so, it aims to predict what is the current\nsituation and what will be the next one <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/--jnicDqqpS0/V_dJQtqEVwI/AAAAAAABMdU/A-XWKcPiS-csh1_ctJtTdLFV2xwjXaFZQCLcB/s1600/imager2021.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"248\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/--jnicDqqpS0/V_dJQtqEVwI/AAAAAAABMdU/A-XWKcPiS-csh1_ctJtTdLFV2xwjXaFZQCLcB/s400/imager2021.gif\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Situational Awareness\nis the ability to identify, process, and comprehend the critical elements of\ninformation about what is happening to the team with regards to the mission.\nMore simply, it's knowing what is going on around you.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-bxre5eHjv60/V_dJd8yctNI/AAAAAAABMdY/_gAqZvHpgzsyxg5Obiafn_BXdSWs74XMgCLcB/s1600/downltttad.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-bxre5eHjv60/V_dJd8yctNI/AAAAAAABMdY/_gAqZvHpgzsyxg5Obiafn_BXdSWs74XMgCLcB/s400/downltttad.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/dynamic-risk-assessment-on-chemical.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/dynamic-risk-assessment-on-chemical.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ii5t7eK3NCk/V_dIeGuHFzI/AAAAAAABMdA/eGOcnutTZKUs2XOzRHBDPwYMyh2i3gP0gCLcB/s1600/team-situational-awareness-and-architectural-dechhision-making-with-the-software-architecture-warehouse-8-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ii5t7eK3NCk/V_dIeGuHFzI/AAAAAAABMdA/eGOcnutTZKUs2XOzRHBDPwYMyh2i3gP0gCLcB/s400/team-situational-awareness-and-architectural-dechhision-making-with-the-software-architecture-warehouse-8-638.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Situations are often\ndefined as, \"the condition\" or \"the current state of\naffairs\". <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Therefore, the term\n\"situation\" is more knowledge and information rich than\n\"context\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Context is commonly\ndefined as \"the set of circumstances or facts that surround a particular\nevent, situation, etc.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Therefore,\n\"context\" is used to describe, define and detect\n\"situations\" and generally speaking, the more context you have, the\nbetter a situation can be \"perceived.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">DUFFER LAWYERS TURNED\nJUDGES CANT GRASP ALL THIS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-oxEMCigRS8E/V_dwvfY00RI/AAAAAAABMd8/r12ZfuXTAskBmvj-EqRkY77qPheGKh8nwCLcB/s1600/slide_1r6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-oxEMCigRS8E/V_dwvfY00RI/AAAAAAABMd8/r12ZfuXTAskBmvj-EqRkY77qPheGKh8nwCLcB/s400/slide_1r6.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As nouns the difference\nbetween circumstance and context is that \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">---circumstance is that\nwhich attends, or relates to, or in some way affects, a fact or event; an attendant\nthing or state of things \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">while --<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- context is the\nsurroundings, circumstances, environment, background or settings that\ndetermine, specify, or clarify the meaning of an event or other occurrence. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Context is a very\npowerful thing\u2014our DUFFER LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES cant figure it out. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-lKrnDKhbAjc/V_dwUholjtI/AAAAAAABMd4/nbRxMc7aBrEffcpJwNKn2jRR8HuWIHBzwCLcB/s1600/dofrwnload.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-lKrnDKhbAjc/V_dwUholjtI/AAAAAAABMd4/nbRxMc7aBrEffcpJwNKn2jRR8HuWIHBzwCLcB/s400/dofrwnload.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Much more than a catch\nphrase for politicians caught out with a gaff (\u201cI may have said that but you\u2019re\ntaking it completely out of context\u201d)--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>It can mean the\ndifference between a message and meaning, a presence and an inner truth, and\neven one\u2019s definition of right and wrong.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Almost anything which happens in life has\nmeanings which differ depending on the context in which it occurs.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Likewise, context is vital to any case.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">JUDGES MUST TRAINED IN CONTEXT .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS POST CAN BE IN THE CURRICULUM FOR\nTRAINING JUDGES \u2013&nbsp; LEAVE OUT ORNAMENTS -- NAY-- BAD WORDS\nLIKE TWAT , CHOOT AND CUNT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-sG2ahGpEvT8/V_d0Zl2UccI/AAAAAAABMeM/vlDar9hoaIoERsFgDNlz4uR42rEJweStACLcB/s1600/c4ontext.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-sG2ahGpEvT8/V_d0Zl2UccI/AAAAAAABMeM/vlDar9hoaIoERsFgDNlz4uR42rEJweStACLcB/s400/c4ontext.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ignoring context can\nnot only hinder an investigation but can leave both the investigator and client\nliable for missed information.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-YNzWyi76V_Q/V_d27m94hyI/AAAAAAABMeg/s-KNIjGs1woLLy36lXp6DuH8LsIWhxaAwCLcB/s1600/13704353_166w7423076914644_220152203_n.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-YNzWyi76V_Q/V_d27m94hyI/AAAAAAABMeg/s-KNIjGs1woLLy36lXp6DuH8LsIWhxaAwCLcB/s400/13704353_166w7423076914644_220152203_n.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A JUDGE WHO IGNORES\nCONTEXT MUST BE SACKED\u2014OR IMPEACHED \u2013 IF IT MAKES THE DUFFER MELORDS FEEL ANY\nBETTER . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TO BE FRANK , HOW MANY DUFFER JUDGES CAN READ THIS POST ( TWICE ) AND THEN EXPLAIN IT BACK TO SOMEONE ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Context helps all understand\nwhat they otherwise wouldn't be able to comprehend.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: orange; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: orange; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b>Below: KOSHER justice !</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bb8AmzgkDfM/V_d2P96ey2I/AAAAAAABMeY/tTTGISZHvU8x27cLboIcdr_dpKmcBR62gCLcB/s1600/goCb6ifj-tw1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"468\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bb8AmzgkDfM/V_d2P96ey2I/AAAAAAABMeY/tTTGISZHvU8x27cLboIcdr_dpKmcBR62gCLcB/s640/goCb6ifj-tw1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3718834756241828927\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_56M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. &nbsp; Most DUFFER collegium judges are swayed by non-sequitur.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
