W. Bush tells the US troops: --</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;\"It\nis wonderful to bravely, patriotically, serve your country and fight terrorism.\nI am committed to fighting terrorism. Some of you may die in this war, but that\nis a sacrifice that I am willing to make. Bring 'em on!\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/one-and-only-one-bush-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/one-and-only-one-bush-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">MOST OF OUR COLLEGIUM , LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES ARE NO BETTER THAN BUSH</b><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The supporters of\nGeorge W. Bush insist that having investigations to discover the truth behind\nBush's many, many mistakes, deceptions, and false statements regarding the war\nin Iraq would not be good for America:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"We can't discover\nthe truth right now; we are in a war against terrorism.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">That is a non sequitur.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Senior George Bush was\nin Dubai, where he was harshly criticized for the foreign policy of the United\nStates and the military adventurism of his son. &nbsp;Papa Bush responded, \"How come everybody\nwants to come to the United States if the United States is so bad?\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That is a non sequitur.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are many good reasons\nfor wanting to come to the United States which do not imply approval of George\nW.'s bombing and invasion of Afghanistan and Iraqi, or his policy of\nunquestioning support of Israel. &nbsp;One\ngood reason for coming to the USA is to get away from American bombing in their\nnations . Another good reason is to get away from American-trained death squads\nin military dictatorships around the world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another non sequitur: a\ncult old-timer declares, \"I dedicated my life to the cult. I worked hard\nfor 20 years to promote it and recruit new members. Therefore I am noble and\nselfless and the cult is wonderful, and we all live lives of self-sacrifice to\nhelp others.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This non sequitur might\nbe called \"proof by delusion\": \"I saw lights, so it was a\nspiritual experience.\" Many FAKE gurus in India claim this.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Non sequitur means\n\"it does not follow\" \u2014 the logic is broken. If there is a chain of\nargument, every link in the chain must work.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A non sequitur can be\nsomething like this:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"I supported\nterrorists today. &nbsp;I did just a little\nbit of &nbsp;cannabis , I thought I was just\nhaving fun, but I gave money to terrorists when I did that.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WE DONT WANT LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES IN INDIA .. . &nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WE DONT WANT ANTI-WATAN , ANTI-HINDU ATHEIST COMMIE JUDGES IN INDIA.</b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consider one of Mormon Mitt\nRomney\u2019s most famous remarks: \"Corporations are people, my friend.\"\nWhen the audience jeered, he elaborated: \"Everything corporations earn\nultimately goes to people. Where do you think it goes? Whose pockets? Whose\npockets? People\u2019s pockets.\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fact that people\nget money from corporations does not mean that corporations are people,\nentitled to human rights, like freedom of speech or the right to vote.\nCorporations cannot be imprisoned for their crimes, can they? Or be given the\ndeath sentence for polluting children to death. Or die of old age. Or get\ncancer. Or bleed and suffer.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Corporations are actually just legal fictions that\nallow some people to do business without being liable for the consequences of\ntheir actions. If the same people do business as a partnership, they can be put\nin prison for their crimes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The modus operandi of\nthe JNU commie professors and Naxal indoctrination party is to make people feel\nguilty.&nbsp; They were made to feel guilty\nfor being part of \"a rich racist and fascist society where they never\ncared about the fate of the poor dalit/ tribal \u201c. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then the dalits/ tribals had\nto confess that in self-criticism sessions, and then the only way to atone for\nsuch sins was to love and praise the wonderful Chinese Communist society where\neveryone was equal (but some people were more equal than others).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NCW HAS BEEN CREATED IN\nINDIA BY THE BILDERBERG CLUB SO THAT THE PLAYING FIELD&nbsp; CAN BE TILTED.&nbsp; ANY WOMAN CAN CRY MOLESTATION. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PROMISING&nbsp;&nbsp;CAREERS OF MEN CAN BE PULVERISED WITHIN\nSECONDS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-vf3dd5HNkcg/V_j9sbfV_MI/AAAAAAABMfs/hv5NffmbdLkJxHiSkYz3Ixi7owxX7UzLACLcB/s1600/imGGJages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-vf3dd5HNkcg/V_j9sbfV_MI/AAAAAAABMfs/hv5NffmbdLkJxHiSkYz3Ixi7owxX7UzLACLcB/s400/imGGJages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even consensual sex\nbased on a promise of marriage, cannot be termed as rape in case the promise is\nnot fulfilled.&nbsp; No man wants to marry a\nLIVE IN &nbsp;woman who is having sex with\ndozens of men behind his back.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When there is\ninsufficient supporting evidence to determine whether an accusation is true or\nfalse, it is described as \"unsubstantiated\" or \"unfounded\".\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Accusations that are\ndetermined to be false based on corroborating evidence can be divided into\nthree categories:-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>An allegation that is\ncompletely false in that the events that were alleged did not occur;<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>An allegation that\ndescribes events that did occur, but were perpetrated by an individual who is\nnot accused, and in which the accused person is innocent.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>An allegation that is\npartially true and partially false, in that it mixes descriptions of events\nthat actually happened with other events that did not occur.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN WESTERN NATIONS MORE\nTHAN 20% OF RAPE CHARGES LEVELED BY LIVE IN WOMEN HAVE BEEN FOUND TO BE FALSE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TFu0_jHzrpg/V_j81pupUkI/AAAAAAABMfk/LWgpTD1RTfwbhjuCjq8yVhe-tQy-ND99wCLcB/s1600/im5K9ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALMOST ALL HOMOSEXUALS\nARE PEDOPHILES. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;YET WHEN A PEDOPHILIA\n&nbsp;ACCUSATION IS MADE AGAINST A HOMOSEXUAL\n, THE LAW ( SPONSORED BY THE NEW WORLD ORDER ) IS VERY LAX.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">IN INDIA A LOT OF WORK\nPLACE SEXUAL BULLYING/ HARASSMENT &nbsp;CHARGES , IS WHEN THE&nbsp; WOMAN IS DENIED A PROMOTION OR A RAISE \u2013 BECAUSE\nSHE IS NOT GOOD ENOUGH</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tl6oBHGcDh4/V_j7vsqkLTI/AAAAAAABMfc/XzOC57hPCSQLGbo0vx2YdidBYIp-zMX_wCLcB/s1600/ffe61edEEE5d3823bd618d504fd8ee29978.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tl6oBHGcDh4/V_j7vsqkLTI/AAAAAAABMfc/XzOC57hPCSQLGbo0vx2YdidBYIp-zMX_wCLcB/s400/ffe61edEEE5d3823bd618d504fd8ee29978.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Some women are addicted\nto the foul game of BLOW HOT BLOW COLD.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_124M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice_7.html?showComment=1475946222206#c7872716043370102309\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">October 8, 2016 at 10:33 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_124MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nEVERY TIME MANISH TIWARI COMES ON TV HE GIVES SMART ALEC FUNDA-<br />\n<br />\nHOUND BEFORE HARE<br />\n<br />\nCART BEFORE HORSE<br />\n<br />\nFALSE DISCHOTOMY ( WITHOUT KNOWING WHAT THE FUCK IT IS )<br />\n<br />\nBLAH BLHA<br />\n<br />\nNOW HIS LATEST FUNDA IS \"DISCOURSE DOMINANCE \"--WITHOUT KNOWING WHAT IT IS<br />\n<br />\nDominant discourse is a way of speaking or behaving on any given topic \u2014 it is the language and actions that appear most prevalently within a given society. These behaviors and patterns of speech and writing reflect the ideologies of those who have the most power in the society.<br />\n<br />\nA problem with dominant discourse is that it can become so ingrained within a society that few people challenge the norm. Without these challenges, few new ideas enter the mainstream. The society thus may stagnate and fail to progress. Even when people want to challenge the dominant paradigm, they may fail to do so if they lack the power to get their message or behaviors far enough into the public eye<br />\n<br />\nDominant discourse is the ability in decision making to see something in a different way.<br />\n<br />\nDominant discourse gives us the prevailing \"accepted\" rules of everyday living as practiced by our decision-makers. Dominant discourse rarely includes the perspective of the Other, the non-power holding Other.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">IN ANCIENT INDIA WE NEVER ALLOWED DOMINANT DISCOURSE. IT WAS WIN -WIN --THE SWEET BANQUET OF THE MIND.</span></b><br />\nGOD DISCOURSE SINKS WIN-LOSE DIFFERENCES AND SEEKS AGREEMENTS<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />THE RABID ANTI-MODI TRAITORS WONT UNDERSTAND ALL THIS.</span></b><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">A lot of our judges suffer from APOPHENIA. &nbsp; Some are so anti-Hindu that they see Hindus as superstitious savages.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-C9WM69RXUvc/V_lTYOf4VgI/AAAAAAABMgI/zwTp6RzgtEELLjMHFBWkVO4pS0stupbMQCLcB/s1600/imagMMes.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-C9WM69RXUvc/V_lTYOf4VgI/AAAAAAABMgI/zwTp6RzgtEELLjMHFBWkVO4pS0stupbMQCLcB/s640/imagMMes.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apophenia is also known\nas \"seeing through tinted lenses\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People's brains have an\nunfortunate tendency to see what they expect to see, and only notice what they\nwant to see. Once somebody buys into a peculiar model of reality, a perceptual\nfilter kicks in where they notice more and more \"facts\" that appear\nto reinforce their chosen beliefs, and they ignore any conflicting information\nthat comes along, so they become more and more convinced of the correctness of\ntheir beliefs: \"It's all so obvious to anyone who learns the real\ntruth!\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apophenia is the\nexperience of seeing meaningful patterns or connections in random or\nmeaningless data.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"All of us show\nbias when it comes to what information we take in. We typically focus on\nanything that agrees with the outcome we want.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"We need to\nacknowledge our tendency to incorrectly process challenging news and actively\npush ourselves to hear the bad as well as the good.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some phenomena\nclassified under the general umbrella of apophenia include:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Clustering illusion:\nRelated to an inability to recognise actual random patterns. Uneven clusters\ncaused by true randomness are mistaken for patterns.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Confirmation bias: A\nbias towards testing to confirm ones' hypothesis rather than disprove it.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Gambler's fallacy:\nFeeling that past events reflect and alter probability when, in fact, they\ndon't.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Pareidolia: Seeing\nshapes, most often faces, in random patterns</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A feeling of a loss of\ncontrol can increase the detection of false patterns in random data such as\nvisual noise and <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">stock market reports.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VGy3AgUScyw/V_lUHTFcNQI/AAAAAAABMgM/rPSRJvuyhf4zDcpU3GDX8NA8ewsjK_I-gCLcB/s1600/download23.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"318\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VGy3AgUScyw/V_lUHTFcNQI/AAAAAAABMgM/rPSRJvuyhf4zDcpU3GDX8NA8ewsjK_I-gCLcB/s400/download23.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Human perception can,\nat times, be unreliable and one notable flaw in our capabilities of sensory\nperception which indicates this is a phenomenon known as &nbsp;apophenia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pareidolia is the name\ngiven to a psychological phenomenon which is usually brought on by images or\nsounds that we don\u2019t consciously recognize.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PERCEPTION IS PATTERN\nMATCHING<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8-ZE0xcXwj4/V_lZY-uHADI/AAAAAAABMgk/JxpbjxTtBgQF5yesnGPSivGsn_ZSaWTUQCLcB/s1600/imag4BDes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8-ZE0xcXwj4/V_lZY-uHADI/AAAAAAABMgk/JxpbjxTtBgQF5yesnGPSivGsn_ZSaWTUQCLcB/s400/imag4BDes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This causes our minds\nto search the subconscious \u2018database\u2019 for similar patterns stored in our\nmemory, which causes us to see things that are not really there.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1jKkyD1msMU/V_lZ3rq5-mI/AAAAAAABMgo/zrzg5XwyYOgKTWfRPS7fhjTNZ__bvRPOwCLcB/s1600/ima8ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1jKkyD1msMU/V_lZ3rq5-mI/AAAAAAABMgo/zrzg5XwyYOgKTWfRPS7fhjTNZ__bvRPOwCLcB/s400/ima8ges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although apophenia and\npareidolia are essentially the same thing, apophenia is the name given to the\nactual experience, whereas the term pareidolia is the name given to describe\nthe psychological phenomenon.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Humans are\npattern-seeking, storytelling animals. We look for and find patterns in our\nworld and in our lives, then weave narratives around those patterns to bring\nthem to life and give them meaning. Such is the stuff of which myth, religion,\nhistory, and science are made<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_9lCSWt5f0I/V_lYY-SLD1I/AAAAAAABMgc/pa70r7hxGPcePuxH0uD2t9o7_b2B7zShwCLcB/s1600/imagUKes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_9lCSWt5f0I/V_lYY-SLD1I/AAAAAAABMgc/pa70r7hxGPcePuxH0uD2t9o7_b2B7zShwCLcB/s400/imagUKes.jpg\" width=\"283\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_143M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice_7.html?showComment=1475982924896#c7878983590831945437\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">October 9, 2016 at 8:45 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_143MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nMORE AND MORE ROTHSCHILD PAYROLL REPUBLICAN SENATORS ARE CALLING DONALD TRUMP TO WITHDRAW FROM THE PRESIDENTIAL RACE<br />\n<br />\nSO WHAT HAS TRUMP DONE?<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS HIS DEADLY SIN ?<br />\n<br />\nHE JUST TALKED LIKE A NORMAL MAN IN HIS YOUNGER DAYS.<br />\n<br />\nYOU HAVE NO IDEA WHO WE SAILORS TALK OVER A DRINK AT SEA<br />\n<br />\nWHAT MATTERS IS DEEDS NOT WORDS<br />\n<br />\nIF ANY WOMAN READS MY BLOGS --FULL OF TWITS, TWATS, CUNTS AND SHIT -- SHE WILL THINK I AM A BAD MAN<br />\n<br />\nASK MY WIFE WHO I AM -- THAT IS ME --SHE WILL VOUCH THAT I AM NO MISOGYNIST.<br />\n<br />\nI KNOW HOW TO EXPOSE EVIL WOMEN AND WHORES. I KNOW THESE PMS/ EGO LADEN UGLY BARREN WOMEN WHOSE HORMONES RULE THE STATES THEY RULE. I KNOW THESE WOMEN LIB HEROINES WHO CANT CHANGE A CAR TYRE , WHO SAY THEY ARE EQUAL TO MAN , YET WANT TO BE RESCUED FROM SINKING SHIPS EVEN BEFORE THE CHILDREN.<br />\n<br />\nDONALD TRUMP ONLY TALKED .<br />\n<br />\nAND WHAT HE SAID IS RIGHT. YANK WOMEN ARE GOLD DIGGERS . IF YOU ARE RICH AND FAMOUS THEY WILL ALLOW YOU TO GRAB PUSSY--EVEN IF YOU ARE UGLY.<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">WHAT WERE MAHAMERUS LIKE JOHN F KENNEDY AND BILL CLINTON DOING?</span></b><br />\n<br />\nWHILE TALKING TO PRESIDENTS OF OTHER NATIONS IN THEIR OFFICE IN WHITE HOUSE , A WOMAN WAS CROUCHING BETWEEN THEIR LEGS AND GIVING THEM A BLOW JOB UNDER THE PRESIDENTIAL DESK<br />\n<br />\nWE ALL HEARD OF MARILYN MONROE AND MONICA LEWINSKY .<br />\n<br />\nSO TRUMP LISTEN UP<br />\n<br />\nAND LISTEN GOOD<br />\n<br />\nIN YOUR SECOND PRESIDENTIAL DEBATE TELL THE STUPID HILLY BILLY YANKS THE EQUATION.<br />\n<br />\nTELL THE ROTHSCHILD PAY ROLL VICE PRESIDENT AND REPUBLICAN SENATORS TO CATCH AND SWING --FIRST FROM PORT TO STARBOARD AND THEN FROM FORWARD TO AFT.<br />\n<br />\nTELL THEM ONLY DEEDS MATTER -NOT WORDS<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>FACTA NON VERBA -YOU BILDERBERG CUNTS !</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Go88ajNp4oY/V_m3WbxNRcI/AAAAAAABMg8/steSpZ5vNHwzQBGEqAEquNHzUL9uKiX9QCLcB/s1600/Love-is-showDn-in-your-words.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Go88ajNp4oY/V_m3WbxNRcI/AAAAAAABMg8/steSpZ5vNHwzQBGEqAEquNHzUL9uKiX9QCLcB/s320/Love-is-showDn-in-your-words.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now I will talk about\nAD HOMINEM PERSONAL ATTACKS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YESTERDAY ON TV I SAW\nA DISCUSSION , BETWEEN MANISH SISODIA, TAREK FATAH, SWAMY AND NAPALAT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN MANISH SISODIA WAS\nGETTING SCREWED BY TAREK FATAH , HE CALLED HIM AN OUTSIDER.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS MADE TAREK FATAH\nRETORT &nbsp; &nbsp;\u201c OH , I DID NOT KNOW ONLY INDIANS ARE ALLOWED TO SPEAK IN THIS\nDISCUSSION \u201c&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--AND THE HE KEPT PEERING\nINTO HIS MOBILE PHONE TILL THE DISCUSSION ENDED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you can't refute\nfactual arguments, kill the messenger. &nbsp;Have\nfun with character assassination. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Attack the arguer and\nnot the argument. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ad Hominem includes\nslurs, slander, libel, innuendo, baseless accusations, irrelevant criticism,\ngroundless denunciations, and name-calling.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HfOl_b7rIAo/V_oKQSobrAI/AAAAAAABMhc/PARvUBtsNbgFUDC5dHJlQwzAJvHjgCajACLcB/s1600/slidWWWe_6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HfOl_b7rIAo/V_oKQSobrAI/AAAAAAABMhc/PARvUBtsNbgFUDC5dHJlQwzAJvHjgCajACLcB/s400/slidWWWe_6.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"You are an\noutsider.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"You are just\ntrying to make us look bad.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"You are in\ndenial.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"You are just up\ntight. Don't be so up tight.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"You don't know\nwhat you are talking about.\"</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"You are carrying\non like an old woman.\"</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-V54EmZhrPug/V_oEIWY_dxI/AAAAAAABMhM/YqHrTyjzTEwUfhob44dyvjHjsRnJBcP-QCLcB/s1600/doB67wnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-V54EmZhrPug/V_oEIWY_dxI/AAAAAAABMhM/YqHrTyjzTEwUfhob44dyvjHjsRnJBcP-QCLcB/s400/doB67wnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Name calling is a kind\nof ad hominem attack, but it has a special power and flavor all its own.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you can't answer a\nman's argument, all is not lost; you can still call him vile names.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This technique is\nsimple and obvious: you just call your opponents names, preferably really\nderogatory and slanderous names, like this:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"You are a right\nwing hyper nationalist, and a liar.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apply labels to things\nor people \u2014 especially derogatory labels. This is very similar to name-calling.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If someone talks about\nuniversal health care, scream \"That's Brahmanism !\"</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If someone talks about\npeace and freedom and justice, complain, \"That's a Liberal agenda.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Delegitimize one's\nopponent so as to avoid addressing the substance of his argument. This is\nanother kind of ad hominem attack.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">The goal is to make it impossible for\nopponents to be heard respectfully in the debate.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\"Those protesters\nare just a bunch of unruly hotheads .\"<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">THIS METHOD WAS USED BY\nGANDHI,NEHRU AND PATEL , DURING THE INDIAN NAVY MUTINY.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; THEY DID NOT WANT THEIR SHEEN TO GET\nTARNISHED.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">AFTER ALL ROTHSCHILD\nCHOSE THEM TO LEAD THE FREEDOM MOVEMENT<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/the-indian-navy-mutiny-of-1946-only-war.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/the-indian-navy-mutiny-of-1946-only-war.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Attempt to delegitimize\nannoying and inconvenient little facts and evidence by a variety of techniques\nlike bad logic, slurs, and innuendo. Similarly, dismiss criticism as invalid\nwithout actually answering it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For instance:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"That report is\nold hat.\" (Dismiss by Antiquity, reject by age.)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Everybody\nconsiders that blogpost is fiction.\" (Appeal to \"everybody\nknows\".)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"You are\ncriticizing Israel's mistreatment of the Palestinian people because you are\nanti-Semitic and racist.\" (Use of ad hominem.)</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; HE WAS MOST SINCERE CONSCIENTIOUS IN HIS JOB . .<br />\n<br />\nAS SOON AS HE ENTERED I CLOSED THE DOOR AND ASKED HIM \u201d SOMETHING IS EATING YOU UP\u2014I WANT TO KNOW WHY\u201d<br />\n<br />\nHe said \u2013\u201c the Korean Supercargo ( a captain ) came on board after midnight, he came to the CCR and I gave him the owners cabin key and told him where to find his cabin. He handed over his brief case to me and ordered me to carry it to his cabin. So I asked him, if I was a white skinned British or German officer, if h would do the same thing \u201c<br />\n<br />\n\u201c On the way to the owner\u2019s cabin, this Korean captain ( come as Cargo Superintendent appointed by US charterers ) kept GIGGLING LOUDLY . After that my mind has just chatters , I cant concentrate \u2013as the insult was too deep , it has scarred my mind. I feel ashamed to be an Indian with brown skin\u201c<br />\n<br />\nI replied \u201c This Korean Captain is now sleeping , as he has given wake up call instruction to the CCR . Go to the owners cabin, wake him up and say Captain wants to see you on the bridge in 300 SECONDS \u201c<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">My second mate held my wrist , HARD, like how my wife would do when I was about to lose my restraint \u2013Sir let it be \u2013I know what you will do now\u201d</span><br />\n<br />\nI replied to this well wisher \u2019 Follow my orders\u201d<br />\n<br />\nWithin 300 seconds the Korean was on the navigating bridge with an angry indignant look.<br />\n<br />\nHe knew Captain was aware of the brief case incident \u2013as he asked the second mate on the way up, if he told the Captain.<br />\n<br />\nI ordered him\u201d There are six barges along side my ship. I will allow only two. I order you to give orders within 600 SECONDS . If you don\u2019t do that I will shut cargo operations and call up your bosses in USA to remove you from my ship\u201d<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />THE YANK TOP BOSS WAS MY FAN. &nbsp;MY SHIT WOULD NOT SMELL FOR HIM.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nThe Korean Captain had pull with the Jap owners and made them call my bosses to tell them that I insulted the Supercargo.<br />\n<br />\nMy bosses wanted an explanation.<br />\n<br />\nI said \u201c I take decisions on my ship-PERIOD \u201c<br />\n<br />\nINDIA IS FULL OF TRAITORS WHO DON\u2019T LOVE THE WATAN. THIS IS WHY BHARATMATA WAS IN CHAINS FOR 800 YEARS.<br />\n<br />\nJUST MAKE AN EXAMPLE OF A FEW TRAITORS LIKE SLIMY MANI , AND SEE HOW ALL FALL IN LINE.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img kasperskylab_antibanner=\"on\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1TmA2Q8dmoI/UwiDv2Fb3eI/AAAAAAAApp4/Gfi3eJL51UI/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2911920412081354077\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_23M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Between 1988 and 1992 they acquired 60 per cent of Aruba through investments in hotels, casino's and the election-campaign of a Prime Minister. Aruba looked set to be the first independent state under Mafia control.<br />\n<br />\nThe first Jews in Aruba were Sephardi Jewish immigrants from Netherlands and Portugal.<br />\n<br />\nThe first Jew to settle in Aruba was a Portuguese-Jewish worker for the Rotshchild owned Dutch West Indies Company named Moses Solomon Levie Maduro, who arrived in Aruba with his family in 1754.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">The current Prime Minister of Aruba Mike Eman is Jewish. font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">But he allowed LAWS OF\nKARMA to be paramount.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Krishna\u2019s written job was to kill two minor characters\nShishupala ( Jaya ) and Dantavakra ( Vijaya )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/09/shishupala-and-dantavakra-third-re.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/09/shishupala-and-dantavakra-third-re.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Krishna\u2019s unwritten duty was to decimate the\nKaurava&nbsp; brothers\u2014all TEST TUBE babies&nbsp; .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Krishna did it \u2013 without sentiments &nbsp;, and how . .&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>--he did NOT lose sight of the context . .</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;
