font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Below: On my ship I held MANAGEMENT COMMITTEE &nbsp;meetings every week. &nbsp;It was all about a TASK and its CONTEXT</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-17lNy0WyJY4/V_KJ_qy2ZqI/AAAAAAABMR8/AABpOzFbZmQXgkeZrhCJgO8N4u_9vUBwACLcB/s1600/jim-albert-quoD1te-if-you-have-some-reason-to-do-something-and-if-you.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-17lNy0WyJY4/V_KJ_qy2ZqI/AAAAAAABMR8/AABpOzFbZmQXgkeZrhCJgO8N4u_9vUBwACLcB/s400/jim-albert-quoD1te-if-you-have-some-reason-to-do-something-and-if-you.jpg\" width=\"399\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>Below: CONTEXT is not lost</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MAoN4rYzfac/V_KK1yY4rCI/AAAAAAABMSA/2_gJFyCWzkIL_2aZFkU0A3HRT9anka5QgCLcB/s1600/2f1e5f1f5R0743ed888af5c18e89cd499.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MAoN4rYzfac/V_KK1yY4rCI/AAAAAAABMSA/2_gJFyCWzkIL_2aZFkU0A3HRT9anka5QgCLcB/s400/2f1e5f1f5R0743ed888af5c18e89cd499.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">IT WAS JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO CREATED THE LEGEND THAT LADY JUSTICE\nIS BLIND<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">JUSTICE MUST NEVER BE BLIND</b></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ccb4JUd4j9I/V_MCTZBEziI/AAAAAAABMSU/VflAtTQkrKUSGobPgcl04CYSUTn9H0fHACLcB/s1600/imagNNMes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ccb4JUd4j9I/V_MCTZBEziI/AAAAAAABMSU/VflAtTQkrKUSGobPgcl04CYSUTn9H0fHACLcB/s400/imagNNMes.jpg\" width=\"353\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #d0e0e3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>In the days of\nApollonius , &nbsp;the Roman PAGAN goddess of\nJustice, held a mirror and a balance with a snake at her feet.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #d0e0e3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: #d0e0e3;\">This was changed\nby Jew Rothschild to a blindfolded woman with a balance and a sword.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-99-PAKIeV-U/V_MdC_QjoBI/AAAAAAABMSo/34r9zt9uLK0IYcZwXYK_xORvWloJweguwCLcB/s1600/imamges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-99-PAKIeV-U/V_MdC_QjoBI/AAAAAAABMSo/34r9zt9uLK0IYcZwXYK_xORvWloJweguwCLcB/s400/imamges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ad hominem: an argument\nthat attacks the person who holds a view or advances an argument, rather than\ncommenting on the view or responding to the argument.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Ad hominem (also\ncalled personal abuse or personal attacks) usually involves insulting or\nbelittling one's opponents in order to attack their claims or invalidate their\narguments, but can also involve pointing out true character flaws or actions\nthat are irrelevant to the opponent's argument. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is logically\nfallacious because it relates to the opponent's personal character, which has\nnothing to do with the logical merit of the opponent's argument<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ad hominem-- attacking the person instead of the argument as done by Hillary Clinton in her\npresidential debate with Donald Trum. . A form of this is reductio ad Hitlerum.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">CONTEXTOMY MUST BE PUNISHABLE IN A COURT OF\nLAW.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>'Contextomy' refers to the selective\nexcerpting of words from their original linguistic context in a way that\ndistorts the source's intended meaning, a practice commonly referred to as\n'quoting out of context'.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>The&nbsp; act\nof quoting a person out of context, is with the aim of winning an argument , by\nmaking an ass of the not so bright judge \u2013by deliberate&nbsp; obfuscation of the quote's actual meaning.</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-cL-zFna-tHc/V_MciGVoN5I/AAAAAAABMSk/j7sAWnIz9m06KfYKkjVAt3I2ooOysOxDQCLcB/s1600/imagFes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"249\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-cL-zFna-tHc/V_MciGVoN5I/AAAAAAABMSk/j7sAWnIz9m06KfYKkjVAt3I2ooOysOxDQCLcB/s400/imagFes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>\u2018Contextomy\u2019 refers to the selective\nexcerpting of words from their original linguistic context in a way that\ndistorts the source\u2019s intended meaning..&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>Contextomy is employed in contemporary\nmass media to promote products, defame public figures and misappropriate\nrhetoric. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>A contextomized quotation not\nonly prompts audiences to form a false impression of the source\u2019s intentions,\nbut can contaminate subsequent interpretation of the quote when it is restored\nto its original context</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-sEVBUKRM72s/V_Nujk1h2pI/AAAAAAABMS8/l_jLJkoOA5kG5QXv55DzVkgfA3nnUKujwCLcB/s1600/redheerring.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"336\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-sEVBUKRM72s/V_Nujk1h2pI/AAAAAAABMS8/l_jLJkoOA5kG5QXv55DzVkgfA3nnUKujwCLcB/s640/redheerring.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>Cherry picking: act of pointing at individual\ncases or data that seem to confirm a particular position, while ignoring a\nsignificant portion of related cases or data that may contradict that position<o:p></o:p></b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: 18.6667px;\">Below: In the US&nbsp;presidential&nbsp;debate slimy Hillary Clinton cherry picked.</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-PxOibCTNyhE/V_Nu-eds2NI/AAAAAAABMTA/OVDnDizLwVgc3WA91DSdVurCkGqmsGh7QCLcB/s1600/cherrypSicking.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"355\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-PxOibCTNyhE/V_Nu-eds2NI/AAAAAAABMTA/OVDnDizLwVgc3WA91DSdVurCkGqmsGh7QCLcB/s400/cherrypSicking.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2940704337529018484\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_84M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice.html?showComment=1475575787805#c2940704337529018484\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">October 4, 2016 at 3:39 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_84MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>ALL POLITICIANS LIKE AJAY ALOK, SANJAY NIRUPAM , KEJRIWAL ETC WHO DEMAND THAT INDIA MUST RELEASE SURGICAL STRIKE VIDEOS ARE DESH DROHIS</b></span><br />\n<br />\nSECRECY MUST BE MAINTAINED.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>ENEMIES OF INDIA WANT TO SEE THIS VIDEO AND CHERRY PICK</b></span> --</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cherry picking,\nsuppressing evidence, or the fallacy of incomplete evidence is the act of\npointing to individual cases or data that seem to confirm a particular\nposition, while ignoring a significant portion of related cases or data that\nmay contradict that position. It is a kind of fallacy of selective attention,\nthe most common example of which is the confirmation bias. This fallacy is a\nmajor problem in public debate.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">BENAMI\nNEWSPAPER POLLS USUALLY DO CHERRY PICKING<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The term is based on\nthe perceived process of harvesting fruit, such as cherries. The picker would\nbe expected to only select the ripest and healthiest fruits. An observer who\nonly sees the selected fruit may thus wrongly conclude that most, or even all,\nof the fruit is in such good condition. This can also give a false impression\nof the quality of the fruit (since it is only a sample and is not a\nrepresentative sample).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>A red herring is an argument, given in\nresponse to another argument, which does not address the original issue.</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Red herring is a &nbsp;clue or piece of information which is\nmisleading or distracting<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE MINING is a form\nof cherry picking, in which the debater selectively picks some quotes\nsupporting a position (or exaggerating an opposing position)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The practice of quoting\nout of context, sometimes referred to as \u201ccontextomy\u201c, is a logical fallacy and\na type of false attribution in which a passage is removed from its surrounding\nmatter in such a way as to distort its intended meaning. &nbsp; &nbsp;Contextomies are\nstereotypically intentional.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JUST AN HOUR BACK\nKACHRAWAAL WAS ON TV . .HE SAYS MODI MUST RELEASE SURGICAL STRIKES VIDEO TO\nCOUNTER PAKISTANI PROPAGANDA THAT THERE WERE NO SURGICAL STRIKES AT ALL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS CALLED SPIN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">INSTEAD OF SAYING HE\nWILL NOT BELIEVE THAT THE SURGICAL STRIKES TOOK PLACE , UNLESS HE CHECK OUT THE\nVIDEO , HE SHOOT FROM BEHIND PAKISTANs SHOULDERS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WE KNOW WITH WHOSE HELP KUJLIWAAL SECURED FOUR LOK SABHA SEATS IN MAY 2014</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Below: Why is this TRAITOR outside jail ?</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/pFV1ap7iRqs/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/pFV1ap7iRqs?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">RELEASING THIS VIDEO\nWILL NOT SERVE BHARATMATAs INTESRESTS AND CHERRY PICKETS ARE WAITING IN AMBUSH.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Think of a spider\nspinning it's web to trap it's prey.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nWould you be willing to be tricked into a trap that was likely to be to\nyour disadvantage? Would you like to know how to recognize the almost invisible\nbut very powerful spiders' webs being spun to capture you each day?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like the spider's web,\nthe type of \"Spin\" we are talking about today uses deception.\nIndividuals, specific groups or the general public are the intended victims.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Advertising and public\nrelations activities which are truthful and either do not use deception (or at\nworst use \"white\" lies) are not regarded as spin. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Spin\" refers\nto the forms of marketing&nbsp; and public relations\nthat use trickery and psychological manipulation. It developed out of military\npropaganda techniques.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It refers to deceptive methods used to create a desired\nimpression upon people; or to create a desired action (or prevent an action) by\na person, group of people or the general public.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spin is spun in response to,\nor in preparation for something. The focus of spin-doctors tends to be on\neither promoting or covering up the actions of their employers (or doing both\nof these). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spinners of the\n\"Spin\" form of marketing and public relations are also referred to as\n\"Spin-Doctors\" (which sounds a bit better than spiders). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">George Orwell's\n\"Squealer Pig\" in Animal Farm was a spin-doctor. Spin doctors\ncommonly work behind the scenes - coaching politicians, managers of large\norganizations (including government) and big businesses; and they often deal\nwith the media on their employer's behalf. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The spinner's of\n\"spin\" usually like to keep out of the limelight in order that their\nemployer will appear to be acting honestly and spontaneously (rather than in a\ncarefully orchestrated fashion).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That's a bit like spiders that tend to stay\naway from their web while they wait for it to catch a victim.&nbsp; But sometimes spin-doctors do act as the\n\"mouthpiece\" for an individual or organization.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spin-doctors are\nusually employed by others and what they do is usually on behalf of others.\nIt's a bit like a boss spider hiring another spider to spin or teach them to\nspin a web as a trap. While the spinning spider creates the trap, the boss\nspider consumes the prey.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Individuals are also capable of spin-doctoring on\ntheir own behalf. Please keep this in mind when reading the rest of this post\nbecause I may refer to spin-doctors, spinners and the employers of spin-doctors\nin the same way because they employ the same techniques.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Likewise, because spin\narose from propaganda, these terms may be used interchangeably</span>.<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The objectives of\nspin-doctors most often involves&nbsp;\npromotion.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The audience is\nmanipulated to: --</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Buy a product or\nservice, or<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vote in a certain way,\nor <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Support a policy such\nas a war, or an economic decision such as a tax measure, or a change in law;\nor, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not support the\ncompetition; or, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not take action that\nwould prevent the spinner having something that he/she wants etc</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Spin-doctors are also\ncommonly involved in damage control or coverups. In these cases the purpose of\nthe spin is to reduce the impact of the negative event, deny it or distract the\npublic away from talking about the problem; and consequently reduce the\nnegative consequences.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spin is not limited to\nany one political party or type of business. Spin-doctors (and those who need\nspin) make extensive use of all forms of media. Consequently, we are exposed to\n\"spin\" on many matters in the media every day.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lies that were spun\nto continuously lure people into investing in financial institutions - when\ntheir managers knew they were bust - is just one example of the negative\nconsequences of spin. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was the birth of the\nnon-military use of propaganda (which subsequently became known as\n\"spin\") on the general public. Owing to the negative connotations\nassociated with the word propaganda, BIG BROTHER &nbsp;&nbsp;introduced the term \"Public\nRelations\". \"Marketing\" became a strong and powerful influence\non the general public.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bernays argued in\nPropaganda (1928), one of his first books--. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"If we understand\nthe mechanisms and motives of the group mind, it is now possible to control and\nregiment the masses according to our will without their knowing it\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/tavistock-institute-creating-herd.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/tavistock-institute-creating-herd.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jew Bernays was the nephew\nof Jew Sigmund Freud. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Bernays believed\nthat manipulation of the masses was necessary.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ExlS8W-uRzk/V_Oa08l47hI/AAAAAAABMTg/cCqpv-Fz0lw78zPQO8xxNh4KNAB-D8U9gCLcB/s1600/berrnays%2B11.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ExlS8W-uRzk/V_Oa08l47hI/AAAAAAABMTg/cCqpv-Fz0lw78zPQO8xxNh4KNAB-D8U9gCLcB/s640/berrnays%2B11.jpeg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;In his 1965 autobiography\nBernays recalls a dinner at his home, where he learned that Jew Goebbels (who was\nin charge of propaganda in Nazi Germany) had been using Bernays work as a\nreference in designing his propaganda campaign against the Jews.</span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/embedded-journalism-immoral-and-false.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/embedded-journalism-immoral-and-false.html</a><o:p></o:p><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_hVvGbZHRPc/V_OepI5NmgI/AAAAAAABMTw/C_73jj_lSL0g7JZsAMo6GOxdHM3y2YR9wCLcB/s1600/dow78nload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_hVvGbZHRPc/V_OepI5NmgI/AAAAAAABMTw/C_73jj_lSL0g7JZsAMo6GOxdHM3y2YR9wCLcB/s400/dow78nload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/hegelian-dialectic-cancer-on-this.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/hegelian-dialectic-cancer-on-this.html</a><o:p></o:p><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tc9JtcOM6QY/V_Oe3gtLusI/AAAAAAABMT0/6ifIoZrlHbEukRfrZOf-opAkKZSa4MyUQCLcB/s1600/dowBNnload.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tc9JtcOM6QY/V_Oe3gtLusI/AAAAAAABMT0/6ifIoZrlHbEukRfrZOf-opAkKZSa4MyUQCLcB/s400/dowBNnload.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/06/cryptos-double-agents-false-flags.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/06/cryptos-double-agents-false-flags.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Out of <b><span style=\"color: red;\">context</span></b>--- but worth knowing .</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-yaqlFRl3ARQ/V_OZxfGmtxI/AAAAAAABMTU/iyQUbCIsf0sR88a19JGqeYHVmn8ZwGKuACLcB/s1600/quote-there-is-one-advantagfe-to-being-poor-a-doctor-will-cure-you-faster-kin-hubbard-329310.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-yaqlFRl3ARQ/V_OZxfGmtxI/AAAAAAABMTU/iyQUbCIsf0sR88a19JGqeYHVmn8ZwGKuACLcB/s640/quote-there-is-one-advantagfe-to-being-poor-a-doctor-will-cure-you-faster-kin-hubbard-329310.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/05/collective-consciousness-and-milling.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/05/collective-consciousness-and-milling.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-x0X4CobxBks/V_OgDvKk3nI/AAAAAAABMUI/H-iv1NCJn8gGUfEvDpFA9IXaHEdlMCLVgCLcB/s1600/imNages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-x0X4CobxBks/V_OgDvKk3nI/AAAAAAABMUI/H-iv1NCJn8gGUfEvDpFA9IXaHEdlMCLVgCLcB/s1600/imNages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/05/when-crowd-tuns-into-mob-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/05/when-crowd-tuns-into-mob-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xK-gib73mT4/V_OfURA5N3I/AAAAAAABMT8/Y9Lorg4e6d4EJFqUHvzDMJCy46EeRjWbACLcB/s1600/iNmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xK-gib73mT4/V_OfURA5N3I/AAAAAAABMT8/Y9Lorg4e6d4EJFqUHvzDMJCy46EeRjWbACLcB/s400/iNmages.jpg\" width=\"281\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>LOGIC MUST NEVER BE OUT\nOF CONTEXT</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To quote out of context\nis to remove a passage from its surrounding matter in such a way as to distort\nits meaning. The context in which a passage occurs always contributes to its\nmeaning, and the shorter the passage the larger the contribution. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For this reason, the\nquoter must always be careful to quote enough of the context not to\nmisrepresent the meaning of the quote. Of course, in some sense, all quotation\nis out of context, but by a \"contextomy\",<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Contextomy is a logical\nfallacy / term that refers to the act of \u201cQuoting Out Of Context.\u201d</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How to do it: simply\nremove a statement or phrase (or even a sentence fragment) from the rest of the\nentire context surrounding it, thus changing the meaning to suit your purpose.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In marketing,\nContextomy is known as Quote Farming. By leaving out a few words, \u201cIt is\nincredible that this music sounds so bad, I would never buy it,\u201d turns into,\n\u201cIt is incredible music. Buy it.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another example of\nContextomy is the contemporary practice of religion, which was made famous for\nits tendency to take entire books out of context.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Contextomy continues to\nexist because:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1.) The truth consists\nof many (often complex) facts<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2.) Facts can be difficult\nto verify by individuals, particularly on advanced subjects</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3.) One sentence is\neasier to understand than a hundred sentences<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">'Contextomy':\nturning \"a terrific <span style=\"color: red;\">bore</span>\" into \"<span style=\"color: red;\">Terrific</span>!\" on a poster</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>SPIT AND RUN TACTICS OF\nKACHRAWAAL&nbsp;</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> -- &nbsp;In any public forum, make a brief attack of your opponent or the\nopponent position and then scamper off before an answer can be fielded, or\nsimply ignore any answer. Simply make an accusation or other attack, never\ndiscussing issues, and never answering any subsequent response, for that would\ndignify the opponent's viewpoint.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Associate opponent\ncharges with old news. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Change the subject.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Emotionalize,\nAntagonize, and Goad Opponents.&nbsp; If you\ncan't do anything else, chide and taunt your opponents and draw them into emotional\nresponses which will tend to make them look foolish and overly motivated, and\ngenerally render their material somewhat less coherent. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ignore proof presented,\ndemand impossible proofs. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">False evidence. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THE KOSHER ADL WAY</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n----Silence critics. If can be by their death, arrest and detention, blackmail\nor destruction of their character by release of blackmail information, or\nmerely by destroying them financially, emotionally, or severely damaging their\nhealth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>AT SEA , BEFORE A\nMEETING I ALWAYS LAID DOWN THE SCOPE AND THE CONTEXT.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">ANYBODY WHO WASTED TIME\nBY STEPPING OUTSIDE THE PERIMETER WOULD BE EXCUSED ONCE, NOT TWICE. &nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THIS KEPT PEOPLE ON THEIR TOES &nbsp;. .&nbsp;</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CVEBGCndDqQ/V_QKR81XctI/AAAAAAABMUs/Mz9_1teZm2I979nqtsUZyupovCCZhPROwCLcB/s1600/imag9Ves.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CVEBGCndDqQ/V_QKR81XctI/AAAAAAABMUs/Mz9_1teZm2I979nqtsUZyupovCCZhPROwCLcB/s400/imag9Ves.jpg\" width=\"379\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Context is the\ncircumstances that form the setting for an event, statement, or idea, and in\nterms of which it can be fully understood. the situation in which something\nhappens : the group of conditions that exist where and when something happens<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Context and agenda fit\ntogether seamlessly only if this difference is understood. Often a meeting will\ntake place without the context being understood by the participants and they\nleave without the force of clarity and clear objectives to guide behavior.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Context is a first\nlevel operator and the agenda is its operational derivative.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-X4Ak6IEmcgA/V_QK2hKMMmI/AAAAAAABMU0/aOVmfPtVTgc8lqxgoBhX8V3oEd410mSUQCLcB/s1600/im456ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"302\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-X4Ak6IEmcgA/V_QK2hKMMmI/AAAAAAABMU0/aOVmfPtVTgc8lqxgoBhX8V3oEd410mSUQCLcB/s400/im456ages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the ship I give pain\nto people who use </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>WE</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"> </span>instead of</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b> I.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I do NOT allow safety in numbers.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was this choot captain--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">He would say-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/ethics-of-human-cloning-decided-6000.html?showComment=1442893285189#c7579617313019109228\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">September 22, 2015 at 9:11 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_6MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSTOP PRESS:<br />\n<br />\nI just had a HUGE laugh.<br />\n<br />\nI was reminded of the spokesman for the waitress , Manish TiwariJI.<br />\n<br />\nHe would literally throw this word DICHOTOMY around \u2014 along with \u201c cart before horse\u201d, \u201c hunt with hounds and run with hare\u201d etc --<br />\n<br />\nBLAH BLAH fuckin\u2019 BLAH.<br />\n<br />\nHey Tiwari JI\u2014suno \u2013<br />\n<br />\n-the uninitiated too \u2013listen up-<br />\n<br />\nDichotomy is a fork into two equal parts\u2014 different .<br />\n<br />\nIt is NOT the difference between two opposite things or a division into two opposite groups<br />\n<br />\nA \"false dichotomy,\" occurs when a situation is unfairly represented as an \"either/or\" scenario.<br />\n<br />\nI never permitted a dichotomy to rule mE life.<br />\n<br />\nI treated mE life as an adventure.<br />\n<br />\nFor me work was play.<br />\n<br />\nMy spare time was less exciting than my work time.<br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEE !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-B-M8d4BHD0Q/V_THaa0KwaI/AAAAAAABMVc/byhD_tlajnUDU3onHu92gNtNb8qETxnKgCLcB/s1600/dSXownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-B-M8d4BHD0Q/V_THaa0KwaI/AAAAAAABMVc/byhD_tlajnUDU3onHu92gNtNb8qETxnKgCLcB/s400/dSXownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The False Dichotomy\ntechnique is very similar to the Either/Or technique.&nbsp; &nbsp;A\ndichotomy is the division of something into two pieces.&nbsp; &nbsp;A\nfalse dichotomy is an attempt to divide something with a false dividing line,\nlike:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can have either\nquantity, or quality, but not both.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some people vote for\nGod, and some people vote Democratic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some people support the\ntroops, while others want to end the war.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some people support\nPresident Bush, while others are not so patriotic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Variations on False\nDichotomy include:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">False Dilemma: The\nchoice presented is only A or B. Rejecting A is selecting B.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bifurcation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Either/Or: Reduce\nreality to, \"Either this is true, or that is true.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Enemy Of My Enemy\nIs My Friend<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hobson's Choice ( Take\nit or leave it- bekadri tako saakadri budu )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alternative Advance<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4SRw3PdgxlM/V_TJu6G4r4I/AAAAAAABMVs/vxIqvcqYtu8MjIQNkCxNfO_wE83oUPsyQCLcB/s1600/Falsedichotomygg-450x450.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4SRw3PdgxlM/V_TJu6G4r4I/AAAAAAABMVs/vxIqvcqYtu8MjIQNkCxNfO_wE83oUPsyQCLcB/s320/Falsedichotomygg-450x450.png\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A dichotomy is a set of\ntwo mutually exclusive, jointly exhaustive alternatives. Dichotomies are\ntypically expressed with the words \"either\" and \"or\", like\nthis: \"Either the test is wrong or the program is wrong.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A false dichotomy is\ntypically used in an argument to force your opponent into an extreme position\n-- by making the assumption that there are only two positions.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Below: Indian philosophy expounded Dialectics when the white man was doing GRUNT GRUNT for language ..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-veFHi8eu8xQ/V_TTzIjnxKI/AAAAAAABMWQ/8EDptYpAlPkOU5fWj_4UBBYZd9cGuGQLgCLcB/s1600/dialectic-vs-dichotoSmy.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"358\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-veFHi8eu8xQ/V_TTzIjnxKI/AAAAAAABMWQ/8EDptYpAlPkOU5fWj_4UBBYZd9cGuGQLgCLcB/s640/dialectic-vs-dichotoSmy.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIEVES Plato and\nSocrates stole it from Kodungallur University and patented it in their own\nnames.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The purpose of the Vedic dialectic method of reasoning is resolution of\ndisagreement through rational discussion, and, ultimately, the search for truth.\nAnekantavada and Syadvada are the sophisticated dialectic Vedic traditions. . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The Sanskrit etymological root of the term\nSy\u0101d is \"perhaps\" or \"maybe\", but in context of sy\u0101dv\u0101da,\nit means \"in some ways\" or \"from a perspective.\" &nbsp;As reality is complex, no single proposition\ncan express the nature of reality fully. &nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Thus the term \"sy\u0101t\" should be\nprefixed before each proposition giving it a conditional point of view and thus\nremoving any dogmatism in the statement. &nbsp;Since it ensures that each statement is\nexpressed from seven different conditional and relative view points or\npropositions, it is known as theory of conditioned predication.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">These seven\npropositions also known as saptabhangi are:<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">sy\u0101d-asti: \"in\nsome ways it is\"<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">sy\u0101d-n\u0101sti: \"in\nsome ways it is not\"<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">sy\u0101d-asti-n\u0101sti:\n\"in some ways it is and it is not\"<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">sy\u0101d-asti-avaktavya\u1e25:\n\"in some ways it is and it is indescribable\"<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">sy\u0101d-n\u0101sti-avaktavya\u1e25:\n\"in some ways it is not and it is indescribable\"<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">sy\u0101d-asti-n\u0101sti-avaktavya\u1e25:\n\"in some ways it is, it is not and it is indescribable\"<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</i></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">sy\u0101d-avaktavya\u1e25:\n\"in some ways it is indescribable\"</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Getting back--</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Examples of false dichotomy :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"You're either\npart of the solution or part of the problem.\" - No room for innocent\nbystanders here.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"If you're not\nwith us, you're against us.\" - Being neutral is not an option.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Forcing people to\nclassify themselves as either \"with us\" or \"against us\",\nleads to the saying \"An enemy of my enemy is my friend.\" &nbsp;&nbsp;While they may hate both of you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You commit this fallacy\nif you interpret the negation of a conjunction (e.g. \"not both A and\nB\") as implying at at least one conjunct (either A or B) must be true.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not (A and B)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not A<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Therefore, B<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-eiGFmQUAmhs/V_TKX0WIDaI/AAAAAAABMV8/qNtpOI5iFG4Tm89aXX1SSqK3ShgLn25kwCLcB/s1600/imag%2Bdes.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"283\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-eiGFmQUAmhs/V_TKX0WIDaI/AAAAAAABMV8/qNtpOI5iFG4Tm89aXX1SSqK3ShgLn25kwCLcB/s400/imag%2Bdes.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In order words,\nconfusing a contradiction (where one or the other must be true, but not both)\nwith a contrary (where both could be false, but both cannot be true).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Evolution and\ncreationism can't both be true.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Evolution is not true.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Therefore, creationism\nis true.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The above example is\nfallacious as it is possible for both creationism and evolution to be untrue.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7bKCuqgxj-Q/V_TKAteDWAI/AAAAAAABMV0/C0Rw4xx9B4oGMurBlEcHziO_NRTY-kdwACLcB/s1600/chaoice8.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"323\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7bKCuqgxj-Q/V_TKAteDWAI/AAAAAAABMV0/C0Rw4xx9B4oGMurBlEcHziO_NRTY-kdwACLcB/s400/chaoice8.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">George Bush uses the\nfalse dichotomy technique constantly, framing an argument as a choice between\ntwo irrelevant things. While talking about the armed insurgents in Iraq, he\nsaid that they had to \"choose between freedom or a return to darkness.\"&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-14OVvJLiIbw/V_TJZ8l2G5I/AAAAAAABMVo/S8gU3hHZ1j8-TO8BSOOSkL0HEAJ6BjOgQCLcB/s1600/59914n133.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-14OVvJLiIbw/V_TJZ8l2G5I/AAAAAAABMVo/S8gU3hHZ1j8-TO8BSOOSkL0HEAJ6BjOgQCLcB/s640/59914n133.jpg\" width=\"568\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">False dichotomy \u2014 &nbsp;the slimy attempt to divide people into just\ntwo camps or sides or causes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Variations:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The enemy of bad\nmust be good.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Those who are\nopposed to bad must be good.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"If a bad man\nhates me, then that proves that I am good.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The friend of my\nenemy is also my enemy.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"If I am opposed\nto something bad, then I must be good.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6228376332626541342\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_154M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal;
