text-decoration: none;\">October 5, 2016 at 3:42 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_154MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nKARAN THAPAR IS SUPPORTING OM PURI ON INDIA TODAY TV<br />\n<br />\nHE IS SPINNING A SIKH / HINDU ANALOGY-- DURING KHALISTANI TIMES .<br />\n<br />\nTHIS MIDGET FROM THE FALL THAPAR FAMILY IS DRIVING WEDGES BETWEEN INDIANS .<br />\n<br />\nWHY IS THIS DESH DROHI MIDGET THAPAR NOT BEHIND BARS ?<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br />IS MODI AFRAID OF JEW NOAM CHOMSKY ?</b></span><br />\n<br />\nWHY IS VENKAIH NAIDU THE I&amp;B MINISTER ? &nbsp; &nbsp;WE KNOW WHY !</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QFEz9ucJRs0/V_TWS70l_bI/AAAAAAABMWc/sST9lfJPPTQuXuoH-N6z0cVKAVQ3Lka1gCLcB/s1600/house_wdees3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"568\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QFEz9ucJRs0/V_TWS70l_bI/AAAAAAABMWc/sST9lfJPPTQuXuoH-N6z0cVKAVQ3Lka1gCLcB/s640/house_wdees3.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Rothschild\ncontrolled benami media of India are masters in contextomy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again CONTEXOMY&nbsp; refers to the selective excerpting of words\nfrom their original linguistic context in a way that distorts the source\u2019s\nintended meaning, a practice commonly referred to as \u201cquoting out of\ncontext.\u201d&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, a &nbsp;contextomized\nquotation not only prompts audiences to form a false impression of the source\u2019s\nintentions, but can contaminate subsequent interpretation of the quote when it\nis restored to its original context<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Contextomy yields two negative\nconsequences for a quoted source: Initially, a false impression of the source\u2019s\nattitude(s) and subsequently, a residual distortion after the misleading quote\nis restored to its original context.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arguments based on this\nfallacy typically take two forms:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a straw man\nargument, which is frequently found in politics, it involves quoting an\nopponent out of context in order to misrepresent their position (typically to\nmake it seem more simplistic or extreme) in order to make it easier to refute.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As an appeal to\nauthority, it involves quoting an authority on the subject out of context, in\norder to misrepresent that authority as supporting some position.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In either case, while\nquoting a person out of context can be done intentionally to advance an agenda\nor win an argument,&nbsp; to remove essential\ncontext without the aim to mislead.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The practice of quoting\nout of context (sometimes referred to quote mining), is an informal fallacy and\na type of false attribution in which a passage is removed from its surrounding\nmatter in such a way as to distort its intended meaning.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Using slogans - If a\nslogan is repeated enough times, eventually the public will come to believe it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alexander the Great\nintimidated armies again and again , leaving FAKE armor and helmets that were very\nlarge when they retreated. &nbsp;This made\nthem look like giants.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This Greeko AWE factor did NOT\nwork in India.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; BUT ASPIRIN IS A BLOOD THINNER AND CAUSES INTERNAL BLEEDING ....... . . Normal platelet counts range from 150,000 to 400,000 per microliter in the blood....Thrombocytopenia that requires EMERGENCY treatment is a LOW platelet count below 50,000 per microliter.... The efficacy of paracetamol by itself in children with fevers has been questioned and a meta-analysis showed that it is less effective than ibuprofen. Paracetamol consists of a benzene ring core. ...Paracetamol is derived from coal tar. ... It belongs to the class of drugs known as \"aniline analgesics.\" The gravity of the side effects can be understood by the fact that it is the only such EVIL drug still in use today..... LAKHS OF INDIANS HAVE DIED DUE TO PARACETAMOL . . Damage to the liver, or hepatotoxicity, results not from paracetamol itself, but from one of its metabolites, N-acetyl-p-benzoquinoneimine (NAPQI)......NAPQI decreases the liver''s natural antioxidant glutathione and directly damages cells in the liver, leading to liver failure..... Signs of liver injury - include low blood sugar, low blood pH, easy bleeding, and hepatic encephalopathy....... Paracetamol cannot relieve pain even in mild arthritis, and has ZERO effect on the underlying inflammation, redness, and swelling of the joint.... The symptoms and signs of thrombocytopenia may include: Superficial bleeding into the skin resulting in small reddish spots (petechiae) Easy or excessive bruising (purpura) Spontaneous bleeding from the gums or nose Jaundice Heavy menstrual bleeding that''s unusual for the individual Blood in the ur1ne or sto0ls Enlarged spleen Bleeding that will not stop DVT (deep vein thrombosis) EVIL PHARMA WANTS INDIANS TO DIE AS A DEPOPULATION AGENDA . . font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We took these balloons\nto my cabin , turned them upside down , inflated them and stuck small round pieces\nof transparent cello tape.&nbsp; Then we\nturned them back and inflated these balloons .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now if you prick the balloon\nwith a sharp toothpick on the spot where the hidden cello tape is put , the\nballoon wont burst. The toothpick will act as a plug. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But if you prick anywhere else on the balloon\nit would burst with a loud pop . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the new year\nparty, I declared I will do some magic . text-decoration: none;\">October 6, 2016 at 2:37 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_212MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THERE ARE TWO WAYS TO KILL AN ENEMY</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple;\">MODUS OPERANDI ONE</span> : &nbsp;GO IN HOT PURSUIT-- GHAR MEIN GHUSKE MAARO<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple;\">MODUS OPERANDI TWO</span>: &nbsp;LET HIM COME TO YOU-- FACILITATE IT-- KILL ON YOUR OWN TURF AND TIME TABLE FROM A POSITION OF STRENGTH . .<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/the-quick-and-dead-hollywood-movie.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHIS HAS BEEN MY METHOD TOO.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOW CHECK OUT HOW THE\nCOLLEGIUM JUDGES DO THEIR OWN SPIN TO BLEED BHARATMATA.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY HAVE BEEN DOING IT\nMERRILY AS THERE IS NO ONE IN INDIA INTELLIGENT ENOUGH TO SEE THOUGH THIS SLIMY\nTHINGY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE IS A RULE OF \u201cNATURAL\nJUSTICE \u201c &nbsp;THAT NO JUDGE CAN JUDGE A CASE\nWHERE HIS OWN SON , WIFE , BROTHER, BUSINESS PARTNER , PERSONAL INTERSTS ARE\nINVOLVED . .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>SO DOES OUR SLIMY RABIDLY ANTI-HINDU COLLEGIUM\nJUDGES DO ?</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LET US SAY THAT SOME\nMUSLIM LAWYER WANTS MENSTRUATING HINDU WOMEN TO ENTER SABARIMALA <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">USING THIS CLAUSE OF \u201cPERSONAL\nINTEREST\u201d THEY USE ONLY RABIDLY ANTI-HINDU JUDGES TO RULE THE CASE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SABARIMALA IS THIS\nPLANETs NO 1 PILGRIMAGE AND POPE IN VATICAN AND MECCA MULLAHS ARE MOST UNHAPPY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The words \u2018natural\njustice\u2019 is derived from the Roman word \u2018Jus Naturale\u2019 which means principles\nof natural law, justice, equity, and good conscience.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The use of the term\n\u201cNatural Justice\u201d in the judicial context is very important and frequent. With\nthe advancement of the civilization our lives started to be dominated more by\nthe rules of law, rather than law of nature.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The principles of natural justice\noriginated in ancient India .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was easy as India had the&nbsp; MOST DIVERSE FLAURA AND FAUNA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indian princes were\ngroomed to be King \u2013 and made strong in natural justice by mere story telling. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DHARMA ruled justice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/super-panchatantra-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/super-panchatantra-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UkessT5c3YU/V_YdM27H9xI/AAAAAAABMYk/N2LeE0iX-AEfzYgq0V2OLXg6wT8CCyxfgCLcB/s1600/Sth.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UkessT5c3YU/V_YdM27H9xI/AAAAAAABMYk/N2LeE0iX-AEfzYgq0V2OLXg6wT8CCyxfgCLcB/s640/Sth.jpg\" width=\"516\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Principles were\nlaid out by Chanakya in his MAGNUM OPUS&nbsp;\nArthashastra. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The word \u2018Natural\nJustice\u2019 manifests justice according to one\u2019s own conscience&nbsp; , THE root concept of Sanatana Dharma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Principles of natural justice\nare necessary to evolve the norms of fair play. &nbsp;&nbsp;These are the principles which every\ndisciplinary authority should follow while taking any decision, which may\nadversely affect the rights of individuals. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JUSTICE MUST NEVER EVER\nBE BLIND, THE WAY JEW ROTHSCHILD DEVISED IT TO STEAL AND ENSLAVE THE WORLD<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The rules of Natural\nJustice around the planet have been lifted from Sanatana Dharma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rules of natural\njustice are not codified anywhere; they are procedural in nature and their aim\nis to ensure delivery of justice to the parties\u2014looking at every case with a\nFRESH SET OF EYES.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>You should never quote some old moth eaten judgement to rule a current case , as is being done by the collegium judges. All these past rulings must be burnt.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rules of natural\njustice serve as hedge against any blatant discrimination against rights of\nindividuals. These rules are intended to prevent such authority from doing\ninjustice. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The supreme and sovereign\npower of the state to make laws through the organ of legislatures is one of the\nessential features of a democratic establishment and the laws enacted by the\nlegislatures are liable to be used arbitrarily in the absence of a well-laid\ndown procedure for its application and administration. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A major rule is that a\nperson who has been charged, must be heard before any is decision is taken and\nthe second maxim means that a person will not judge a matter in which he is personally\ninterested or has a personal selfish stake.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A principle of Natural\nJustice derived from DHARMA states that &nbsp;a judgement should be a speaking one which\nmeans it should state the reasons behind arriving at a particular decision.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some people asked Capt\nAjit Vadakayil the reason why he did something at sea.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;If I was NOT in the mood to please, &nbsp;I would reply \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>MY SHIP MY DECISION . &nbsp; &nbsp;IF YOU DON\u2019T LIKE IT , YOU MAY LUMP IT. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ON MY\nSHIP NOBODY PUTS ME IN THE WITNESS BOX.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TEE HEEEEEEEE</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BAD BAAAAAD CAPTAIN !!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Law is dynamic and a living\nfield and it mindlessly clings on to rigid procedures or strict observance of\nthe rules\u2014it do not produce a fair and satisfactory outcome unless the\nauthorities concerned act most judiciously. &nbsp;Legal justice is based on technicalities of\nlaw following the procedure established by law. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Natural Justice is\njustice based on human values and good conscience following a just and fair\nprocedure. A jury of good citizens is better than a Collegium judge with an\nagenda<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE JURY SYSTEM IN\nINDIA WAS ABOLISHED AFTER RULES WERE BENT FOR A TATTU PARSI NAVAL COMMANDER\nNAMED NANAVATI TO EXCAPE THE GALLOWS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ram Jethmalani will NOT\nget Moksha , he catapulted himself to success by kicking his Sindhi community\non their teeth\u2014 total betrayal of trust.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/11/altamas-kabir-worst-chief-justice-of.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/11/altamas-kabir-worst-chief-justice-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\">Rules of Natural Justice do not supplant the\nlaw but supplement the law. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\">The aim of natural justice is </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\">to prevent miscarriage of justice.</span></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>You cannot cast Natural Justice rules in a\nnarrow mould or fit them into a straight jacket, because that would deprive\nthem of their flexibility or adaptability to the innumerable situations that\nmay arise during the course of the enquiry.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Conscience plays a major role.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Whether a particular principle of Natural\nJustice is applicable to a particular situation will depend on the facts and\ncircumstances of each case, seen with a fresh pair of NON Jaundiced eyes .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Whenever a complaint is made before the court\nthat some principle of Natural Justice is contravened, the court has to decide\nwhether the observance of the rule was necessary for a just decision of the\ncase.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The concept of Natural Justice has undergone\na great deal of change in recent years. In the past it was thought that it\nincluded just two rules namely (a) no one shall be a judge in his own cause and\n(b) no decision shall be given against party without affording him a reasonable\nhearing.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Very soon thereafter a third rule was envisaged that quasi-judicial\nenquiries must be held in <b><span style=\"color: red;\">GOOD FAITH</span></b> &nbsp;without bias and not arbitrarily or\nunreasonably.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Every Judge, authority, arbitrator, or a body\nor person having power to decide, disputed questions of law and facts shall\ndisplay fair play in action.&nbsp; A judge who\nis blatantly UNFAIR must be punished or even dismissed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In English law, natural justice is technical\nterminology for the rule against bias (nemo iudex in causa sua) and the right\nto a fair hearing (audi alteram partem). While the term natural justice is\noften retained as a general concept, it has largely been replaced and extended\nby the general \"duty to act fairly\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">NOWASAYS HUMAN RIGHTs NGOS ARE SOLELY USED TO\nSAVE TRAITORS TO THE NATION \u2013 &nbsp;THEY ARGUE\nOUT OF CONTEXT. &nbsp; &nbsp;THE FOREIGN PAYROLL COLLEGIUM JUDGE WITH AN ULTERIOR MOTIVE ALLOWS SUCH OUT OF CONTEXT\nARGUMENTS.&nbsp; .&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">NATURAL JUSTICE CANNOT BE APPLIED WITHOUT\nCONTEXT . &nbsp;</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE ARE ALL AWARE OF KOSHER KANGAROO COURTS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Even the UN court is a Kangaroo Court\ncontrolled by Bilderberg club.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/radha-binod-pal-forgotten-indian-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/radha-binod-pal-forgotten-indian-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/rudolf-hess-honourable-man-who-was.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/rudolf-hess-honourable-man-who-was.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-aBpFlrOKof4/V_ZI1y1SBdI/AAAAAAABMY0/GPr02TtlSxY5fE0za4t0l3GQo7ZGDMg1gCLcB/s1600/KangarWooCourt_8592.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A kangaroo court is a\njudicial tribunal that blatantly disregards recognized standards of law or\njustice , allows out of context arguments / evidence and who ignores principles\nof Natural Justice. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>The requirements of\nnatural justice or a duty to act fairly depends on the CONTEXT.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Strait\njacketed law does NOT understand ( or prefers to ignore) &nbsp;the PARAMOUNT truth of &nbsp;context. <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>CONTEXT MUST BE PARAMOUNT IN\nANY COURT OF JUSTICE .</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The erosion of public\nconfidence undermines the nobility of the legal system, and leads to ensuing\nchaos.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Justice must be rooted\nin confidence and confidence is destroyed when right-minded people go away\nthinking: 'The judge was biased.'\"&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nowadays they just\nthrow a shoe on the Judge\u2014they don\u2019t want to waste words on this UNFAIR judge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bias may be actual,\nimputed or apparent.&nbsp; &nbsp;Actual bias is established where it is\nactually established that a decision-maker was prejudiced in favour of or\nagainst a party. However, in practice, the making of such an allegation is rare\nas it is very hard to prove.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apparent bias is\npresent where a judge or other decision-maker is not a party to a matter and\ndoes not have an interest in its outcome, but through his or her conduct or\nbehaviour gives rise to a suspicion that he or she is not impartial<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HOW THE JUDGE KILLS\nJUSTICE IF BY ALLOWING OUT OF CONTEXT EVIDENCE , FALSE WITNESSES PRODUCED FROM\nTHIN AIR TO AFFECT HIS JUDGEMENT.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Money rules ! &nbsp;A cut goes to the judge , as all THREE are\nbedfellows !!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole of India\nknows this !!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The prisoner must be\nable to present his own case . &nbsp;This provision\nmust exist as a part of NATURAL JUSTICE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">WE ALL KNOW THE BOTTOM\nOF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL BECAME LAWYERS .&nbsp;\n&nbsp;AND THESE DUFFERS BECAME JUDGES </span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xw7Ep5daOyw/V_abwH7qZQI/AAAAAAABMZU/f3fd9Llcrh41hx0Cr1rzJXs_6g162zy-gCLcB/s1600/sMMlide_17.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xw7Ep5daOyw/V_abwH7qZQI/AAAAAAABMZU/f3fd9Llcrh41hx0Cr1rzJXs_6g162zy-gCLcB/s640/sMMlide_17.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-8LyDWmoqPuM/V_aeTIzSa_I/AAAAAAABMZk/gnMsChyN8akzInzIcwIocEbr_0hY2VpTQCLcB/s1600/dBownload.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"303\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-8LyDWmoqPuM/V_aeTIzSa_I/AAAAAAABMZk/gnMsChyN8akzInzIcwIocEbr_0hY2VpTQCLcB/s400/dBownload.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Non sequitur statements\nmake a leap that does not make sense or follow logic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some examples of non\nsequitur arguments include:--</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>She drives a BMW. She\nmust be rich.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>I read about a pitbull\nattack. My neighbor owns a pitbull. My life is in danger.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>I do not make much\nmoney and am unhappy. People who are rich are happy.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>My neighbor's cat is\naloof , mean and it shat on his bed . Cats are nasty creatures.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>I got into a car\naccident on a rainy day. I don't think anyone should drive in the rain.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>I lost my port anchor\nin New York. Nobody should drop the port anchor in New York</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now you see how non\nsequiturs work and you can understand why the conclusions that are drawn often\ndo not follow logically from the facts or are not guaranteed to be true.&nbsp;&nbsp; Most of the technical company circular sent\nto ships are stupid non sequiturs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE&nbsp; HAVE STUPID JUDGES JUMPING INTO SUCH\nCONCLUSIONS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-azvYe5IhNbo/V_aeFOFnHSI/AAAAAAABMZg/R61B0Ep3IBc5FHwgamn4WRGmm87RgwcIACLcB/s1600/i3CZmaSges.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-azvYe5IhNbo/V_aeFOFnHSI/AAAAAAABMZg/R61B0Ep3IBc5FHwgamn4WRGmm87RgwcIACLcB/s400/i3CZmaSges.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 2 BELOW-</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice_7.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice_7.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>PROXY WAR -- BURQA PEHENKE !</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOG_video_class\" contentid=\"7548ad55f9d5c8cf\" height=\"266\" id=\"BLOG_video-7548ad55f9d5c8cf\" width=\"320\"></object></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red;
