, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">WHAT HAPPENED WAS ,\nTHAT DAY ONE BOY IN THE POOL TOLD MY SON, TRY HYPERVENTILATING BEFORE HE\nPLUNGES UNDERWATER. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS IS WHAT I HAVE\nWRITTEN IN THIS POST<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">AFTER HYPERVENTILATION\n, VALSALVA CAUSES BLACK OUT . .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">VALSALVA IS NOT ABOUT\nPOPPING THE EARS ALONE</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The effect of the\nValsalva Maneuver is a drastic increase in the pressure within the thoracic\ncavity. The thoracic cavity is the airtight section inside the chest which\nhouses the lungs and heart. In a Valsalva Maneuver, attempting to exhale with\nthe mouth and nose closed increases the pressure in the thoracic cavity because\nthe air cannot escape.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The place where the Valsalva Maneuver is carried out the\nmost is the sitting toilet ( Western style commode &nbsp;). &nbsp;It\nis difficult to evacuate properly on a sitting toilet because the colon is not\nsupported and pressurised. There is also a kink at the rectum and anus which\nobstructs the flow of waste especially if constipated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why 6200 year\nold ayurevda recommends only Indian style squatting toilet.&nbsp; The strain of 'pushing downwards' with the\ndiaphragm in an attempt to evacuate shit is totally eliminated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The diaphragm is a thin\nmembrane below the lungs. In normal breathing, during exhalation, it relaxes\nand pushes upwards into the thoracic cavity to help force the air out of the\nlungs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During a Valsalva\nManeuver, with the holding of the breath and straining, the diaphragm is forced\ndownwards by the increased pressure inside the thoracic cavity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Valsalva Maneuver\nis dangerous for two reasons. The increased pressure in the thoracic cavity\nreduces the amount of blood flowing into the thoracic cavity, especially in the\nveins leading to the right atrium of the heart. The maneuver can also cause cause\nblood clots to detach, bleeding, irregular heart rhythms and cardiac arrest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many of the heart\nattacks which occur in bathrooms have been linked to the Valsalva Maneuver,\nwhich in turn, is closely associated with Western style sitting toilets, beef\neating and constipation ...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Also, on a sitting toilet,\nthe straining and pushing downwards with the diaphragm imposes great strains on\nthe colon, pelvic floor, uterus (women), and also important nerves that control\nthe bladder and prostate (men).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">CHEE CHEEE CHEEE </span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HEATHEN SAVAGE INDIANS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SQUATTING WHITE TAKING\nA CRAP<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>CHEE CHEE CHEE </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OT6QYqMpjz0/V-9G9S1aLjI/AAAAAAABMOc/M-GA4DAh9BYaNdAXlIVZQvoCak2KkaJWACLcB/s1600/hybrid-toilet-between-squat-DDwestern-style-mumbai.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OT6QYqMpjz0/V-9G9S1aLjI/AAAAAAABMOc/M-GA4DAh9BYaNdAXlIVZQvoCak2KkaJWACLcB/s640/hybrid-toilet-between-squat-DDwestern-style-mumbai.jpg\" width=\"480\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">LOOK MAAA--&nbsp; DIRTY INDIANS WASHING THEIR ASSHOLE AFTER\nDROPPING THEIR DUNG</span><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: x-large;\"><b>TEE &nbsp;HEEEEEEEEEEEE !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unexplained blackouts\nunderwater have been associated with the practice of hyperventilation.\nSurvivors of shallow water blackouts often report using hyperventilation as a\ntechnique to increase the time they can spend underwater.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hyperventilation, or\nover-breathing, involves breathing faster and/or deeper than the body naturally\ndemands and is often used by divers in the mistaken belief that this will\nincrease oxygen (O2) saturation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although this appears true intuitively, under\nnormal circumstances the breathing rate dictated by the body alone already\nleads to 98-99% oxygen saturation of the arterial blood and the effect of\nover-breathing on the oxygen intake is minor.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What is really happening differs\nfrom divers' understanding; these divers are extending their dive by closing\ndown the body's natural breathing mechanism, not by increasing oxygen load.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nmechanism is as follows:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The primary urge to\nbreathe is triggered by rising carbon dioxide (CO2) levels in the bloodstream.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CO2 builds up in the bloodstream when O2 is metabolized and it needs to be\nexpelled as a waste product. The body detects CO2 levels very accurately and relies\non this to control breathing.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Hyperventilation\nartificially depletes this (CO2) causing a <span style=\"color: red;\">low blood carbon dioxide condition\ncalled hypocapnia. <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hypocapnia reduces the\nreflexive respiratory drive, allows the delay of breathing and leaves the diver\nsusceptible to loss of consciousness from hypoxia.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For most healthy people the\nfirst sign of low O2 is a greyout or unconsciousness: there is no bodily\nsensation that warns a diver of an impending blackout.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qkRIwR1T-io/V-9MVV8i5HI/AAAAAAABMOs/o6RTtMxrn9wOktCtX7Y5XIFnNsVvXtQvwCLcB/s1600/downloatoo9d.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">First point of Aries is the spot where equinoctial cuts the\necliptic.. It is alert to slightest stimuli and protects them even while sleeping, as it can sense AURAS ( energy ) and temperature signatures.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThe whiskers supplement the cats sense of hearing and sight, by a strange parallel processing in its brain. This is the reason why they say the cat has superior hearing sense. Whiskers can sense the air draft caused by sound. In extremely dim light, a cat may feel its way by using its whiskers.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThe cat uses its whiskers in conjunction with its tail to land on its feet after a jump\u2014 a natural righting reflex.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nMother cats remove the whiskers of the kittens till they are capable of fending for themselves and explore.. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/01/garbha-sanskar-nurturing-unborn-child.html?showComment=1474100603182#c8325043580367090809\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">September 17, 2016 at 1:53 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_152MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nThe yolk sac helps the fetus to grow.<br />\n<br />\nA yolk sac is the sac in the uterus that is vital to the baby\u2019s growth as it contains all the nutrients the baby needs for growth. When you first see it on your ultrasound scan, you might notice a small, coin-sized bag located near your tiny embryo.<br />\n<br />\nThe yolk sac is, like the fetus, made from material originating from the fertilized egg. The implanted fertilized egg continues to undergo cell division, and the cells eventually are differentiated into the embryo and the yolk sac.<br />\n<br />\nWhy is there a need for a yolk sac if the mother is providing the baby with nutrients? The truth is, the mother doesn\u2019t provide the baby with nutrients in the early stages of pregnancy. In fact, the mother can\u2019t \u2013 doing so in the early stages of pregnancy will, scientifically speaking, put the baby in danger. The baby will receive nutrients directly from mom in time to come, but that is possible when a placenta is present. As the placenta is only completely formed in Weeks 13 to 17, your baby isn\u2019t yet able to filter the nutrients coming from mom. Thus, your baby will get the nutrients they need from the yolk sac for the first few months of pregnancy.<br />\n<br />\nOnce the placenta is completely formed, the yolk sac has completed its life mission and is no longer needed. The placenta\u2019s growth and the increase in size are inversely followed by the shrinking of the yolk sac. The yolk sac disappears in around Week 14.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KKD8DILB_x8</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_153b+seedG1ZvD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-thread\" id=\"bc_0_152T_box\" style=\"margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_153b+seedG1ZvD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_153b+seedG1ZvD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_153B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_154B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8382275228492485077\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_154M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\">xx</cite><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/01/garbha-sanskar-nurturing-unborn-child.html?showComment=1475222449316#c426281187441521794\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">September 30, 2016 at 1:30 PM</a></span></div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_157B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c426281187441521794\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_157MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCaptain saab, Doctor said nothing can be done to get a healthy yolk sac as it is completely genetic, hereditary action. Yoga with body earthed hastens the process and cuts down this time to 10 minutes..<br />\n<br />\nFree radical stress from exposure to pollution, cigarettes, insecticides, pesticides, trans fats, and radiation, just to name a few, continually deplete your body of electrons. Ajit VadakayilOctober 13, 2016 at 12:04 PM<br />\nVikhyat Singh<br />\nOctober 13, 2016 at 10:27 AM<br />\nCAPTAIN,<br />\nAs per sanatan dharm, what is the nature of morality (subjective or objective)?<br />\n<br />\n####################################<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nOctober 13, 2016 at 11:55 AM<br />\nhi vs,<br />\n<br />\nDON\u2019T EVER BOTHER TO SEEK AN ANSWER TO YOUR QUESTION ( OBJECTIVE/ SUBJECTIVE MORALITY FROM ANY BOOK ON THIS PLANET OR FROM THE INTERNET.<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS NOBODY WHO HAS THE FUCKIN\u2019 WISDOM TO ANSWER YOUR PROFOUND QUESTION .<br />\n<br />\nThe reason morality is subjective is because there is no common moral law that ALL people agree on.<br />\n<br />\nIf objective moral codes existed like \"murder is bad\" than there would be no murderers. But there are murderers. The reason most societies outlaw murder is because it is for the logical salvation of the society.<br />\n<br />\nObjective morality is the idea that a certain system of ethics or set of moral judgments is not just true according to a person's subjective opinion, but factually true.<br />\n<br />\nProponents of this theory would argue that a statement like \"Murder is wrong\" can be as objectively true as \"1 + 1 = 2.\"<br />\n<br />\nMost of the objective morals promoted today are grounded in Abrahamic religions .<br />\n<br />\nAmong Christians, it follows from the ideas of inherent human sinfulness and original sin that one's subjective moral instincts must be categorically classed as evil.<br />\n<br />\nIn claustrophobic Abrahamic religions , there is a pervasive message that whatever we're searching for is completely and utterly separate from us.<br />\n<br />\nAs per Sanatana Dharma morality has been ingrained within us. Somewhere deep down, embedded in our DNA, is the coding for morality. Somehow people know at a very young age that stealing is wrong.<br />\n<br />\nFor some, morality is something that is either taught, learned, or gained through familial contact or social interaction.<br />\n<br />\nYet there are people who didn't have good parents, or who had no parents at all, or who grew up without much social interaction or exposure to accessible information but who still know the basic \"rules\" for morality.<br />\n<br />\nFor others, morality seems to be something that we have to achieve or earn via some middle man in robes<br />\n<br />\nMorality isn't a rule. It isn't a plumb line. Morality cannot exists without context. Bhagawad Gita was the ultimate lesson in morality within the perimeter of context .<br />\n<br />\nMorality aint no tool to determine who is in and who is out. It is something that is part of each person. We don't earn morality; it earns us.<br />\n<br />\nMorality is a gene -- not one that we can see or study, but one that evolves progressively over time. Unlike other genes, it is affected and altered by the decisions we make and don't make. It is transformed by compassion and deformed by the lack of it.<br />\n<br />\nMorality is in us. We are all moral unless you have criminal DNA and the programming is corrupt.<br />\n<br />\nIts how we choose to use that knowledge that will determine how we nurture the growth of morality within us.<br />\n<br />\nSo, the origins of morality lie in each human being but are grown through the everyday process of making choices.<br />\n<br />\nLaws of Karma and Dharma has guided the Hindu since time immemorial . There was never any DOGMA lumped down the Hindu\u2019s throat.<br />\n<br />\nMorals are encouraged by living in a moral society or community. But they are birthed in each person, each individual. They are also spurred on by what we choose to expose our minds to.<br />\n<br />\nMoral subjectivity is not the enemy to the progress of any society; moral homogeneity is.<br />\n<br />\nMoral homogeneity says that everyone needs to see everything the same way, to fit into neat little boxes, and it is used to marginalize those who don't.<br />\n<br />\nMoral subjectivity leads a society to embrace diversity by seeing that a particular worldview isn't the only right one.<br />\n<br />\nA subjective morality is one rooted in human feelings and conscience .<br />\n<br />\nNatural justice is inherent. These are the things that are most important to us, indeed the only things important to us!<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_197BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2878359919218458109\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_195M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice_7.html?showComment=1476340902167#c2878359919218458109\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">October 13, 2016 at 12:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_195MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nDefinition of Subjective:--<br />\nProceeding from or taking place in a person's mind rather than the external world: a subjective decision.<br />\nParticular to a given person; personal: subjective experience.<br />\nsubjective dimension of conscience.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nDefinition of Objective:-<br />\n<br />\nOf or having to do with a material object.<br />\nHaving actual existence or reality.<br />\nUninfluenced by emotions or personal prejudices: an objective critic.<br />\nBased on observable phenomena; presented factually: an objective appraisal.<br />\nEverything is subjective as soon as it is experienced or thought by a human being.<br />\nObjective moral values are moral values that are true independent of the belief of human beings.<br />\n<br />\nRELIGION IS OBJECTIVE .<br />\nSPIRITUALITY IS SUBJECTIVE.<br />\n<br />\nOBJECTIVE IS OUTSIDE OF HUMAN BEINGS. WHEN A SHIP INCPECTOR INSPECTS THE SHIP, HE MUST BE OBJECTIVE. HE MUST NOT ALLOW HIS EMOTIONS TO RULE.<br />\n<br />\nSAME WITH A JUDGE IN A COURT. NATURAL JUSTICE AND CONSCIENCE IS LOCKED UP AND THROWN AWAY.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS SUITED JEW ROTHSCHILDWHO ENSLAVED INDIA.<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD CREATED ASHTAVAKRA GITA AND HAS USED HIS FAKE GURUS TO PROPATE IT SANATA DHARMA IS NOT LIKE THE TEN COMMANDMENTS SYSTEM OF SINGLE MESSIAH CHRISTIANITY.<br />\n<br />\nWE HINDUS DO NOT NEED A MESSIAH TO TELL US WHAT IS RIGHT AND WHAT IS WRONG.<br />\n<br />\nLIKE THIS BLOGSITE HINDUSIM TELLS ALL TO USE THEIR CONSCIENCE. OBJECTIVE MORALITY BREEDS FALSE EXCUSES<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTANGIBLE LAW IS THE OBJECTIVE FORM OF MORALITY. OBJECTIVE IS INDEPENDENT OF PEOPLEs OPINIONS.<br />\n<br />\nOBJECTIVE MORALS FOR CHRISTIANS EMANATE FROM THE TEN COMMANDMENTS.<br />\n<br />\nOBJECTIVE MORALITY IGNORED CONTEXT .<br />\n<br />\nCHRISTIAN / ISLAM MORALITY IS OBJECTIVE, THE SINGLE MESSIAH AND SINGLE HOLY BOOK DICTATES DOGMA.<br />\n<br />\nATHEIST COMMUNISTS AND SINGLE MESSIAH / HOLYBOOK RELIGIONS ARE OBJECTIVE WITH MORALITY. THEY HAVE FAILED .<br />\n<br />\nRELIGION IS DOING WHAT YOU ARE TOLD REARDLESS OF WHAT IS RIGHT.<br />\n<br />\nRULES DON\u2019T MAKE US MORAL.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA IS SUBJECTIVE.<br />\n<br />\nSUBJECTIVE IS STRICTLY WITHIN HUMANS BEINGS \u2013IT DERIVES FROM OUR INTANGIBLE CONSCIENCE ALONE.<br />\n<br />\nIN SUBJECTIVE MORALITY PERCEPTION WITHIN PERIMETER OF CONTEXT IS PARAMOUNT.<br />\n<br />\nSUBJECTIVE IS DEPENDENT ON PEOPLEs OPINIONS.<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMAIS BASED ON CONSCIOUS HUMAN CONSCIENCE. NO MAN CAN MANIPULATE OR SILENCE HIS CONSCIENCE. WE ARE NOT THE SOURCE OF OUR OWN CONSCIENCE.<br />\n<br />\nBHAGAWAD GITA IS OUR GUIDE NOT ASHTAVAKRA GITA COOKED UP BY JEW ROTHSCHILD WITH Dos AND DONTs<br />\n<br />\nENEMIED OF HINDUISM USES FAKE GURUS LIKE TRIPLE SRI TO CONVERT SANATANA DHARMA TO AN OBJECTIVE RELIGION. SORRY, IT WONT WORK<br />\n<br />\nSPIRITUALLY SOAKED HINDUS ARE SUBJECTIVE WITH MORALITY. ONLY THIS WORKS<br />\n<br />\nMORALITY IS DOING WHAT IS RIGHT, REARDLESS OF WHAT YOUR ARE TOLD.<br />\n<br />\nSUBJECTIVE MORALITY HAS NO SCOPE FOR EXCUSES. LOVE , COMPASSION AND FAIRNESS MAKE US MORAL.<br />\n<br />\nHinduism was developed along spiritual lines, NOT religious lines\u2014the reason why 800 years of slavery could NOT stamp out this amazing way of life..<br />\n<br />\nHindusim is NOT a religion, it is the practise of spirituality by elevating human consciousness in the personal quest for truth.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_195MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_195BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_195B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_196B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2195153441608560896\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_196M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice_7.html?showComment=1476340918268#c2195153441608560896\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">October 13, 2016 at 12:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_196MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nIndia and Bali are the last pockets of spirituality on this planet. Why do you think the spirituality seeking white man goes to these places in droves?<br />\n<br />\nThese foreigners can comprehend that Hinduism is based on reason and NOT faith -- unless the faith is an extension of reason.<br />\n<br />\nHindusim is a relentless pursuit of truth, flexible to suit all situations.<br />\n<br />\nAt the heart of Hinduism remains mans' essential quest for union with the Absolute supreme the brahmAn. In addition to tradition and moral order, it also signifies the path of knowledge and correct action ( Dharma ).<br />\n<br />\nIslam and Christianity are religions. These religions had Inquisitions.<br />\n<br />\nJews were too busy following their VULGAR and racist Talmud.<br />\n<br />\nAhimsa ( non-violence ) even vegetarianism , is a characteristic of Hinduism\u2014due to which vile foreign invaders took advantage..<br />\n<br />\nWhat the waitress calls SAFFRON TERROR -- is just the hindus making a free choice NOT to be cowards anymore and giving back as good as they got.<br />\n<br />\nToday when a patient and tolerant Hindu gets outraged and decides to retaliate, rivers of blood flows on the streets .<br />\n<br />\nHinduism can never dream of all this for openness and inclusivity is the essence of Hinduism.<br />\n<br />\nHinduism is a spiritual code. Know thyself is the quintessence.<br />\n<br />\nHinduism has a total lack of compulsions. You cannot get ex-communicated for NOT toeing the line.<br />\n<br />\nThe diversity, the range, and the lofty metaphysical aspirations of Vedanta are mindboggling.<br />\n<br />\nLoaded truth is delivered or revealed from a divine source and enters the world through a single agent: for example, Abraham in Judaism, Jesus Christ in Christianity, and Muhammad in Islam.<br />\n<br />\nThese truths are then recorded in scriptures that serve as a source of knowledge of divine wisdom: the Hebrew Bible, the New Testament of the Christian Bible, and the Koran. In the Hindu tradition, by utter contrast, there is no single revelation.<br />\n<br />\nThe Hindu spirituality tradition , unlike other religions -- has always concerned itself with the \u201chuman\u201d situation rather than the \u201cour religion \u201c situation.<br />\n<br />\nUnder the doctrine of karma, the ability to make choices remains with the individual-and NOT what is being told as gospel in a holy book .<br />\n<br />\nAsk the Jews\u2014they will say India is the only place where they never got persecuted over thousands of years\u2014they always ran here for refuge.<br />\n<br />\nThe reason ?<br />\n<br />\nThis country had denizens steeped in spirituality \u2014 NOT religious bigots. Hebrew religion and Hinduism co-existed.<br />\n<br />\nYet today foreign funded Indian TV calls all Hindus bigots \u2013what a joke !.<br />\n<br />\nI AM LUCKY TO BE BORN IN INDIA\u2014 HAVING SEEN WHAT THE REST OF THIS PLANET HAS TO OFFER FOR 40 YEARS .!<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_197b+seedPgrBD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_197b+seedPgrBD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SCREW\nTHESE GORA WESTERN UNIVERITIES WHO CLAIM THAT THEY EDUCATE INDIANS , CHINESE\nAND KOREANS&nbsp; PHUKKAT MEIN - - THE\nUNIVERSITY GAINS\u2014 THEY MINT BILLIONS OF US DOLLARS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_29.html?showComment=1475226851760#c9111792612524097674\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">September 30, 2016 at 2:44 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_37MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>WARNING<br /><br />WARNING<br /><br />WARNING</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nIF PAKISTAN USES TACTICAL NUKES ON INDIA<br />\n<br />\nINDIA WILL RESPOND AS IF WE HAVE BEEN ATTACKED BY A STRATEGIC NUCLEAR WEAPON<br />\n<br />\nOUR RETALIATION WILL BE MASSIVE WITH STRATEGIC NUCLEAR STRIKES LITERALLY DECIMATING PAKISTAN<br />\n<br />\nMODI MUST DECLARE THIS POLICY AS SOON AS POSSIBLE - &nbsp;LET THE WORLD HEAR THIS&nbsp;-- &nbsp; LET THERE BE NO AMBIGUITY &nbsp;. .<br />\n<br />\nTACTICAL NUKES HAVE FALLEN INTO THE HANDS OF ROGUE ISLAMIC ELEMENTS --AS THERE IS AN ISI- TERRORIST NEXUS<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /><br />BELOW IS A FACEBOOK POST FROM MY WIFE ABOUT A FORGOTTEN MAN . .</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4KskqG9IC_s/V-33ZaqJTuI/AAAAAAABMNI/7ZvqCQ6HAIw3DiSaeFkx4ol014XpHo4pACEw/s1600/thequint%25252F2016-0HH3%25252Fcf93ffa6-db9e-460b-8784-779d026bf290%25252FRavindra%2BMhatre%2Bsindoor.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"441\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4KskqG9IC_s/V-33ZaqJTuI/AAAAAAABMNI/7ZvqCQ6HAIw3DiSaeFkx4ol014XpHo4pACEw/s640/thequint%25252F2016-0HH3%25252Fcf93ffa6-db9e-460b-8784-779d026bf290%25252FRavindra%2BMhatre%2Bsindoor.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">For decades we have\nbeen turning the other cheek. Walking away even when every sinew in our bodies\ncried out in anguish and pain. Watched as our brave men gave their precious\nlives defending and protecting this nation not only on the borders and high\nmountains but within the country itself, fighting the scourge of terrorism. The\ninnumerable citizens , whose only fault was that they were at the wrong place\nat the wrong time as they went about their decent, hard working lives. Innocent\nlives lost to senseless acts of terror.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\nBut there comes a time in ones life , when one says, ENOUGH !! NO MORE !\nAnd for us as a nation September 29th 2016 marked that day. We chose to act,\nnot to show our military prowess or power, for we do not need to prove it to\nanyone, but to say, \"STOP! You have reached the end of the line. We have\nwaited and waited , hoping that there would be a change, that the extended hand\nof friendship would be accepted and reciprocated . A hand which has been\nextended innumerable times, again and again, despite the broken homes and\ndevastated lives. As of today we choose to exercise the right to protect\nourselves and our dear ones.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This momentous occasion remembering\nwith a sorrowful but grateful heart all those who made the supreme sacrifice,\nwhose names and faces have slowly faded and wafted away with&nbsp; the mists of time, except in the homes and\nhearts of their dear ones. Today take this moment to offer a silent thanks and\na silent prayer.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In this spirit ,sharing a forward , of an\nexample of one such life.&nbsp; JAI HIND.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">There is a busy bridge\nin Pune called Mhatre Bridge. Everyday, it is traversed by thousands of people,\nbut few know or care that the bridge is named after an <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">unsung Indian hero, Shr\nRavindra Hareshwar Mhatre.</span> He was brutally killed by Kashmiri terrorists at the\nage of 48 while he was serving as a diplomat in the Indian Embassy in\nBirmingham UK.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Ravindra Mhatre was\nabducted and killed in an attempt to negotiate the release of terrorist Maqbool\nBhat, in whose name , separatist slogans were raised in JNU , just in the\nrecent past.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>Below: JIHAD call</b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/JiXOEyu0TpA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/JiXOEyu0TpA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Mhatre was kidnapped as\nhe was stepping out of a baker\"s shop after picking up a birthday cake for\nhis daughter. Mhatre's daughter was only 14 when he disappeared forever from\nher life. Her fathers body was found three days later on a sidestreet in\nBirmingham.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i>Below: <span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">KITNE MAQBOOL MAAROGE ? HULLO AJIT DOVAL --WHY DOES OUR COLLEGIUM JUDGES SUPPORT THESE TRAITORS ?</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/HbD1gkh1NZ4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/HbD1gkh1NZ4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">The then PM Indira\nGandhi refused to negotiate with the terrorists and Maqbool Bhat.was hanged to\ndeath days after Mhatres body was found. A few months after that, Mrs Gandhi\nvisited Mhatres ageing parents in Mumbai and allegedly said to them, that on a\npersonal level, she was guilty of taking their son away from them, but her\nhands were tied.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nOctober 25, 2016 at 7:05 PM<br />\n<br />\nIn the Bhagavad-Gita (Ch.10, Verse 24), Krishna, while explaining his omnipresence, names the most perfect being, mortal or divine, in each of several categories. While doing so, he says: \"Among generals, I am Skanda, the lord of war.\"<br />\n<br />\nSkanda is Murugan, Subramanyan , Kartik<br />\n<br />\nThe worship of Kartik is more popular in South India, especially among Tamilians and Malayalis (Tamil Nadu and Kerala).<br />\n<br />\nThe Murugan Temple in Palani ( Tamil Nadu ) was built by the Calicut king. In ancient days Kollur, Sringeri , Palani was part of the mighty Chera empire which was never defeated , till Tipu Sultan came with French rockets provided by Rothchild<br />\n<br />\nKartik is the elder son of Shiva and Parvati. His vahana is a peacock ( Paravani) .<br />\n<br />\nYazidis worhip Murugan and their Mecca is Palani. In Kerala many babies are named Velayudhan ( Skanda with spear ) .<br />\n<br />\nMGRs poll mamagers portrayed him a Murugan and when this caught on among illiterates , he was invincible.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/the-yazidis-of-iraq-ethnic-cleansing-by.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5766099210239855640\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_74M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. TODAY ALL IDIOTS RUN TO BUY GOLD.<br />\n<br />\nDHAN HAS EVERYTHING TO DO WITH DHANVANTARI, THE RODUCT OF SAMUDRA MANTHAN FOR WHICH VISHNU TOOK HIS SECOND AVATAR --AS KOORMA ( TORTOISE )<br />\n<br />\nThe ten Vishnu Avatars are:<br />\n<br />\n1. Matsya (the fish)<br />\n2. Koorma (the tortoise)<br />\n3. Varaha (the boar)<br />\n4. Narasimha (the human-lion)<br />\n5. Vamana (the dwarf)<br />\n6. Parasurama (the angry man, Rama with an axe)<br />\n7. Lord Rama (the perfect man, king of Ayodha)<br />\n8. Lord Krishna (the divine statesman)<br />\n9. Lord Ayyappa.<br />\n10. Kalki (the mighty warrior)--the FINAL avatar<br />\n<br />\nMount Meru was used to churn the oceans , Samudra Manthan for divine nectar or ambrosia.<br />\n<br />\nMount Meru extends from earth into space to a height of 85 times earth's diameter.<br />\n<br />\nThis is a cosmic allegory of TRINITY in action. Samudra Manthan gave us AYURVEDA --the product of this effort of 54 devas and 54 asuras churning the ocean --is about the number OM-- whose digital equivalent is 108.<br />\n<br />\nAfter the churning effort Lord Dhanvantari emerged out of the ocean holding in his four hands, the Shankh ( conch which gives us the golden spiral and golden mean ) , Chakra ( scalar endothermic / exhothermic howitzer which caused a sudden sunset during Mahabharata war \u2013it was NOT a solar eclipse ) , Jalauka (leech\u2014for vaccination ) and a pot containing rejuvenating nectar called amrita ( soma mentioned in Rig Veda ) .<br />\n<br />\nSamudra Manthan is a cosmic allegory. It is about quantum possibility vortex vibrations, between two poles.<br />\n<br />\nTo activate the third eye of Shiva, or to perceive higher dimensions, the pineal gland ( soul ) and the pituitary glands ( body ) must vibrate in resonance to create a field.<br />\n<br />\nSoma is a divine LSD-- rather a million times more powerful DMT. A 12 strand Maharishi with NIL junk DNA can produce it naturally, by resonating his pineal gland with his DNA, and achieve telepathy and psychic teleportation.<br />\n<br />\nThe pineal gland produces Pinoline, ( 6-methoxy-tetra-dydro-beta carboline, or 6-MeO-THBC ) . Pinoline also resonates with the very pulse of life 7.83 Hertz, the pulse the DNA uses to replicate, and which has been measured to be emitted from the brains and hands of all successful healers, regardless of belief or faith.<br />\n<br />\nOM king mantra is 7.843 hertz. Resonance can vibrate the pineal gland, to release Nuerotransmitter seratonin, melatonin, DMT, etc. DMT is the spirit molecule that bends space-time. Pineal DMT is the chemical messenger which links body and spirit.<br />\n<br />\nThere is indeed a connection between consciousness and tangled state quantum phenomena Indian Vedic maharishis had the inherent ability to go on either side of the narrow band of five human senses. THEY COULD TRANSCEND THE SENSES AND LIMITATION OF SPACE-TIME.<br />\n<br />\nThey firmly believed that the invisible below the quantum screen gives rise to the visible. At the time of death Seratonin and Melatonin in the brain breaks down to Dimethyltryptamine or DMT, C12 N2 H16, just after the oxygen stops circulating. This is the moment for the ultimate DMT trip. You see your whole past life as FRACTAL dvine geometry.<br />\n<br />\nWhen you consume Soma, colours , sounds and numbers all show up as fractal geometry.<br />\n<br />\nTo the spiritual eastern mind, the story of SAMUDRA MANTHAN produces amazing acts of faith like the Kumbh Mela , which has been going on for 6000 years. Tamas and Rajas are conscious of each other. Amrit reveals the fractal nature of consciousness.<br />\n<br />\nAmrit is NOT external, it is produced inside your head. All you need to know is how to produce it by your own mind. 12 strand DNA which ancient Maharishis had, has now degraded to 2 strand DNA.<br />\n<br />\nThese 12 strand DNA maharishis with raised Kundalinis , can read akashik records , convert them from fractal geometry, for daily life use. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/11/beyond-21st-dec-2012-opening-your-third.html?showComment=1477834206275#c5927680002428147312\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">October 30, 2016 at 7:00 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_39MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nIMPORTANT :<br />\n<br />\nI WANT MY READERS TO KNOW THIS<br />\n<br />\nALL HINDU GODS ARE COSMIC FORCES EXCEPT LAST FIVE VISHNU AVATARS OF VAMANA, PARASHURAMA, RAMA , KRISHNA AND AYYAPPA.<br />\n<br />\nIDIOTS LIKE DEVADUTT PATTANAIK AND AMISH TRIPATHI DO NOT KNOW THIS.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS HINDUSIM DENIGRATING FOREIGN SPONSORED DUO IS BEING MONITORED BY OUR SECURITY AGENCIES.<br />\n<br />\nALL OUR PURANAS ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES.<br />\n<br />\nSAMUDRA MANTHAN GAVE US TWO IMPORTANT ENTITIES OF RAHU AND KETU-- ASURAS WHO TRIED TO SWALLOW SOME AMRIT INCOGNITO --<br />\n<br />\nTHERE CAN BE HINDU HOROSCOPE WITHOUT RAHU AND KETU<br />\n<br />\nIn Hindu astrology we leave out Uranus ( Shweta ) ,Neptune ( Shyama ) and Plutu ( Teevra ) as they are too far away to exert any major influence on humans and are also in one single rashi for too long.<br />\n<br />\nInstead we use the sun, the moon , Rahu and Ketu .<br />\n<br />\nThere is a fundamental difference between Rahu and Ketu and the other planets. The other planets are bodies of physical mass having form, shape, color, gravity, atmosphere, motion etc.<br />\n<br />\nRahu and Ketu are two imaginary points in the heavens without mass, shape or form. They are the points of intersection of the apparent path of the Sun with the path of Moon, and are called Chaya Grahas or Shadow planets..<br />\n<br />\nHinduism has amazing cosmic allegories woven into lore , for the simple common man to consume.<br />\n<br />\nNone of it is superstition.<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS NO SUPERSTITION IN HINDUISM AT ALL.<br />\n<br />\nDO NOT CARE FOR ALL THESE DIMWIT \u201cEMINENT \u201c RATIONALISTS WHO COME ON TV.<br />\n<br />\nALL OF THEM CLUBBED TOGETHER , MULTIPLIED BY ONE MILLION, STILL CANNOT MATCH UP TO THE DIRT UNDER CAPT AJIT VADAKAYILs FINGER NAIL.<br />\n<br />\nSo what is ZE lore?<br />\n<br />\nAfter the Samudra Manthan effort or churning of the cosmic ocean by 54 Devas and 54 asuras , the God of Ayurveda Dhanwantari rose from the primordial ether .<br />\n<br />\nHe was 4 armed holding the Sudarsana Chakra weapon and Conch in the upper right and lefts hands. In the other two hands he carries a pot containing the nectar of immortality and a leech.<br />\n<br />\nThe Devas tried to vamoose with the nectar and the asuras gave it to them nice and proper, and snatched the pot away.<br />\n<br />\nThe divine eagle Garuda known to be large enough to block the sun ( a Vimana plane of Vishnu ) snatched the pot and flew away.<br />\n<br />\nWhile on the flight 4 drops fell on 4 places on earth- Prayag ( named by Muslim invaders as Allah- abad ), Hardwar, Ujain and Nasik.<br />\n<br />\nThese are the four spots the Kumbh Mela, the biggest pilgrimage show on earth is held, when about 80 million pilgrims take a dip in the holy river..<br />\n<br />\nHowever the asuras got hold of the pot again. GOTCHAA<br />\n<br />\nVishnu came in the guise of Mohini the beautiful dancer , distracted the asuras and melted away with the pot.<br />\n<br />\nShe distributed it among the devas without keeping anything for the asuras as per the original contract.<br />\n<br />\nHowever two clever asuras Rahu and Ketu came in disguise as devas and consumes the amrit.<br />\n<br />\nBefore the amrit went down them mangy throats Sun god Surya and moon god Chandra shouted to Mohini , to use the Surarshan chakra, the scalar vortex and cut off their heads, which she did in one shot.<br />\n<br />\nRahu and Ketu are the North and South Lunar nodes causing the sun and moon eclipses.<br />\n<br />\nThe date of Kumbh at Haridwar falls when Jupiter is in Aquarius, and Sun and Moon are in the Aries and Sagittarius zodiacs respectively.<br />\n<br />\nAs Jupiter takes about 11 years, 10 months and 14 days to complete its revolution around the sun, its obvious that it comes back to any specific position on its orbit on completion of nearly 12 years.<br />\n<br />\nThus all these planetary configurations repeat every 12th year and, thus, Kumbh Mela also comes after the same interval. On the Kumbh Mela day Sages and holy sadhus converge from all parts of India.<br />\n<br />\nSage Varahamihira in Brihat Samhita ( 2660 BC ) devoted one chapter to Rahu and Ketu and considered them not any celestial physical body like other planets but as the nodes of the Moon, ie, points of intersection of orbits of the Moon and the Earth.<br />\n<br />\nThe north point of this intersection is called Rahu (north node) while the south point of that is called Ketu (south node).<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_39BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; It gives the diameter of planets, and modern Trigonometry ( Sin/ Cos/ Tan/ Secant ) and Spherical trigonometry.<br />\n<br />\nThe average length of the tropical year is given as 365.2421756 days in Surya Siddhanta, which is only 1.4 seconds shorter than the modern value of 365.2421904 days, of the atomic clock age.<br />\n<br />\nThe average length of the siderial year or the actual length of the Earth's revolution around the sun, as 365.2563627 days, which is almost the same as the modern value of 365.25636305 days .<br />\n<br />\nSince then, Rahu and Ketu were deprived of the amrit by Sun and Moon sneaking , they developed bitter enmity against the Sun and the Moon.<br />\n<br />\nThe nodal points of the Moon what we call Rahu and Ketu are, clubs of magnetic and gravitational forces of two celestial bodies, the Moon and the Earth and hence are very influential on the life of mankind.<br />\n<br />\nThese points affect our central nervous system as well as sympathetic and para-sympathetic nervous systems which work on the principles of electro-magnetic systems.<br />\n<br />\nThey have direct impacts on the generation of signals of informations in neurons and neuro-transmitters and their movement from brain to various parts of our body and back to the brain.<br />\n<br />\nThe nodal points (Rahu and Ketu) are psycho-somatic which govern not only the stress level of our mind but also the activities of hormones, blood circulation and function of the heart.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild used his FAKE KaliDASA to inject poison into Rahu and Ketu in his FAKE work Uttar Kalamrita .<br />\n<br />\nKalidasa was a FAKE poet created and backdated by Jew Rothschild. The South Node Ketu is like anti-matter in a natal chart.<br />\n<br />\nMY WIFE AND ALMOST ALL ANCIENT FAMILIES IN KERALA CONSULT THE RAHU KALAM CHART BEFORE WE DO SOMETHING CRITICAL.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTHE BENAMI MEDIA AND THEIR RATIONALIST STOOGES WERE RIDICULING OUR ISRO CHAIRMAN FOR PRESSING A BUTTON TAKING CARE OF RAHU KALAM AND FOR PRAYING AT A TEMPLE- BEFORE SENDING OUR ROCKET TO MARS .<br />\n<br />\nIF THE US PRESIDENT PRAYS IN A CHURCH, WWWOOOOH IT IS A DAMN GOOD THING RIGHT ?<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE WHITE MAN WAS RUNNING AROUND NAKED DOING GRUNT GRUNT, WE ALREADY HAD OUR ASTRONOMICAL ALMANACS FOR SEVERAL MILLENNIUMS.<br />\n<br />\nThe Moon (Chandra) completes its orbit round the earth in about a month crossing the orbit of earth twice in the same period, once when it goes from south to north and at another time while travelling from north to south.<br />\n<br />\nThe ascending point is called \"Rahu\" and descending point - \"Ketu\". These have retrograde motion in the zodiac at the rate of 19\u00b020' per year.<br />\n<br />\nIt has been established beyond doubt that Rahu and Ketu influence an individual\u2019s life, at times more than other planets.<br />\n<br />\nSince Rahu and Ketu are in exact opposition to each other, their effect should be considered simultaneously.<br />\n<br />\nRahu has the properties of Shani (Saturn) whereas Ketu has the influence of Mangala (Mars)<br />\n<br />\nThey indicate the precise point of the harmony with the three most important influences in our life- the Sun, the Earth and the Moon. This relationship plays an important part in the enfolding of individual consciousness.<br />\n<br />\nTheir role as Karmic indicators of our life is connected with their power to cause eclipses.<br />\n<br />\nThe eclipses occur in the vicinity of Rahu Ketu during the Full Moon and the New Moon. (During New Moon when it is +/- 18 degrees from Rahu Ketu, the Solar eclipse takes place. At the full Moon +/- 11 degrees 15' from the nodal position, the Lunar eclipse takes place.)<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_37MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_37BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_37B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_38B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1957126358636954005\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_38M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/11/beyond-21st-dec-2012-opening-your-third.html?showComment=1477834249969#c1957126358636954005\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">October 30, 2016 at 7:00 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_38MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nAs they symbolically eclipse the Sun (consciousness) and the Moon (the Mind), they have a great part to play in darkening our perspective in order to bring in new light. They deal with the concept of death and re-birth, transformation and regeneration.<br />\n<br />\nThey have been given the status of planets to emphasise their significance and the importance placed on eclipses.<br />\n<br />\nThey have no substance and are physically non-existent. Yet their influence is full of potency and spiritual significance.<br />\n<br />\nThey work in unison 180 degrees apart, two opposite points in the zodiac with a mission to churn our lives in order to externalise hidden potential and wisdom. In keeping with their shadowy nature, they work on a psychological level.<br />\n<br />\nIt is always difficult to gauge their effect because their main concern is with our emotional makeup. They effect us internally. We are unaware of what exactly is happening to us at the time..<br />\n<br />\nKetu deals with the past Karma and Rahu with the future.<br />\n<br />\nThe five instincts that keep us attached to the materialistic purpose of life are Kaam (Desire, passions) Krodh (Anger) Madh (intoxicants- drugs, alcohol etc) Moh (Attachment) Lobh(Greed) and Matsaya(Jealousy).<br />\n<br />\nWe need to control our instincts rather than allowing ourselves to be controlled by them. Both Rahu and Ketu have the ability to keep our mind focused on these instincts- Rahu by exaggerating and Ketu by obscuring or blocking.<br />\n<br />\nWe are tied down to the cycle of unhappiness and dissatisfaction as we cannot break away from our lower selves. We are born again and again to experience the pleasures and pains of the earthly life until we recognise them to be the illusions that they are.<br />\n<br />\nRahu Ketu deals with the inner fight within us, the moral and the social choices we have to constantly make and the inner dilemmas.<br />\n<br />\nRahu takes people off their Dharmic past path to tempt them on the road of self destruction. Ketu is considered the keeper of the book of our life- past and present Karmas.<br />\n<br />\nWhen all the planets are hemmed between Rahu and Ketu (i.e., the moon's north node and the moon's south node), Kaalsarpa YOGAM ( not dosham ) is formed.<br />\n<br />\nKalasarpa yogam is a karmic dosha that may run across the generations\u2014bad luck galore .<br />\n<br />\nPeople go for Kalsarpa Shanti Pooja to Trimbakeshwar Temple at Nasik .<br />\n<br />\nA FAKE GURU AND A DROHI NAMED SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR TWEETED AND TOLD ON NDTV, THAT LORD AYYAPPA ( 9TH AVATAR OF VISHNU ) IS A PRODUCT OF A HOMOSEXUAL UNION BETWEEN LORD SHIVA AND LORD VISHNU.<br />\n<br />\nHE HAS USED THE STORY OF MOHINI AND RAHU/ KETU TO LIE THAT SANATANA DHARMA SUPPORTS ANAL SEX --AND THAT VISHNU ( OHINI ) AND SHIVA HAD ANAL SEX TO PRODUCE LORD AYYAPPA ( VISHNUs 9TH AVATAR )<br />\n<br />\nSORRY -- VISHNU AND SHIVA ARE COSMIC FORCES-- VISHNU AVATAR AYYAPPA ( IMHOTEP ) WAS A MORTAL<br />\n<br />\nREAD THE STORY OF MOHINI IN THE POST BELOW--<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/beyond-21st-dec-2012-opening-your-third.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_39b+seedEFveD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_39b+seedEFveD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;
